story:
My health is getting in the way of my productivity

I have survived cancer three times. 

Most recently, an operation at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center (MSKKC) in 2013 saved my life. My urologist Dr. Jennifer Simmons sent me to the world's expert surgeon Dr. Paul Russo because she said no surgeon in Pennsylvania where I live had the necessary skills. Russo removed the cancerous tumor and saved my right kidney. 

I was able to give away my daughter Joanna. I was also able to do work on city planning and disability design for a variety of academic and general publications focused on helping the aged (I am 67) and disabled (I am a paraplegic) contribute to the economy rather than be the problem society generally considers us to be. 

Currently, I am in crippling pain causing me to go to the emergency room. Sophisticated pain relief is not available in my hometown of State College. I need an implant that will beam radio waves to my damaged spinal nerves. 

I need to return to MSKKC where that technology exists to restore me to productivity 

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $2,000 so I can return to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center deal with my cancer-related issues and receive pain reduction treatment that will insert a radio wave device that reduces pain to the point where I am no longer dependent upon drugs.

  • The money will pay for bus fare to New York on Megabus. It will pay for lodging if I cannot secure a place to live (while not in the hospital). It will pay for meals and transportation expenses. New York City is expensive. While there, I hope to report on the opening of the new Renzo Piano Whitney for ww.e-architect. uk which publishes my work regularly. 
  • The work to which I would like to return when my health is restored is suggesting the design of communities to meet the special requirements of retiring Baby Boomers who are disabled or are at increase risk of acquiring disabilities. See: 

    http://www.e-architect.co.uk/columns/belt-and-suspenders-routine

  • While in New York, I plan to begin an effort to move to Newark which is the most promising location for Baby Boomers in my situation; namely, well-educated, living on Social Security but prohibited from earning more (as I am) because of federal policies that would evict me from my current low-cost apartment if I earn enough to fix my teeth, purchase a hand-controlled disability van, attend my daughter Amelia's forthcoming wedding in Chapel Hill, NC and eventually see my grandchildren which Joanna and Amelia both plan to have. I will be describing these efforts in video, in my on-line column for e-architect, and in my report for Penn State's Department of Architectural Engineering where after four years I have also become a lay expert in 3-D design, BIM compliance, and sustainability--all of which are essential for new moderate income disability accessible housing for which there is a desperate shortage. 

The Impact

You might mind it helpful to visit my website to see the work I have done with the application of 3-D design and other technologies to help provide housing for the elderly and disabled poor. Currently, I am working with Colleen Nelson, past president of the Wyoming ADA who has recently completed an assisted living center. Here is posting that gives the approach I am taking both in educating architectural engineering and other graduate students and in describing how to renovate the bathroom, the most dangerous room in the house for a resident with a mobility disability:

http://www.joelsolkoff.com/how-to-write-academic-papers-successfully-let-us-start-with-a-specific-example-a-chapter-on-renovating-a-bathroom-for-a-mobility-disabled-bathroom/

Note also: I have introduced legislation in the Borough of State College to require new housing be visitable. The issue is explained in my testimony before the planning board. Ed LeClear, State College's town planner, will be scheduling hearings in April and expects that at least one of the ordinances will become law by the end of the year. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRlXyydwNO8


Risks & Challenges

The risk is that I could die or become physically unable to continue the kind of productive work I am doing. 

  • From the time I was 28 when I was diagnosed with Hodgkin's disease, a cancer of the lymphatic system,  I have been a fighter. I published a book about the experience helping others understand the emotional as well as the physical challenges of cancer. See; http://www.joelsolkoff.com/book-store/books/lea...
  • As a Jew, I believe there is a spiritual force that guides us in our actions. Belief and perseverance are the tools for someone in my situation. I do not come with guarantee. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

1. Please put me in touch with people in Newark who might help in my relocation.

2. Put me in touch with young (25-35 year old) architects whose talent has already been recognized and who are open to new ideas. I am especially interested in architect who believe, as Lewis Mumford suggested, "A building should not stand out. It should fit in.

3. Put me in touch with "empire builders" at the Ford Foundation, where I once worked as a consultant who recognize the significance of the largest population in U.S. history retiring while only 5 percent of U.S. housing stock is wheel chair accessible. 

  • Also, please get the word out about my campaign.
  • Even if you cannot give, please use the Indiegogo share tools to inform your friends about my campaign. 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
About Metabolic Alchemy

Metabolic Alchemy was formed in the effort to spread awareness of the beauty of alchemy, and to help people grow, heal, and learn through alchemy.  

We make 100% organic, plant based elixirs for health and personal development, using only natural ingredients in all of our products.  We believe that nature provides the best medicine, and nature aided by alchemy is magical.

We use the word “metabolic” as being symbolic of one of the key concepts in alchemy, that is: Thesis + Antithesis = Synthesis. In other words, we believe in balance.

Learn more at www.metabolic-alchemy.com

Our Current Status and Funding Needs

At Metabolic Alchemy, we have spent the past two years developing, testing, and refining a line of elixirs.  These are based on over 20 years of experience and study in the fields of alchemy, qabalah, mysticism, material science, and personal exploration.

We currently have two main product lines:

The Elements Collection - A set of five elixirs that work to balance the philosophical elements of the personality. More information on the elements collections can be found at: www.metabolic-alchemy.com/pages/about-the-journey

The Wellness Collection - A set of elixirs focused on sinus health, deep sleep, sexual health, and relaxation/meditation.  More about these can be found at: www.metabolic-alchemy.com/collections/wellness-collection

These products are currently available on our website and we would like to enter into the wholesale market.  Since we launched at the beginning of March, we have been picked up by small local stores in Boulder, Colorado but do not currently have the resources to pursue additional orders from larger retailers.

We are looking to raise $25,000 to begin larger scale production and to meet the additional financial demands of wholesale sales.

The money raised will go to purchasing additional raw materials, upgrading our laboratory equipment for larger scale production, and to meeting FDA requirements such as having all ingredients tested by an outside laboratory.

We will scale our production to the amount of money raised.  The more we raise, the faster we grow.  If we do not meet our goal of $25,000, all perks will still be delivered.  There is no limit to how large we can scale, so if we exceed our goal you will be helping us grow even faster.

Why Contribute?

Let's face it, we live in an over medicated, over stressed society.  We've become conditioned to accept a paradigm of addressing symptoms rather than get to root issues, and then having to address the side effects of those treatments with even more surface layer treatments.

Metabolic Alchemy takes a different approach.  We believe that many issues can be solved naturally.  The healthiest system is a balanced system, and our elixirs are intended to do just that, bring balance.

By contributing to this project, you are supporting a more natural way of living.  We want to help as many people as we can in this lifetime, whether it be helping people rest, live with clearer sinuses, or grow into a better person.

We believe in our product. We've seen the results in ourselves and in the people we have been able to serve already.

Here's a few of the comments we've received so far:

"Your Sinus Support rocks!  It keeps me clearer than any over the counter drugs I've tried." - Jason from Delaware

"The Deep Sleep Elixir is amazing.  I wake up feeling more rested than I ever have" - Ron from Boulder

"I'm seeing an immediate improvement in my practice after taking your Spirit Elixir, thank you!" - Amanda - Reiki practitioner in Pennsylvania

"I've always struggled with concentration, after taking the Air Elixir for a week, I've been staying on task, and surprisingly my ability to communicate has improved"  - Aaron from Nova Scotia

All this without any damaging effects to the liver and kidneys.

Of course we are required to say:  Metabolic Alchemy products are dietary supplements, not drugs, and are not intended to diagnose treat, cure or prevent any disease. 

Thank God we aren't considered a drug, because we really don't like them anyway.

Also, we are offering some pretty nifty perks as a way to say "THANK YOU" for your contribution. Any amount given is a HUGE help to us, and for that we are eternally grateful.

So what are the perks??

Donate $15 and receive a copy of the Elements Meditation Series written and developed by Todd

Donate $35 and receive one of our Organic, Plant-Based Elixirs

Donate $25, $50 or $100 on one of our "Thank you" perks and receive our sincerest thanks and gratitude for your contribution.

Donate $100 and receive a complete collection of either Wellness OR Elements

Donate $200 and receive one of everything we make – what fun!

Donate $250 and receive both the Wellness Collection AND the Elements Collections, PLUS be the first to receive the 7 Stars (chakras) Collection when it is released in late 2015.

Donate $500 and receive the Wellness Collection, the Elements Collection, the 7 Stars Collection (when released in late 2015), and a Custom Elixir made just for YOU. Includes shipping.

Donate $1,000 and receive all items listed in lower cost perks, plus a one hour consultation with Todd to design a set of 5 Custom Elixirs just for YOU. In addition receive one full-year of free elixirs as you need them - pure awesomeness.

Lastly, and we just want to say it again, we are so grateful for any size contribution whether you select a custom, random amount or any of our perks offered, WE ARE SO THANKFUL FOR YOU!


Risks & Challenges

We've already done the legwork of product development, testing, and learning the ropes of the retail world. We know how hard it is to succeed in a very competitive market and we are ready for the challenge.

We're no strangers to hard work, and have proven we have what it takes to get the job done.

My name isTodd.  I am the alchemist at Metabolic Alchemy. I've been in the Navy as a Nuclear Mechanic and a Pilot, a licensed stock broker, and have risen through the ranks in the commercial nuclear industry.  I have left a very lucrative career behind to pursue my passion: this. 

You will find me dead in the street with a sales packet in my hand before you ever hear me utter the words "I give up".

I could really use your help though.  We are at a critical moment, we need to make enough product to get us through.

Of course we would love for you to contribute, but if you cannot support us financially, will you help us spread the word?  Anything you do will help.  Share on social media, tell your friends, or link to us.  Whatever you do, thank you.

Note:  Shipping on perks is included for the continental United States.  Items shipped outside the US require an additional $20 for any perk less than $250.

story: I am a performance artists and movement therapist, traveling the world in hopes of spreading the nectar of peace to as many hearts as I can. Yoga will deeply help in deepening my knowledge and practice, tuning in with Source to expand on my dreams of creating a performance called MasterPeace. MasterPeace is a show that combines my passion and playfulness of circus arts and dance, with music that represents the 5 elements and wisdom of ancient mystical traditions, such as yoga and shamanism. It will tell a deep and inspirational story about remembering our connection to Nature and Spirit, attuned to the highest vibrations of healing and helping others realize their connection to the Source of life.

story:
About us

We are team of young people who share passion to Street Workout. We trained together for a year now, meeting regularly five times week in a group of average fifty persons. We’ve had some very talented guys and girls among us but there is one thing that blocks us from development.  We don’t have a professional workout park.


What is Street Workout

Street Workout isa physical activity performed mostly in outdoor parks or public facilities. It is a combination ofathletics, calisthenics (exercises which are performed using purely body weight), and sports. Street Workout is a modern name for bodyweight workout in outdoor parks. In Poland, there are over the 35 local groups that practicing that kind of sport. Popularity of this discipline is increases rapidly.


What we need

We don’t have professional place to train. We forced to train in spaces that are not accessible and dangerous for us and expose us on to injuries. Our city government don’t wont to finance workout park for us, although in other, even smaller cites there are such parks. So we put our hope in you. We asked you for financial support so we can build a proper training place for us.


How much it costs

We have few projects and build simple but well organized park is in our country cost approximately 13700$. Collect such amount will be realization of our dreams and allow us to develop.

Where can you see us

www.facebook.com/swkonin

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXpVOYzqCZ8HbYtbvchmtRg

story:
Check out more of what we do: www.targetvisioncam.com



SYSTEM FEATURES

The Hawk turns any spotting scope into a smart scope in just minutes.  Simply slide the hawk over the eyepiece of the spotting scope and open the Targetvision app on a smartphone or tablet to view the camera feed and unlock all of the app features.  
Shooting has never been more fun!

            

Never wonder which shot was your last        You can easily mark your shots and  shot again!  Simply press the plus                  groups to keep track of exactly what  button after each shot you take and              order they hit the paper, what group the targetvision app will make your last shot      they were shot with, and/or who shot  blink, making it easy for you to quickly        them.  Marking a group is as simple as identify your newest shot no matter how     picking a color after you shoot a group.  many shots are already on the target.          There are 7 colors to choose from and                                                                                           they can be re-used.

You never have to take home a target           You can record your entire shooting  again.  The Hawk can save all of your           session to review later or to show others.  targets digitally and help you keep them    This feature is great if you're an instruc- organized to review later and track your      tor and need to show cause and effect.  progress.                                                                  

Our app will be able to know the size of         Automatic shot recognition will          your target and overlay a grid of a                  automatically recognize and label the specific size of your choosing to help            change in your target caused by a bullet you become a better shooter.  With the        hole via computer vision.  With this ability to size the target and identify              feature, you can quickly and easily see bullet holes, the app can calculate the          your newest shot without interacting    size and position of your groups as well.      with your mobile device at all.


We have 5 Hawks with reviewers right now and will be posting their reviews as they come out. 
Meanwhile, here is what is being said about our long range system.
What the media has said about our original long range system:

"If you have ever made the walk of frustration when you can’t see your hits on target through your rifle scope or spotting scope and have to hike out to the target, you know there’s a desire for this product. For many long-range shooters, I’d call it a need." - Russ Chastain, Alloutdoor.com

"I can see it’s application far and wide, whether as an individual trying to get good dope on his rifle or a school house trying to increase their efficiency in classes the Target Vision get’s it done." - Jeff Gonzales, Tridentconcepts.com

 

"Targetvision, the leader in wireless spotting scope manufacturers... This is cool technology, really forward-thinking. It may seem like a toy or a gadget to some but like smart scopes, just wait a few years, this type of wireless functionality will be a standard feature to high-end and eventually even mainstream scopes of all types, rifle, spotting, and the rest at shooting ranges everywhere." - Max Slowik, Guns.com

 

"Today, Target Vision has a way to record the information in real-time and store it digitally on the device of your choice.  No more hand-written notes and shot placements in a paper log book.  The information can now be digitally stored and transferred in a more secure manner." - Aaron, Bluesheepdog.com


"As tested today the unit was at 300yds, and the picture was crisp and very easy to see on both a large iPad screen, but also on a smaller iPhone screen." - Sam Cadle, Thefirearmblog.com

What our customers have said about our long range system (our original indiegogo product):

We've listened to our customers and The Hawk is the result of your requests and feedback.  Now we need your help to bring The Hawk to life.  We've structured our campaign as a flexible funding campaign, meaning that whether we meet our goal or not you will receive the perk that you choose.  If we meet our goal, we will be able to automate the manufacturing process for The Hawk and well on our way to making The Hawk available to all shooters across the country. If we don't meet our goal, we will be making every unit by hand while continuing to drive towards our goal of redefining the shooting experience.

   Jinesh Patel, CEO –

MBA and Masters of Engineering degree from Texas A&M University. Successful track in operations management and consulting with startups on product development and corporate strategy. 


   Clay Rhoden, Founder/CINO –

Business degree from the University of Texas. Business development background with heavy experience in the electronics and CCTV camera systems. Former VP of Teasip Technologies and is a serial entrepreneur.

What other types of scopes is the Hawk compatible with?                                       The Hawk is compatible with any scope (telescope, rifle scope, binoculars) that has an eyepiece with an an outer diameter between 1" and 2".  Our universal mount is designed to screw down onto the zoom knob of the eyepiece so that you can still operate the zoom with the mount on the scope.
Will the Hawk work with a straight spotting scope (horizontal eyepiece)?           Yes, as long as the outer diameter of the eyepiece is between 1" and 2".
Do I need WiFi or cell service for the Hawk to work?                                                      No, when you turn the Hawk on it creates its own WiFi network that you connect to. There are no monthly fees associated with the Hawk either.
Is the Hawk weatherproof?                                                                                         Yes, the Hawk is weatherproof but it is not waterproof.  Rain is not a problem.
What is the warranty period?                                                                                           All of our products come with a one year warranty against manufacturer defects.
Which devices does the Hawk work with?                                                                     Our app works on any device that runs iOS or Android and it is compatible with phones and tablets.  You can download our app from the app store or google play store.

SYSTEM FEATURES




The Hawk turns any spotting scope into a smart scope in just minutes.  Simply slide the hawk over the eyepiece of the spotting scope and open the Targetvision app on a smartphone or tablet to view the camera feed and unlock all of the app features.  Shooting has never been more fun!


            
Never wonder which shot was your last        You can easily mark your shots and  shot again!  Simply press the plus                  groups to keep track of exactly what  button after each shot you take and              order they hit the paper, what group the targetvision app will make your last shot      they were shot with, and/or who shot  blink, making it easy for you to quickly        them.  Marking a group is as simple as identify your newest shot no matter how     picking a color after you shoot a group.  many shots are already on the target.          There are 7 colors to choose from and                                                                                           they can be re-used.

"I can see it’s application far and wide, whether as an individual trying to get good dope on his rifle or a school house trying to increase their efficiency in classes the Target Vision get’s it done." - Jeff Gonzales, Tridentconcepts.com

leader in wireless spotting scope manufacturers... This is cool technology,
really forward-thinking. It may seem like a toy or a gadget to some but like
smart scopes, just wait a few years, this type of wireless functionality will
be a standard feature to high-end and eventually even mainstream scopes of all
types, rifle, spotting, and the rest at shooting ranges everywhere." - Max Slowik, Guns.com

story:
Hi, everyone! We love our sex-positive community to bits, but we also remember what it was like when we viewed sex as shameful, all those years ago. That's why we created The Mermaid Voyage---an ocean-themed course for women and female-identified folks who want to heal from sexual shame. Using the theme of the ocean and mermaids (of all different body shapes, types, and orientations, we might add!), we provide safe and affirming audio visualizations that aim to help with shedding shame. Those we've helped in the past have included those who are ashamed of rougher or darker fantasies, those who don't feel comfortable in their bodies, and those who find climaxing shameful. We make it very clear that we are not trained as doctors or psychiatrists, but that, as reiki masters, we know that healing can be found by replacing negative sexual energy with self-embracing warmth.

We've run this course for free on our website in the past, but, thanks to the feedback we received, we know that folks would prefer to own a CD of the audio visualizations (hear a free one here) so they can work at their own pace. The accompanying booklet we plan to have printed will contain the comforting, ocean-themed philosophy of self-love and deep acceptance that our participants have told us they enjoy. 

But it costs a lot to create CDs and booklets. (CDs, for one, must be ordered in bulk!) We'd also like to buy advertising to really spread the word. Will you, wonderful people, help us? We'd be endlessly grateful for anything you're able to give.

story:
Short Summary

Start up soccer school trying to bring football to all walks of life, providing under privileged children with the opportunity they need.

We area group of FA Licensed Coaches just wanting to give back to local communities and help children be children again. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are wanting to raise enough money to provide our services to the local community. To allow under privileged children to experience something they wouldn't be able to afford. 

There is a shortage of opportunities for children as it is but in an age when technology rules, there are many children being left behind or going without because disposable income is not available. The driving force behind this was I saw a programme a few months ago where a mothers house was being repossessed (a little rental property, she was a single parent with 6 children, the husband had just decided to up and leave her one day) and the bailiffs were at the door, she only had one child with her when they turned up as the rest were in school, they gave her a few minutes to collect some belongings and the child was blissfully unaware what was going on. His mother told him to pick a  toy out of all the ones available and he did so without complaint or tears and they left the house on foot to go to speak to housing association (who had already said in their opinion she had deliberately not paid and therefore there was nothing they could do for her). It was seeing the young boy pick one toy and knowing that was the one thing he treasured more than all others that set me on this particular course. I thought of my children and how I would do anything to ensure my children wouldn't go through this, having to tell my 2 year old son he could only have one toy would kill me. I thought then about how other parents who go through this feel, how the child feels and although I won't be able to stop this from happening we might be able to give something back to them to help them take their minds off what is happening at home. 

We want to provide these kids with the opportunity to have fun, get out into the fresh air and most of all interact with other kids with the same passions.

All contrinbutions will receive a thank you, a personalised hand written greeting card or even a hand signed photograph from one of the groups we are teaching as a way to show the children's gratitude as well as our own gratitude for helping these under privileged individuals

story:
You might be wondering just who I am, why you should care and why you should even consider donating to my cause.  My name is Sean Smith, I am twenty five years old and I have a story.


I was born with a disability called Osteogenesis Imperfecta, a brittle bone disorder that causes my bones to be in a weaker, more fragile state, as well as being shorter in stature and other skeletal related issues.  I also suffer from severe scoliosis, restrictive lung disease, asthma and sleep apnea.  I have been wheelchair bound my entire life, and will be for the rest of its duration.

To date, I have had well over 70 bone fractures and 4 major operations (including the placing of titanium rods through both of my femurs). My medical ailments have caused many hospitalizations, including two times where I was declared legally dead without brain or heart activity.

I have reached a point in my life now, where I need the help of others in order to be independent, successful and safe.

I have been without a handicap accessible van for going on five years.  Without a van, I have been nearly home-bound and extremely limited in my overall life.  I am unable to go outside of my city limits (For now, I must rely on a local public transit) and I have missed countless opportunities, both professionally and personally.  I have also been unable to receive new medical treatments at a facility that I would have to drive to  and am unable to attend college classes due to the unpredictability of the public transit system.

This has been, debilitating - and I have tried in the past to raise funds for this cause, and though somewhat successful, was never enough. I do work, and I make money, but it is not enough, and not nearly close to my goal.  I don't beg, and I don't want pity, just the chance to be out there and living a full, enriched, and safe life.


I am calling on your help 

Help me raise funds to get this handicap accessible van.  With your help, my entire world can change. 

If you want to help – please consider donating, or sharing this fundraiser on your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIN, or anywhere.  I thank you so much.

Sincerely,
Sean Smith

story:
Help us to give basic preventive health screening and consultations with General practitioners, Ayurveda doctors, Dietitians  and counselling services, open to public absolutely free of cost to promote preventive health.

This way we achieve our ultimate goal to save thousands of lives. And through more centres to reach millions. We are in this together. 

There is so much more we want to do. Not only do we have the clinical know how and scientific know how. But we have a drive to make sure that these people come here has a better life, a happy life away from diseases. But our work is far from finished. We can move faster and by moving faster, we can do things more quickly. 

Revolutionary lifestyle ecosystem. Redesigned preventive health care service. 

Road map to helloDOC - 

Dr Varun worked with international SOS in rural Madhya Pradesh and is a national award winner for outstanding performance in the year 2012.


Dr Jase believes in a doctor-patient relationship, worked extensively with the National Rural Health Mission in the most rural parts of Kerala.

It was during our stints with primary health care, we decided to stop curing diseases and start preventing diseases by coaching a good life style.
In the year 2013 May, we started our service by house visits, school visits and office visits. We got busy and happy. 

The overwhelming response made us to realise the need of redesigned preventive and holistic lifestyle ecosystem. This made us to think, dream and materialize an integrated holistic lifestyle ecosystem. 

 We started helloDOC ecosystem on January of 2015.

We want helloDOC to be used by all. We want to give a very high quality of service not just for rich, but for all. We wanted helloDOC to be a place where people love to come unlike hospitals. To do that, to meet the international standards we had to do a lot of investments. We had to hire the best professionals. We knew that a change won't happen overnight because the change we are talking about is lifestyle. But we are inching forward slowly. How ever, for this to stay afloat and to become sustainable. We need your help to back us up now. 



 www.hellodocworld.com

www.facebook.com/hellodocworld

How funds will be used? 

- We aim to provide preventive health care services for individuals.

- Each individual to avail basic preventive health screening and free unlimited consultations with General practitioners, Ayurveda doctors, Dietitian and counselling services for a year.

- And for medical expenses, and operational expenses. 


Thank you very much. You create a beautiful world. 


Media about helloDOC


Manorama
http://english.manoramaonline.com/lifestyle/health/what-s-up-doc.html
The Hindu

http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/prevent-and-prevail/article6809469.ece

New Indian Express

http://www.newindianexpress.com/cities/kochi/HelloDoc-Launched-at-Panampilly-Nagar/2015/01/22/article2630458.ece

story:
Our goal

Our goal is to participate at the Junior World Gliding Championships 2015 in Narromine, Australia from November 27th till December 12th.

We would like to send four junior pilots to the championship. Narromine is known as one of the world’s best soaring places. It would be an exceptional opportunity and experience for the Belgian Junior Team to participate at this event.

The team

We proudly present our team to accomplish the ‘Australian dream’, a team of five very enthusiastic and motivated young pilots and an experienced flight coach. These juniors represent Belgium’s best pilots age under 25. They have achieved top rankings in several national and international competitions.


Our story

The previous Junior World Championships were held in Germany and Poland and experience was gained during these 2 contests. The team is now ready to excel at the next Junior World Gliding Championship in Narromine Australia. We are convinced the Belgian Junior Team has the potential to deliver the next junior world champion! Did you know that Bert jr. Schmelzer, the current World Gliding Champion among the seniors, is a Belgian?

Unfortunately, it’s not all about flying. Competing at the highest level and at the other side of the world, cost a lot of money. After some fund raising activities, we realized another approach was needed. That’s when the crowdfunding idea came to life. With a lot of perseverance and many meetings later, we are ready to present you our crowdfunding project.

We need

Your help! Going to Australia and becoming world champion won’t be easy. We already have a lot of people who offered help, but it’s not enough. We need 65.000 euro to compete at the championship. This amount includes renting gliders, entry fees, shipping container, airline tickets, housing, cars rental and much more.

 
We don’t want to aim for the impossible. That’s why this crowdfunding is designed to raise 45.000 euro. It is the first step to Narromine. We are currently trying to attract additional sponsors for the remaining amount. So if you are interested to help us out in addition to the crowdfunding, do not hesitate to contact us for more information: www.jwgc2015.be. Advertising is also possible & all donations are welcome.


This is gliding!

Soaring or gliding is a air sport in which pilots fly gliders. They use naturally occurring currents of rising air, produced when the sun heats the atmosphere. This phenomena, called thermals, are necessary to stay in the air. Flying from thermal to thermal, glider pilots can cover large distances at high speed. The best pilots, like our juniors, fly races.

story:
WHAT IS THE ADVANCED SEISMIC WARNING SYSTEM?

The Advanced Seismic Warning System is the world's most sensitive and highly developed seismic activity monitoring system, capable of alerting authorities of an impending earthquake up to 48 HOURS IN ADVANCE!


ELECTRICAL SIGNALS REVEAL EARTHQUAKE DAYS IN ADVANCE!

Unlike traditional seismic systems which monitor the physical vibration of the earth, The Advanced Seismic Warning System triggers an alarm when the electrical activity within the earth reaches a certain threshold, the 'point of no return', beyond which the signal continues to grow in strength until finally the earth quakes! The alarm can be triggered up to 48 hours before the earthquake event, allowing authorities the opportunity to secure vulnerable infrastructure and facilities, and civilians to find a place of safety.

WHAT IS THE ADVANCED SEISMIC WARNING SYSTEM?
(And why it's completely unique!)

The system utilizes advanced radio techniques; seismic monitoring is achieved through listening to the electrical signals, or "sounds", produced by earth's tectonic activity. It's possible to observe the activity both visually and through literally listening to the sounds, exactly like a radio!



This is like tuning in to the earth's soundtrack. The melody becomes dramatic when the earth is getting ready for an upheaval! Whilst the system was operating more than several disasters were pre-detected by the system, including the massive Japan Earthquake that struck Fukushima and resulted in a nuclear meltdown!


SHOWING THE ELECTRIC VS MECHANICAL ACTIVITY OF EARTH


Here Eric Dollard presents a chart showing electrical activity (in black) versus the mechanical seismic event (in red) and it shows very clearly there is now a successfully engineered  way to predict earthquakes hours and days in advance from electrical activity but Eric needs your help to take it further and fully develop a commercial system.


The picture above shows an actual earth signal which is used by the system to detect earthquakes days in advance!


The video above demonstrates what these electrical signals from the earth and ionosphere sound like when processed and filtered into a frequency range audible to the human ear. 


  A NON PROFIT SCIENTIFIC ORGANISATION


EPD Laboratories, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) registered non-profit scientific organisation run by electrical and radio engineer and scientist Eric P. Dollard (http://ericpdollard.com). He's supported in the lab and field by John Polakowski and Justin Miller.

Eric gained his electrical and radio engineering training during his experiences at Bell Telephone Labs, R.C.A. (Radio Corporation Of America) and the U.S. Navy earlier in life, and since the late 80's has presented and written many lectures and books on the theory of electricity, radio, and transmission structures. He has since become somewhat of a celebrity due to their spread and popularity on the internet.

EPD Laboratories is also working in cooperation with the local government agencies. 


DETECTION COULD PREVENT ANOTHER NUCLEAR MELTDOWN


Earthquake prediction 48 hours ahead is an important technological advance and the first step in preventing repeats of events such as that at Tepco, Fukushima. Had the nuclear power station been given a sufficient warning of an impending earthquake and possible Tsunami from an instrumentation such as the advanced seismic warning system, then the nuclear reactor could have been taken offline, and more than just many lives saved but hundreds of billions of dollars could have been saved too!

We propose that this technology can prevent other serious disasters as a result of earthquakes and tsunamis. Please listen! The ongoing continuation of this project just can't happen without your help!



PRE-DETECTED DISASTERS

The above charts were recorded at Eric's Landers monitoring station in California, which unfortunately was lost due to financial difficulties. The station was put up for sale and was eventually sold off piece by piece. This is what we are working towards rebuilding and we really need your help to do it.


THE TECHNOLOGY - ORIGINS

The technology is based on the work of Nikola Tesla and Ernst Alexanderson, and is the culmination of three decades of research and development by Eric Dollard. It was originally conceived as a NAVY submarine communication system.

The earth's electrical signals are received by several large and extremely sensitive antenna fields located in the Nevada desert. Rather than being a reactive system like traditional seismographs which respond to the vibration during or after the earthquake, this system is predictive!

Instead of mere minutes to prepare or find safety, a warning can be issued with up to 48 HOURS notice!


CAMPAIGN GOALS

We're campaigning for at least $77,701 in order to bring this project up to the point of public demonstration by late 2015 to early 2016. The specific costs to complete this phase of work have been determined to be as follows:

  • The US Department of the Interior and an university in the state of Nevada very kindly donated an underground mine fully equipped with a mechanical seismograph, offering many further opportunities for scientific research - $1,000 - Seismic Mine Insurance
  • The lab floor is awash with parts and equipment. We need to tidy up so we can organise our inventory and dismantle old equipment to reclaim useful parts - $3,000 - U-Line Industrial Shelving
  • We need to install between 20 and 40 ground rods, each to a depth of 10 to 30 metres. For this task we need special ground drilling equipment which is normally used for drilling water wells - $4,000 - Hydra-Drill from DeepRock Manufacturing
  • We've found an used Lines Truck, which is a truck that's specially designed for manoeuvring and installing telephone poles, as well as drilling the holes. We currently dig each hole by hand, and use a combination of ropes and Eric's 1981 Toyota Corolla to manipulate and erect the poles for the antenna field. This truck will save countless hours of work - $4,000 - Used Lines Truck
  • The antenna fields cover many square miles and are spread out over a large area in the Nevada desert, so getting around to do the work uses a lot of fuel. We also receive and acquire a lot of disused and unwanted equipment through donation which requires transporting back to the lab - $5,000 - 1 Year Travel Expenses
  • Several poles in the antenna field are damage and need to be repaired or replaced - $5,000 - Remaining Poles & Insulators
  • Loading networks consisting of coils and capacitors are used for the antenna line terminating hardware. There are 20 sections and 20 loading networks. The loading coils also require specialised cases to protect them from the elements - $7,500 - Loading Network
  • Running costs for the lab include tax, insurance and utilities - $8,520 - 1 Year Building Expenses
  • We need tools and many components to assemble all the equipment, as well as meters for testing and measuring parameters - $10,000 - Tools, Meters & Components
  • Since beginning to operate, EPD Labs has been paying rent to the original benefactor of the building, David Wittekind. By paying off the balance that remains from the $59,000 paid so far, the building will become under the legal ownership of EPD Labs and we will no longer have to pay monthly rent - $29,681 - Principal Balance Owed For The Building


A view of the antenna lines. The seismic mine is among the mountains towards the left.

WORK IN PROGRESS

Last year we successfully raised over $25,000 through Indiegogo, some of which went towards a bond to secure the use of government land for the project. The remainder was used to accomplish over $100,000 worth of work on the receiving antenna fields, which included wiring up the antenna system and erecting telephone poles on location in the Nevada desert. We also managed to get our hands on a number of disused telephone poles, crossarms, insulators, many miles of wire, and other goodies essential for the project, all at no cost! We've also gained support and interest from the local municipality and universities.

*ATTENTION!* Some of you donated last year but didn't leave your address to receive your perks. Please get in touch with us so that we can send them out to you.


Eric demonstrates reception of AM radio from the ground through a part of the Advanced Seismic Warning System antenna structure:

 

In the Nevada desert - Eric Dollard working on a section of the antenna field

If you would like more information or to see more pictures of progress please feel free to check out Eric's blog entries:

http://ericpdollard.com/2014/06/22/transmission-system-structure-a52-e/

http://ericpdollard.com/2014/06/22/transmission-system-structure-a52-e-beginning-of-the-project/

http://ericpdollard.com/2014/06/22/transmission-system-structure-a52-w-beginning-of-the-project/

http://ericpdollard.com/2014/06/23/the-landers-facility-of-eric-dollard-and-walter-deroche/

Watch Eric give a lecture on the history and theory of electricity: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TttHkDRuyZw


THE CONSEQUENCES OF UNDETECTED EARTHQUAKES

With your help we can save countless lives and prevent catastrophic unnatural disasters from happening as a secondary effect, causing further damage to property and the environment.

What if the Fukushima reactor could have been secured before disaster struck? What if gas pipelines and electrical transmission lines could be shut down before an earthquake in order to prevent gas leaks, explosions, and further destruction of essential infrastructure and property?

This system makes it possible, and with your support we can prevent similar disasters from ever happening again. The only hurdle is money! How much is a million lives worth?

Wrong place at the wrong time? Not with your support!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you have any doubts about contributing to the campaign, please consider helping through sharing this page with your friends and family. Success depends on getting the word out and letting the world know that this technology exists! Together we can bring it into service for humanity. We appreciate all your support!

"THANK YOU FOR HELPING ME SHARE MY EARTHQUAKE DETECTION SYSTEM WITH THE WORLD" - Eric Dollard, Engineer, EPD Laboratories, Inc.

story:
THE QUEST:

     After being diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes on April 2, 2014, I missed only one weekend of racing. I competed in 50 races that season and was ranked the 7th best criterium rider in the country, 1st in PA, and the top 35-plus rider in America according to USA cycling. 
 

     My entire life, I rode my bike out of sticky situations, so coming up against a challenge like this was nothing new to me.

LIFE BEFORE THE DAWN OF DIABETES:

     My cycling career took me out of Reading, PA and around the world before I was 25.
     Beginning in the late 90’s I started racing pro mountain bikes all over America. In 2002, I jumped onto the international circuit, road racing with the US National Team all over Europe. In 2003, I landed a contract with Sportsbook.com’s  Pro cycling team and competed with some of the best riders and in some of the hardest races in the world. I rode the wave of professional cycling to some of the top ranked teams in America, such as Rite Aid and Battley Harley-Davidson. By the end of the 2013 season I started to feel fatigued. I thought I was just tired from racing the entire road and cyclocross season on my own as the one-man Team Skyline, but what I thought was fatigue turned out to be late onset Type 1 Diabetes. 

THE DIAGNOSIS AND A NEW WAY:

     After winning a few preseason races with a 500 blood glucose level, I fell over one day. A doctor was able to see me right away and ordered a set of blood tests. I almost didn’t even get the tests, because my health insurance wouldn’t cover it, but my girlfriend insisted. The tests revealed I had Type 1 Diabetes, along with a skyrocketed blood glucose level and a dangerous A1C. I was admitted into the hospital immediately, treated with insulin, and eventually released. 

     From there I had to quickly figure out how to control my BG levels on my own. I acquired all the best pumps and meters as I could afford to help me function as competitively as possible. State-of-the-art diabetes technology isn’t cheap, especially for a bike racer with limited finances and basic healthcare coverage, but I managed to get a system going and returned to racing once again.

NEW ATTITUDE/ FRESH RESULTS:

   After winning a few races with diabetes, it didn’t take long for Team Novo Nordisk, an all diabetic cycling team, to take notice. They offered me a spot on their team and gave me a place to live in Atlanta, where I had the opportunity to work with their doctors and resources. This was something I could not pass up. I loaded my car and drove to Atlanta, testing Team Skyline's sustainability. I knew I wanted the club to be around long after I was gone, but I didn’t expect to step away from the brand so soon. 

     I competed in 26 races with Team Novo Nordisk, placing in the top 5 fifteen times and winning several races. I was the most successful rider on the team by far. Yet, surprisingly, the team rejected me for a 2015 contract, telling me I was too old. This didn't stop me.

     Meanwhile, I was four months into a clinical trial study, and preparing for the final dose of the mystery drug, I learned that one of the other subjects suffered atrial fibrillation on his last dose. I remember the day when he coded and all the doctors and nurses left me in the room to sleep for a few hours. After hearing what happened to the last guy, I still went through with my final dose. I was the only one to survive the testing with no complications. 

2015 ASPIRATIONS AND STRATEGY:

       The goal for the 2015 season is to continue to build Team Skyline into a community minded cycling club with a Jr. development team, women’s team, masters team, and an elite team, with a total of 75 riders for its inaugural year. With the trial coming to a close I am looking towards my next goal of competing in the 2015 National Criterium Championship, or NCC Series. I’m planning on using all the latest and greatest diabetic supplies to help preserve my pancreas and stay in the honeymoon phase of diabetes. 

        I want to use my racing and struggle to promote myself as a community minded inspirational athlete with dynamic and inspirational speaking abilities. I want to slowly make the transition from pro cyclist to telling my story about diabetes. I’d like to be an inspiration to help people overcome this disease that is affecting so many Americans, with emphasis on the youth. In the support of diabetes, I plan on donating all my prize money from the 2015 season to the JDRF foundation, the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation. 
       I’m going to need support from all my friends and fellow diabetics to perform at the highest level of racing in the US. 

       I developed Team Skyline into a top level elite racing team. Kyle Wamsley, a former top level pro racer and ex teammate, is coming out of retirement to help with the cause. Garrett Olsen, a Boeing engineer, is on leave from his career to help the cause and David Dawson is our development rider; fresh out of college with a engineering degree, committed to racing before he enters the engineering world. With these riders by my side and the support of others, I’m going to give my best to show how much you can do with diabetes.
     Thank you for your consideration in donating to the “Winning the Race With Diabetes Fund”. Our goal is to raise $100,000 to support the team, the mission, and to get us to races where we can inspire people with diabetes to not stop living the life they dreamed of.
Regards, 

Team Skyline CEO Ryan DeWald

story: The Douglas Tennis Club is located in the tiny farming district of Douglas, in Western Victoria.  The tennis courts are currently in a hazardous state.  All three courts are full of cracks and holes and are too unsafe for players. Unless we can have the courts redone, the Douglas Tennis Club will have to fold.  The tennis club is the only sporting club in Douglas and provides an important social and physical outlet for community members.  The club is virtually the only source of social interaction for the Douglas community, which also extends to interaction with the wider community amongst other tennis clubs.  Having this club continue will mean access to sporting activities for the community which may otherwise be inaccessible since Douglas is located in such a rural and remote area.  All of the tennis members and casual fill-ins are very keen for the club to continue. The club has a strong local focus with a number of juniors who will support the club in the coming years. This club is a source of community pride, but without resurfacing the courts will remain unused and in a state of disrepair.  The Douglas community has pulled together and raised over $17,000 for this project and donated over $17,000 worth of time and materials.  We were also fortunate to receive a local government grant in the amount of $33,000.  This is enough to resurface two of the courts but we feel it is important to have all three courts resurfaced.  This is so that our club can remain in a competitive league and also have the possibility to use the third court for junior play.  We need just $16,000 more to complete this project and ensure the future of the Douglas Tennis Club.

story:
KREATE A PET

LOVABLE PETS YOU CREATE

Kreate a Pet is a stuffed animal that has removable and attachable parts that can be attached anywhere on the animal.  The parts have a small “hook” patch that allows them to stick anywhere on the animal’s “loop” fabric, similar to Velcro.  Kids can stick an ear on the leg, put a wing on the head, or put them anywhere on the Kreate a Pet.  No glue, no pins, no hard parts, no sockets, no magnets, and no mess – just soft parts to place anywhere on the animal.

         

Katarina, who is 12 years old, is a creative child who invented and designed Kreate a Pet when she was only 10.  

In her words:

"I have owned over a 1,000 stuffed animals since I was a baby.  I often wanted to change the parts around on them to create my own animals that were funny, cute, or weird but I never wanted to cut them up.  So I thought: How could I do it?"   

"Then one day I was playing with Velcro, the light bulb went off and I began the first Kreate a Pet design and soon after my company was formed, Kat's Toys, LLC."

"Every kid who has seen and played with the Kreate a Pet loves it so much and wants to play with it over and over.  Many parents feel that it is educational and want their children to have something to play with other than video games.  I am so happy to have this opportunity to share my invention with all the kids of the world."


Katarina's father, Richard Mathews, a seasoned business owner and executive, is leading the company's efforts to bring this exciting and fun new toy to a worldwide market.  


                         Katarina and her Dad, Richard Mathews


To date, we have designed the first 2 products and filed applicable patents and are now in full production of the Kreate a Pet and Stikkie Board (described below). We have products for sale in several toy stores in Southern California. Additionally we just signed with a top Sales Representative firm to bring the products to many more stores in the Western states.  We plan to expand our marketing and sales efforts thru representation and distribution nationwide and worldwide.  

We also launched our website, www.kreateapet.com to begin online sales and promotion.  Finally, we produced a professional online commercial for the Kreate a Pet and Stikkie Board toys that can be viewed on our website, as well as on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5m0Fy-ydHE.  

                              

Our products have worldwide market potential and they have no gender, racial, ethnic, or cultural barriers.  We are also designing additional Kreate a Pet models including dinosaurs, monsters, birds, fish, insects, and even cars, airplanes, and boats...all with the same concept of sticking the parts anywhere on the pet, airplane, or whatever.  All parts for all models will be interchange-able to allow mix and match.  Imagine a propeller on a fish or wings on a boat, or antlers on a truck!


                                                     


STIKKIE BOARDS

With Stikkie Boards you can display your Kreate a Pet and store your Stikkie Parts.

 

                       

     Kreate a Pet and Stikkie Parts STICK to the Stikkie Board


You can stick your Kreate a Pet animal onto the Stikkie Board using the little Stikkies that make the animal stick to the Stikkie Board.  The Stikkie Board can be placed almost anywhere and can be stuck to most any wall with Stikkies.


                             

The Stikkie Board is 12 inches by 12 inches by 1 inch and is very lightweight…it is only 3 ounces so it is easy for your child to play with.  It is a rigid foam board covered with a soft velour fabric.  The fabric is the same as the Kreate a Pet. 


                                                 

The Stikkie Board is 100% Made in America.  All materials within the Stikkie Board are Made in America and the product is assembled by our workers in America.


STIKKIES

Stikkies are dime size hook patches that have hook properties on either a single side or both sides. 

                       

               DIME SIZE


The double sided Stikkies allow the child to “hook” together any or many of the Kreate a Pet creatures and also allow the pet to be adhered to the Stikkie Board. 

This will allow play to include stacking and connecting any number of Kreate a Pet’s together for “piggy-back” rides, pyramids, or whatever configuration the child can create. 


                                                   


STIKKIE PARTS

Stikkie Parts are Kreate a Pet animal parts that include eyes, ears, antlers, wings, noses, mouths, trunk, and tail. 


All of the Stikkie Parts feature a hook patch that allows the part to adhere to the loop velour body fabric of the Kreate a Pet creature and the Stikkie Board. 

    


Each Kreate a Pet comes with a set of Stikkie Parts.  Additional sets of Stikkie Parts can be purchased to provide more parts for your Kreate a Pet to create ever more interesting designs.  The Stikkie Parts can also be used with the Stikkie Board to make faces or any type of design that you can imagine. Currently in design are many additional parts that will soon be available. ....making the Kreate a Pet even more fun and exciting for your child.

     


Parents

Are you tired of children playing endless video games or just watching television for hours?  Would you rather see them doing something creative?  We have the answer, introducing Kreate a Pet, the exciting new plush toy from Kat’s Toys! 

It is a stuffed animal that can be changed to be funny, weird and loveable. They can make many different animals with one Kreate a Pet and its parts.  No instructions to read, no assembly required, just hand the Kreate a Pet to a child and let the hours of fun begin…



THIS PRODUCT CONFORMS TO THE SAFETY REQUIREMENTS OF ASTM F963-11 AND IS REGISTERED UNDER THE APPLICABLE PROVISIONS OF THE PENNSYLVANIA STUFFED TOY LAW, ACT NO 372, AS AMENDED.

Our products also carry the CE Mark (European Conformity).  This certifies that our products comply with the relevant European health, safety and environmental protection directives and regulations for the European Economic Area.

AGES 4+

Kreate a Pet, the Kreate a Pet logo, all Kreate a Pet images, Stikkies, Stikkie Boards, and Stikkie Parts are trademarks or registered trademarks of Kat’s Toys LLC 2014 & 2015, all rights reserved.


PRODUCT QUALITY

We certify that our products are produced with the highest quality materials and workmanship possible.  We spent almost 3 years in product development and testing to assure that our Kreate a Pet and Stikkie Board and Stikkie Parts products would hold up to extended play for years by children.  We are determined to never release any product to the marketplace without first conducting exhaustive studies to assure the durability and longevity of our wonderful creative toys. 


FUNDING

We have done as much as we can with our limited funds to get this far.  The primary purpose of this campaign is to raise funds to increase production, seek additional distribution channels for retail sales, and for advertising and marketing including extensive marketing through online channels (i.e. SEO, SEM, social media) so we can introduce this fantastic new toy to the world.  Additionally we are planning on showing our products at the leading toy trade shows and we are researching additional sales and marketing methods including TV and print ads. 



FUNDS TO CHARITY

If we reach our goal of $30,000.00 we will donate 100 Kreate a Pets to Abused and Neglected Children's centers such as Orangewood Children's Home, Eli Home for Abused and Neglected Children and to Children's Cancer Center Treatment facilities such as St. Jude Children's Hospital and City of Hope Cancer Treatment Center.   We believe that the Kreate a Pet is not only a fun and joyful toy for children but also an educational and possibly a therapeutic tool as well for certain children suffering from disease or neglect. For every $10,000.00 raised above our goal we will donate an additional 50 Kreate a Pets.

story:
Meet Emerald Air

A complete system that monitors and cleans the air around you to protect your family from sickness and discomfort.

 It not only detects all the harmful substances released from household finishing materials, human breathing and AC, but also filters up odors, smoke, PM2.5, VOCs and allergens. Thanks to UV LED disinfection technology it kills bacteria and viruses in the air you breathe.




As seen on

                        


Emerald

 Small but powerful.


                                           

 Emerald measures the most important air parameters which affect your health and comfort.


 Plus 4 other important features:

           





Mobile app

Emerald is connected to its own mobile app that displays all your air data in real-time.
     It will alarm you when any of the parameters is exceeded and help you be sure that the air your family breathes is always clean.    


Moreover, it will tell why you slept poorly or how to be more productive in the office.

For more in-depth analysis, the Emerald App also shows you the air parameters from the last 24h and offers tips on how to improve your indoor environment.

Simple, right?


     

Click here to test the app for free:
             https://itunes.apple.com/pl/app/emerald-air/id1...
Android app will be available in July.

    Quick check    

                                    

You don't need to have your mobile with you to check your air quality. You can always do a quick check by simply touching the device to find out if your home is safe.

Green light indicates that everything is fine, while red alerts that something is not right.


 

Easy to install


 Using a special magnet sticker, easily install your Emerald in any room you want monitored. Select 1 of 8 room types and be sure that every room in your home is protected.

                 




Airadicate

The smart air purifier.


                


What’s smart about the Emerald Air system?

An Emerald sensor alarm about your home’s low air quality automatically triggers the Airadicate purifier which then goes to work to filter up and eradicate airborne threats.

               

Unique technology


Airadicate kills all the viruses, bacteria and mold in the air with LED UV-C disinfection. It also filters up odors, smoke, PM2.5, VOCs, and allergens.




Airadicate has 3 built-in advanced composite filters which each providing 4-stage filtration: preliminary, anti-allergy, HEPA and carbon. The filters last up to 1 year so no need to worry about frequent changing. Replacements cost only about $20 and you can change them yourself, hassle free.   

           

Once the filtration process is done, the Airadicate purifier then goes to work on the viruses and bacteria in your home using our advanced LED UV-C disinfection technology.

     Airadicate has a powerful built-in 120x120mm fan which delivers 150 m3/h of airflow. One device covers up to 25 square meters (270 square feet), about the size of an average room.

            

Why we created Emerald Air?

     

Every day, we take more than 20,000 breaths.

We spend up to 90% of our lives indoors, 

where the air can be 8 to 10 times more polluted than outside.

Today, more than 300 million people suffer from asthma or allergies.

 Air pollution is responsible for 5.5 million deaths around the world each year.

Now you have a weapon to protect your loved ones from indoor air pollution that causes asthma, allergies, sickness and discomfort.

              


Our Journey

 

Over the past year, our team has been working extremely hard interviewing customers, designing, prototyping, coding and testing. 

     After countless tests in our lab, 

we’ve built 7 prototypes as the final version of Emerald


and compared it to Tiger, a $7,000 VOC detector. As you can see below, the lines are directly correlated. 


    Thanks to our unique algorithms, Emerald is even 30% more sensitive to VOCs.  

                                               

Where are we now?


    We have recently completed the PVT (Production Validation Test), which involves manufacturing, assembling and testing. We've selected experienced manufacturing partners that have built and shipped millions of devices and are ready to do it again with Emerald.

 
Now we are ready to start mass production.    
 The only thing left is to raise our goal to get it going.


 Why Indiegogo?   


When building a product that addresses something as important as health, we didn't want to build it in silence, hidden away somewhere in a lab.
Your support will be the signal for us to go ahead with manufacturing and to start making your home a safer place, one Emerald Air at a time.

 

       Perks       


Timeline


                                        


Emerald Air in social media

Do you like Emerald Air?

    Please, help us spread the word!

  Facebook | Twitter | Instagram

  For more information visit our website: http://www.emeraldair.co


Emerald team

   

We are an experienced team of designers, engineers, and operations experts.

 We aim to design the best product that helps people live smarter and healthier.


Risks and challenges


Creating hardware is harder than hard!

 But we live for such challenges, and we’ll continue to build excellent products to keep you and your family happy and healthy! That said, there are still risks associated with manufacturing, testing and shipping a physical product.

To limit these risks, we have contracted manufacturing partners that have produced countless consumer electronics products and are fully capable of scaling our business. What’s more, they are located within a 20 min drive from our HQ, which enables us to closely oversee production and immediately deal with any issues that may appear.

On the other end, we have selected experienced logistics partners to ensure that shipping goes smoothly and on time.

If any unexpected difficulties arise, we will be in the best position to remedy the situation, and of course, we will keep you informed.

We really appreciate your support and can’t wait to get your Emerald Air systems to you!


FAQ


Who should buy Emerald Air?

It’s for anyone and everyone who cares about their health and well-being. We rarely realize how indoor air affects our health. Breathing in even small amounts of harmful substances causes headaches, lowers productivity, leads to asthma or allergies, and even increases the risk of cancer - and you don’t even know when it happens. That’s why we have created Emerald Air - to help you see what’s invisible and give you a chance to protect your family from sickness and discomfort.


Technical Questions


How small is Emerald and how much does it weigh?

Emerald measures 2.1x2.1x0.6 inch (55x55x15mm) and only weighs 3.45 ounces (98 grams).


What are the ambient operating conditions of Emerald?

The ambient temperature range is from 41°F (5°C) to 149°F (65°C), and the relative humidity range is from 0-95%.


How does Emerald measure air quality?

Emerald measures air pollution in real time, detecting a wide range of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs). It alerts you when your home or office air becomes not safe.


How often does Emerald take an update its air measurements?

Emerald takes measurements of its environment once every minute when you are at home. When you’re out, Emerald does it every 15 minutes and then displays the results in a chart on the mobile app to give you the picture of the last 24 hours. But you can also choose a mode that on demand takes measurements every 3s.


Does Emerald have its dedicated mobile app?

Of course! We have created a mobile app for iOS 9+ and Android 4.3+ devices with Bluetooth Low Energy support. You can download it already from the App Store and Google Play


Is the Emerald Air mobile app free?

Absolutely! The Emerald Air app is free to use, and there are no additional subscriptions. We also provide free software updates, so that your Emeralds get even smarter over time.


How many Emeralds can you connect to the mobile app?

You can connect up to 5 emeralds to your mobile app.


Will the app also have the temperature in Fahrenheit, inHg for barometric pressure measurement and a 12-hour clock?
Yes, it can be configured to Celsius/Fahrenheit, hPa/inHg and a 12/24-hour clock.  


Will there be continued support/updates for the app?

Yes! We have a long roadmap for new features and are committed to perfecting the system. If you have any suggestions, please contact our team.


Do Emerald sensors require an Internet connection?

Emerald sensors can send your data directly to your iOS or Android smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy, so you don’t need to be connected to the internet.


Can you use Emerald without a smartphone?

Yes, you can touch the Emerald logo on the case. The device will then do a quick measurement and light up green or red depending on the air quality. Green - everything is ok, but red means that something is wrong with your environment, and you need to consult your mobile app. The Airadicate purifier can work autonomously even without the app or the Emerald sensor.


Can you get phone alerts about your environment?

Yes, you receive notifications in the mobile app if a problem appears along with a description and tips & tricks on how to fix it in the easiest way.


Is Emerald powered by a battery?

Emerald has a built-in 1000 mAh rechargeable battery which you’ll need to recharge just a few times per year (depending on usage). You can recharge your Emerald with any standard certified micro-USB mobile charger that you use for your phone. A micro USB cable is also included with every product.


How long will the battery last?

Battery lifetime depends on how often Emerald makes its measurements. If you choose to take measurements once per minute, the battery will last about 30 days on a single charge. 


How much space can one Emerald and Airadicate cover?

One Emerald and one Airadicate device can cover up to 270 square feet (25 square meters). Generally, one Emerald per room in your home is enough. Remember to place your Emerald at the height of 5.2-5.9ft (1.6-1.8m) in the rooms where you spend most of your time.


Is Emerald Air waterproof?

Emerald Air was designed to enable good airflow to the sensors inside the casing, so it cannot be waterproof at the same time. Please keep it away from water or humid places.


Is Emerald calibrated?

Each device will go through calibration and tests on our production line before it gets shipped to you.


Where is Emerald Air made?

Emerald Air is fully designed and manufactured in Poland, in the heart of Europe. We have established partnerships with manufacturers and suppliers 20 min away from our HQ based in Wroclaw.



Shipping


When will Emerald Air be shipped?

We will start shipping the Super Early Bird Emeralds in September 2016 or faster, depending on the volume of production. In case of any shipping delays, we’ll keep you updated regarding the shipping status, so you’ll always know when you will be getting your Emerald.


Where can you get Emerald Air shipped to?

The European Union, the United States and Canada.


Where is Emerald Air shipped from?

We’ll ship your Emerald Air from Wroclaw, Poland (EU). We use a reliable shipping provider to ensure fast, trackable and safe delivery everywhere. Additional customs and sales taxes might apply while buying from outside of the EU, depending on your country.


Can I change my shipping address after I pledged?

Yes, after the campaign is over and as we get the first batch of Emeralds ready, we will send you an exit survey to confirm all the information. Then you can change your shipping address.


How can I lower my shipping costs?

International shipping costs outside of Europe tend to be high. That’s why we advise bundling your Emerald purchases with friends to cut shipping expenses in half or more. Plus remember, sharing is caring!


Customer Support


How can I reach the Emerald team if I have a question or need technical support?

We can’t wait to hear from you in the comments section! You can also email us directly at mateusz@emeraldair.co


I am a distributor, how can I contact you?

For our contact info, please visit our website www.emeraldair.co or send an e-mail to mateusz@emeraldair.co


Can I upgrade my perk?

You can do so in the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information here: 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
