Airadicate has 3 built-in advanced composite filters which each providing 4-stage filtration: preliminary, anti-allergy, HEPA and carbon. The filters last up to 1 year so no need to worry about frequent changing. Replacements cost only about $20 and you can change them yourself, hassle free.   
           

Once the filtration process is done, the Airadicate purifier then goes to work on the viruses and bacteria in your home using our advanced LED UV-C disinfection technology.     Airadicate has a powerful built-in 120x120mm fan which delivers 150 m3/h of airflow. One device covers up to 25 square meters (270 square feet), about the size of an average room.

            
Why we created Emerald Air?


     

Every day, we take more than 20,000 breaths.
We spend up to 90% of our lives indoors, 
where the air can be 8 to 10 times more polluted than outside.
Today, more than 300 million people suffer from asthma or allergies.
 Air pollution is responsible for 5.5 million deaths around the world each year.
Now you have a weapon to protect your loved ones from indoor air pollution that causes asthma, allergies, sickness and discomfort.
              


Our Journey
 
Over the past year, our team has been working extremely hard interviewing customers, designing, prototyping, coding and testing. 





     After countless tests in our lab, 




we’ve built 7 prototypes as the final version of Emerald



and compared it to Tiger, a $7,000 VOC detector. As you can see below, the lines are directly correlated. 






    Thanks to our unique algorithms, Emerald is even 30% more sensitive to VOCs.  


                                               


Where are we now?

    We have recently completed the PVT (Production Validation Test), which involves manufacturing, assembling and testing. We've selected experienced manufacturing partners that have built and shipped millions of devices and are ready to do it again with Emerald.

 

Now we are ready to start mass production.    
 The only thing left is to raise our goal to get it going.


 Why Indiegogo?   



When building a product that addresses something as important as health, we didn't want to build it in silence, hidden away somewhere in a lab.


Your support will be the signal for us to go ahead with manufacturing and to start making your home a safer place, one Emerald Air at a time.


 

       Perks       





Timeline


                                        




Emerald Air in social media

Do you like Emerald Air?
    Please, help us spread the word!

  Facebook | Twitter | Instagram
  For more information visit our website: http://www.emeraldair.co

Emerald team







   We are an experienced team of designers, engineers, and operations experts.
 We aim to design the best product that helps people live smarter and healthier.





Risks and challenges




Creating hardware is harder than hard! 
  But we live for such challenges, and we’ll continue to build excellent products to keep you and your family happy and healthy! That said, there are still risks associated with manufacturing, testing and shipping a physical product.
To limit these risks, we have contracted manufacturing partners that have produced countless consumer electronics products and are fully capable of scaling our business. What’s more, they are located within a 20 min drive from our HQ, which enables us to closely oversee production and immediately deal with any issues that may appear. 
On the other end, we have selected experienced logistics partners to ensure that shipping goes smoothly and on time.
If any unexpected difficulties arise, we will be in the best position to remedy the situation, and of course, we will keep you informed.We really appreciate your support and can’t wait to get your Emerald Air systems to you!



FAQ



Who should buy Emerald Air?
It’s for anyone and everyone who cares about their health and well-being. We rarely realize how indoor air affects our health. Breathing in even small amounts of harmful substances causes headaches, lowers productivity, leads to asthma or allergies, and even increases the risk of cancer - and you don’t even know when it happens. That’s why we have created Emerald Air - to help you see what’s invisible and give you a chance to protect your family from sickness and discomfort.

Technical Questions

How small is Emerald and how much does it weigh?
Emerald measures 2.1x2.1x0.6 inch (55x55x15mm) and only weighs 3.45 ounces (98 grams).

What are the ambient operating conditions of Emerald?
The ambient temperature range is from 41°F (5°C) to 149°F (65°C), and the relative humidity range is from 0-95%.



How does Emerald measure air quality?
Emerald measures air pollution in real time, detecting a wide range of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs). It alerts you when your home or office air becomes not safe.

How often does Emerald take an update its air measurements?
Emerald takes measurements of its environment once every minute when you are at home. When you’re out, Emerald does it every 15 minutes and then displays the results in a chart on the mobile app to give you the picture of the last 24 hours. But you can also choose a mode that on demand takes measurements every 3s.

Does Emerald have its dedicated mobile app?
Of course! We have created a mobile app for iOS 9+ and Android 4.3+ devices with Bluetooth Low Energy support. You can download it already from the App Store and Google Play

Is the Emerald Air mobile app free?
Absolutely! The Emerald Air app is free to use, and there are no additional subscriptions. We also provide free software updates, so that your Emeralds get even smarter over time.


How many Emeralds can you connect to the mobile app?
You can connect up to 5 emeralds to your mobile app.


Will the app also have the temperature in Fahrenheit, inHg for barometric pressure measurement and a 12-hour clock?

Yes, it can be configured to Celsius/Fahrenheit, hPa/inHg and a 12/24-hour clock.  

Will there be continued support/updates for the app?

Yes! We have a long roadmap for new features and are committed to perfecting the system. If you have any suggestions, please contact our team.

Do Emerald sensors require an Internet connection?
Emerald sensors can send your data directly to your iOS or Android smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy, so you don’t need to be connected to the internet.

Can you use Emerald without a smartphone?
Yes, you can touch the Emerald logo on the case. The device will then do a quick measurement and light up green or red depending on the air quality. Green - everything is ok, but red means that something is wrong with your environment, and you need to consult your mobile app. The Airadicate purifier can work autonomously even without the app or the Emerald sensor.

Can you get phone alerts about your environment?
Yes, you receive notifications in the mobile app if a problem appears along with a description and tips & tricks on how to fix it in the easiest way.


Is Emerald powered by a battery?
Emerald has a built-in 1000 mAh rechargeable battery which you’ll need to recharge just a few times per year (depending on usage). You can recharge your Emerald with any standard certified micro-USB mobile charger that you use for your phone. A micro USB cable is also included with every product.

How long will the battery last?
Battery lifetime depends on how often Emerald makes its measurements. If you choose to take measurements once per minute, the battery will last about 30 days on a single charge. 

How much space can one Emerald and Airadicate cover?
One Emerald and one Airadicate device can cover up to 270 square feet (25 square meters). Generally, one Emerald per room in your home is enough. Remember to place your Emerald at the height of 5.2-5.9ft (1.6-1.8m) in the rooms where you spend most of your time.

Is Emerald Air waterproof?
Emerald Air was designed to enable good airflow to the sensors inside the casing, so it cannot be waterproof at the same time. Please keep it away from water or humid places.

Is Emerald calibrated?
Each device will go through calibration and tests on our production line before it gets shipped to you.

Where is Emerald Air made?
Emerald Air is fully designed and manufactured in Poland, in the heart of Europe. We have established partnerships with manufacturers and suppliers 20 min away from our HQ based in Wroclaw.


Shipping


When will Emerald Air be shipped?
We will start shipping the Super Early Bird Emeralds in September 2016 or faster, depending on the volume of production. In case of any shipping delays, we’ll keep you updated regarding the shipping status, so you’ll always know when you will be getting your Emerald.

Where can you get Emerald Air shipped to?
The European Union, the United States and Canada.

Where is Emerald Air shipped from?

We’ll ship your Emerald Air from Wroclaw, Poland (EU). We use a reliable shipping provider to ensure fast, trackable and safe delivery everywhere. Additional customs and sales taxes might apply while buying from outside of the EU, depending on your country.


Can I change my shipping address after I pledged?
Yes, after the campaign is over and as we get the first batch of Emeralds ready, we will send you an exit survey to confirm all the information. Then you can change your shipping address.

How can I lower my shipping costs?
International shipping costs outside of Europe tend to be high. That’s why we advise bundling your Emerald purchases with friends to cut shipping expenses in half or more. Plus remember, sharing is caring!

Customer Support

How can I reach the Emerald team if I have a question or need technical support?

We can’t wait to hear from you in the comments section! You can also email us directly at mateusz@emeraldair.co

I am a distributor, how can I contact you?
For our contact info, please visit our website www.emeraldair.co or send an e-mail to mateusz@emeraldair.co

Can I upgrade my perk?
You can do so in the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information here: 
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk

story:
My Story

Hi, I am Bettina, founder of Experience the Challenge LLC DBA Hang Xtreme. I am a resident of this area since 1995 and my husband is a  25 year local fire fighter. This adventure was born out of my passion for children & young adults and the desire to introduce a unique fitness experience to our area. With the support of my husband and 2 high school children, I want to introduce our community to a fun and exciting self challenging sport. I want to give our community a place to make working out and getting fit fun and accessible to most everyone using an extreme adventure based sport - indoor rock climbing. 


For the past year and a half I have been actively climbing in our community utilizing my mobile rock climbing wall. I have seen first hand that there is a need for self challenging sports and the interest is real. An indoor rock climbing facility would make a tremendous positive impact on our community.  

Education is another important area that I focus on. Utilizing my rock climbing wall I offer the following programs. 

My plan is to launch phase II and move Hang Xtreme indoor. It will be Southwest Florida’s premier indoor rock climbing facility. In order to bring it all together I am in need of funds for the manufacture of the rock wall, the corresponding equipment and the renovation of the facility. I am an entrepreneur by trade, but in my heart I enjoy helping children and young adults build their confidence, educate them on fitness and inspire them to "experience the challenges" of their life. By opening an indoor rock climbing facility I hope to inspire, enthuse and support our community. It is a sport that our community can enjoy! There are so many benefits to making it happen and with your contributions, together, we can do it!!!

Experience the Challenge's Mission

To create a modern indoor rock climbing and community recreation facility for the greater Southwest Florida area that serves the adventure, fitness and recreation needs of local and regional organizations, families and individuals while promoting an active and healthy lifestyle for the community. 

What is Needed & How it Will be Used

In order to open an indoor rock climbing facility, I need to raise $500,000 that would go toward manufacturing the 10,000 square feet of rock wall, all rock climbing equipment and supplies, and the renovation of a leased space. Our demographic study suggested our most successful location will be in the Estero/South Fort Myers area.

Estimate of Allocation of Funds

  • Rock Wall Construction 60% (Once the leased space is confirmed, this cost will be adjusted accordingly)
  • Rock Wall Equipment & Supplies 15%
  • Renovation of Leased Space, 7,000 - 10,000 square feet 25%

If we don't completely reach our goal we will move forward with a smaller climbing model (stationary pre-manufactured auto-belay climbing components) and utilize that for a growth plan into a traditional indoor climbing facility. If, with the funds raised, neither is possible, your donation will be personally refunded (less processing fees).

This Indoor Rock Climbing Facility is For You!!

I am really building this indoor rock climbing facility for you! I want to share my passion for fitness and total well-being with all of you. I am wholeheartedly dedicated to giving you a fun, unique, and self challenging fitness experience in a fun adventure based environment. 

Friends, I so enjoy Southwest Florida and my family and I are blessed to call this place home! We love the community and culture that it creates and are super excited to be adding something wholesome and exciting to the community. With your help we will have a dedicated space to continue to grow our programs and to continue to encourage and support one another. Hang Xtreme is more then just fitness, its a community of fitness lovers. As a small startup I need your support, I need the love and support of the Southwest Florida community…I can't do it without you!! 

The Positive Benefits for Our Community 

The facility will combine adventure and recreation elements in a fun and welcoming environment that will truly have something for everyone.
  • Adventure Programming
  • Community Recreation
  • Pay-to-Play Recreation
  • Skill-Building Clinics
  • Team Building Events
  • Homeschool Fitness
  • Youth Development Programs & Activities
  • STEM Curriculum
  • After school programs
  • Youth Groups & Summer Camps
  • Corporate & Special Events 
  • Birthday Parties
  • Special Needs Recreation

The Impact

Through this project and with your help, I wish to assist in the development of healthy lifestyles and to create a welcoming atmosphere for youth, adult, and family participation, as well as making a positive impact on the local economy.

Our community has so many wonderful charities and I am also passionate about using the indoor rock climbing facility to raise awareness for these organizations.  As I currently offer fundraising, continued fundraising and scholarships will be a component of the business model.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help in any way you can...no effort is too big or small!! All effort is greatly appreciated. Share my campaign with your friends on social media and SPREAD THE WORD!! I know the power of word of mouth…I would not be where I am today without it!!

Documents with further information for your review:

Presentation Summary for Indoor Rock Climbing Facility

Who is the Sports Facility Advisory? (www.sportadvisory.com) or PDF

Presentation Slides  or PDF

story:
Witwoobox is a monthly bridal, beauty and lifestyle subscription box. It's pretty simple really. We'll deliver a box of sought-after makeup, skincare, haircare, nail care and fragrance products along with the best beauty practises, wedding inspiration, tips and the best suppliers to help plan that special day, which are beautifully packaged and posted to you each month.

Each month we will deliver a selection of beauty treats that offer a mini pampering service for brides-to-be in the comfort of their own home. Included will be a mini handbook featuring beauty tips, wedding planning tips and the best wedding suppliers to help the bride-to-be plan her dream wedding.  It will be beautifully packed in an eye catching illustrated box that will leave her looking and feeling great during a stressful time.

Weddings are expensive and each bride to be spends a fortune trying different skincare and cosmetics leading up to her wedding, so we created a new way for brides to be to trial products without it costing a fortune.

Our vision is to target newly engaged women who are looking to try a wide range of beauty products and find ones suitable for them without sacrificing their budget. 

It's a surprise, but we can tell you that we're working on some amazing collaborations with well known brands and designers. Every month you'll get carefully selected  beauty and lifestyle products, gifts and our small magazine featuring beauty tips, wedding inspiration, real wedding features and the best suppliers in the wedding industry that will help you plan the perfect day.

 Items could include: 

  • Notebooks
  • Candles
  • Jewellery
  • Wedding Decorations
  • Lifestyle Items
  • A mini booklet describing what is in the box plus beauty tips and wedding inspiration.

The items will be packed into a beautiful illustrated box and delivered to your door. The first box (our launch box) will be delivered in July.

We are really exciting about Witwoobox and we hope you'll join us in our new adventure.

We have been in the wedding industry for over 9 years and love being part of someone's special day. We wanted to create a gift that brides to be could receive every month on her doorstep to put that smile on her face during that stressful time, and just like that our idea was born! 
We're extremely passionate about the industry and have gained some amazing knowledge through years of experience in the wedding and beauty industry to be able to use and make Witwoobox thrive and be successful. We have received some amazing feedback from professionals within the industry who love the bridal subscription box and your contribution will help us achieve our dream and to launch the business. 

We're reaching out to Indiegogo hoping you'll join our Witwoobox journey and be one of the first to sign up for our subscription box! Our website will be launching in May 2016 so we would love to hear your ideas and what you would like to see in our box. You will also be able to gift your bridesmaids a 'Will You Be My Maid' box and we are looking into honeymoon boxes and other gift areas such as mother of the bride/groom boxes.

What We Need 

We have turned to Indiegogo.com to reach out to you to raise £10,000 in pre-orders for Witwoobox sales and to also gain feedback from potential customers.

We plan to use the funds we raise to:

  • Purchase the boxes and products
  • Develop our website, which is currently under construction
  • Market Witwoobox in magazines 
  • Attend The National Wedding Show this Autumn where we will need to produce 3,000 boxes and products 

Risks & Challenges

We have most of our gifts for our launch box and are currently working on our website. There maybe a slight delay in launching the website if any unexpected problems are identified during the design stage, however this will not affect our boxes being delivered to our backers in July 2016.

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd love it if you can spread the word about Witwoobox  to help our campaign and launch our company. Also don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for taking the time to look over our campaign. Remember don't get married without us!
