story:
Life need a Balance.

It is obvious that we can’t get away from our smart phone. This tiny assistance in our pocket help us from wake up call in the morning till send us to sleep with our favorite songs. However, we still need to retain human activities in order to maintain relationship, building trust and get inspire by everything around us. Therefore, the compromising way of living in this digital ages is important. We can’t either live on online or offline world. Because both world are necessary for learning, living and connecting.Therefore, Balancing is a key! and this is how lives can be balance.

Introducing "The Equalizer" smart phone.

Easy switching Mode : The first smart phone that allow you to switch easily from "Online" mode to "Offline" mode. Allow your life to be "off" and "on" on the proper time.

In an "Online" mode, The Equalizer were design based on the top 4 functions that most-used in everyday life which are web browser, phone calling, camera and email. 

You can still go to your favorite social media sites such as Facebook, Instagram or Twitter via web browser.

An "Offline" mode,

 

Tracking : all your usage are tracked to show how much time you spent on each social media and Tracking will warn you if it reach the limit that is not healthy for your life.

 Music : The best offline activity for your healthy life. Music can clam down your mind and reflect your emotion.

Synchronization mode

Life wouldn't be the same. If you have ever experienced the situation where your friends or family are playing their phone while you together and this is bothering you. Here come your solution! The equalizer were programmed to switch to "offline" mode whenever two or more devices are close together.

 

Prototype

Now we are working on sizing and design.  This is its look and feel.

Risk and Challenges

We are aware all problems that could happen on production process and  and transportation. As all new products, we have to face uncertainties and risks along the way. However, what we can do best for assuring you is the updated details on product status.And if anything happen that can cause a delay for launching, you will know it real time on our website.

story:
WHAT IS IT ?   THE ENERGY TUBER - A CROP FOR WORLD-WIDE IMPACT

A Natural Solar Panel turning CO2 into energy.  The ENERGY TUBER is an industrial-type sweetpotato  plant whose leaves act like a solar panel, to absorb the sun’s energy, and use this energy to turn CO2 out of the atmosphere into sugar and starch (carbohydrates).  The carb-ohydrate is stored in the tuber– a better way to store solar energy than a battery.  The tuber can then be processed into FUEL, FOOD, and FEED. Replacing fossil fuels with biofuels will reduce CO2 levels and other pollutants and start reversing climate change in USA and worldwide.

Wars for Oil? A need for large amounts of oil to keep all transportation moving is a major factor in US’s involvement in wars. Is the best mission for our brave men and women who serve in our military, to fight wars to keep petroleum flowing from the Middle East? We spend an average of $350 billion/year buying foreign oil, money that could creating thousands of local jobs that can’t be outsourced, and are not cyclical, like jobs in petroleum.     

CAN WE DO BETTER THAN USING FOSSIL FUELS?   

There are 3 parts to breaking our ‘addiction’ to oil.  First, making our means of transportation, like cars, trucks, planes, etc. more efficient and increasing use of mass transportation.   Progress is being made in this area, with innovations like hybrid drive trains, vehicles with stronger lighter materials, etc.  Second, the use of electric vehicles, coupled with electricity from renewable sources.   This can be a good solution for cities where distances are short, and batteries can be charged, but not practical for long distances.   The Third solution is to power our long-distance travel by cars, trucks, planes and ships, using liquid biofuels made from ‘advanced’ sustainable, renewable feedstocks.  This is being spearheaded by the military.  The US military  and others have a keen interest in biofuels as a strategic approach to readiness. The US Navy has shown a commitment to biofuels through the ‘Great Green Fleet’ to fuel their planes, ships, trucks and vehicles.  http://www.c6f.navy.mil/forces-efforts/great-green-fleet.   

Henry Ford designed the original internal combustion engine for the automobile to run on corn ethanol, and Diesel designed the diesel engine to run on peanut oil.   One of the advantages of biofuels is that they can be blended with petroleum fuels.  Gasoline blended with Ethanol has higher octane and significantly less air pollution, and Biodiesel blended with diesel reduces sulfur and other air pollution, and results in a cleaner engine.   

Ethanol from corn and sugarcane, and biodiesel from soybeans and rapeseed were the first feedstock crops to convert to biofuels. But to expand this industry, what is needed are Advanced Biofuel Feedstock crops.    The ideal biofuel crop will be higher yielding than corn and soybeans, grow on poor soils with modest inputs of water and fertilizer, and have valuable co-products, ideally food and feed products. 

Such a crop is the ENERGY TUBER, a very high yielding, industrial type of sweetpotato, that makes a bowling ball full of carbohydrates. Field and laboratory trials in multiple states have shown that the crop can produce 45 tons or more of fresh weight per acre, which at 30% carbohydrate is 13.5 tons of carbohydrate per acre. This will make 1800 to 1900 gallons of bioethanol per acre.  This compares to 300 to 400 gallons of ethanol per acre for Midwestern corn grown in good topsoil and with relatively high inputs of water, nitrogen and pesticides.  

HOW TO GET FUEL, FOOD AND FEED, FROM THE SAME ACRE?

Parties with a vested interest have made a false argument that growing crops for Biofuels takes land for food crops out of production and causes food prices to go up, as happened in 2008.  However, high food prices in 2008 were not due to corn ethanol (indeed additional acreage was planted to provide for fuel ethanol).  Instead these higher prices were due to the very high price of diesel and other petroleum fuels (used in trucks to grow and transport all food crops, to make Nitrogen fertilizer, etc.)

The Energy Tuber grows best in the sunbelt states, and will grow best on relatively poor soils, like the sand and sandy loam soils of the Coastal plains that range from eastern NJ through FL.  Much of the acreage in this area is currently planted in non-food crops like cotton and pine trees.  This Energy Tuber variety has also been shown to perform well in damaged soils – like phosphate mines in FL, or very substandard soils, like the ‘coral rock’ soils in Homestead FL.

Since all parts of the sweetpotato are edible, growing the Energy Tuber will result in at least 3 products – FUEL, FOOD, and FEED.  

The Fuel is ethanol, easily made from the carbohydrate in the tuber.   This is made through the same methods as corn ethanol.   The tuber can also be turned into diesel and jet fuel, using emerging biological and chemical methods. 

The Food from the Energy Tuber, is a high value white protein, with an amino acid complement similar to egg protein.  This white, tasteless, odorless protein powder can be used like whey or soy protein, for sports drinks, baby formula, adult supplements, etc.  

Feed – unlike the toxic vines on other tuber crops like potato, the vines from the energy sweetpotato are quite edible and nutritious and commonly used for animal feed in Asia, the Caribbean and Africa.  In our work with the University of Florida it was shown that the vines from the energy tuber variety is high in protein and vitamins, and highly digestible.   It is predicted that this highly drought tolerant crop will be an excellent alternative to water-intensive crops for animal feed, like alfalfa and corn stover in California and other countries with less water available. 

GREENHOUSE GAS ANALYSIS. 

The initial Green House Gas analysis was calculated by Dr. Richard Plevin, of Transportation Sustainability Research Center, UC Berkeley.    The initial analysis showed the energy tuber would reduce emissions to be less than 25% of Carbon footprint of gasoline. This number will be brought even lower, by including the value of the crop for food and the vines for feed, and by incorporating renewable energy to process the crop, like biogas made from the stillage. 

ABOUT CAREnergy AND DR. RYAN-BOHAC    

CAREnergy (Carolina Advanced Renewable Energy) was founded in 2008 by Dr. Janice Ryan-Bohac, Plant Breeder and Geneticist.  She is an Internationally recognized sweetpotato breeder, with over 26 years of experience.  Dr. Ryan-Bohac, is a leading authority in breeding sweet-potatoes for resistance to pests, sustainability, and value-added products like chips, fries, and food ingredients like starch and protein powders.  She has successfully developed new -industrial type of varieties with high yield and high levels of carbohydrates.  She has released over a dozen sweetpotato varieties with multiple resistance to 14 insects, diseases, and nematodes and developed several genotypes with high dry matter and high yields for renewable energy and green chemicals. Dr. Ryan-Bohac has authored or co-authored several publications and articles on genetics and breeding. Currently, she is working to commercialize her patented Energy Tuber, a very high yielding, heat tolerant, water-efficient crop for fuel ethanol, ‘drop-in-fuels’ and other industrial green products.  She is conducting field trials in several states and is optimizing the growing protocols and processing methods to maximize crop production.   

DID YOU KNOW?    

Yields for the Energy Tuber have been obtained in multiple locations and growing years.  The high yields possible for the Energy tuber were confirmed from field trials in Tulare County, California by a California Inspector for Weights and Measures.  

CAREnergy has received both private funding (over $1.46 million) to develop this feedstock and state and federal grant money ($1,200,000) to develop the methods to grow this crop, develop an economic model, and initial scale- up biofuel processing tests and the initial greenhouse gas analysis.  This includes over $400,000 in private funds from CAREnergy’s owners, and $ 1 million from in-kind funding.  Private funding  was received from two companies ($62,000).

In recognition of the potential and quality of this work, CAREnergy also received a $200,000 from a USDA/DOE grant as a subcontractor to Bartow Ethanol, and $250,000 from two biofuel grants from the state of South Carolina.  An additional $750,000 in grant funds was received from the state of Florida Farm to Fuel grant. Purpose of the grant to conduct research and development by Dr. Bohac and her colleagues with the University of Florida.

HOW YOUR DONATION CAN HELP

A prototype, demonstration plant is needed to move toward commercialization the patented Energy Tuber as an advanced biofuel feedstock.  If commercialized for Fuel, Food, and Feed, this crop can make major impact for the US and worldwide, as the 7th largest world crop.   The first scale-up, 150 L test in making fuel ethanol was conducted in fall of 2015 with the National Corn Ethanol Research Center in Illinois. With this research, we demonstrated that the starchy energy tuber can easily be converted to fuel ethanol using a corn ethanol method.  This will make the design and implementation of this feedstock much easier, and significantly less expensive and more reliable than cellulosic feedstocks that are very difficult, expensive and complicated.  This research also demonstrated the feasibility of using the energy tuber in combination with corn, indeed it could be ‘phased in’ to existing ethanol plants in states like California and Georgia, that depend on corn railed from the Midwest. 

Your donations will assist in paying for the build and design of this demonstration biofuel plant.  Phase I  will be to optimize the fuel production process and the commercial extraction and processing of co-products like the storage protein for food products.   Building on the research from the University of FL, further characterization would be conducted on the nutritional composition and value of the thick stillage for animal feed and the thin stillage for biogas to run the biofuel facility.  Phase II would be to run a first scale-up of the process to turn into with one of the National Laboratories.   

From this work and the preliminary work from NCERC, a scale-up process will be finalized to turn the energy tuber into fuel, food and feed, will be used in Phase III to design the scale-up demonstration plant.   With Phase III funding, we will build a small demonstration plant to show the feasibility and reliability of the process and design, and to estimate the economics to produce the fuel.  Having an operating demonstration plant to show investors, will attract investors to build the first full-scale bioethanol plant for FUEL, FOOD, and FEED.  This could be the model for the first of many biofuel plants that can be built to utilize this major world crop.     

WOULD YOU LIKE TO JOIN US?    

Contribute to this Indiegogo campaign, this is our chance to join together to VOTE FOR CLEAN, RENEW-ABLE ENERGY AND PERMANENT GREEN JOBS.  Even if you can’t send money, (or even if you can!) please contribute by joining our campaign and send it to everyone you can to Help this campaign become Viral, Worldwide.   For questions or feedback in regards to our campaign, please feel free to email us at CAREnergyinfo@gmail.com.

story:
A little about me

Hey everyone, my name is Andres Roban, a.k.a. Gym Hoodie™. The name Gym Hoodie™ comes from the first product I developed, the gym hoodie fitness towel.

By Day, I am a Product Developer with Patents in the United States and China for these amazing pillows.

The Gym Hoodie™ Wrinkle Therapy pillow and the Gym Hoodie™ Side Sleeper pillow are guaranteed to eliminate the face crushing associated with sleeping on traditional pillows while providing a pillow option to dissuade individuals from sleeping on their hands.

 Patented in the United States and China

It was many years ago, as an Asthma sufferer, I took my filled pillow and twisted and turned it to get that perfect shape, which allowed for a comfortable night's sleep. After sleeping on this particular pillow shape for years, I purchased a small piece of foam to replicate the shape I made from the filled pillow. Low and behold, it worked wonders for me, helping me to breathe better and sleep better at nights.

A few years later, after realizing how beneficial the carved out foam was working for me, I purchased an even larger piece of foam to make actual full sized pillow in the hopes of helping others benefit in the same way he did. Seeking the advice of a Patent Attorney, I decided it was time to secure my pillow design so I can one day bring it to market.

After years of perfecting the pillow designs, from prototypes to molded samples, to having actual test subjects try these pillows out, they are now ready to take on the world.

How will my Patented Pillow help you?

For many years, people have been desperately searching for a few things relating to sleep: 
- A pillow that will provide proper neck and spine alignment and support.
- A pillow that will resolve the issue of sleeping on your hands or sticking your hands under your pillow while sleeping, waking with cramped, painful, numb hands.
 
Many have promised, but none have been able to truly deliver all of these crucial benefits until now, with the release of the Patented Gym Hoodie™ Side Sleeper pillow. Endorsed by New Jersey Chiropractor, Dr. Jack Atzmon, a recognized Chiropractic expert in Repetitive Stress injuries, "these pillows are sure to motivate individuals to take a more proactive approach to promoting proper back/neck/spine alignment and the way they care for wrist and hand health." 

The Gym Hoodie™ Side Sleeper Pillow

The Gym Hoodie™ Side Sleeper pillow. This pillow is also designed with a head-cradling surface, shoulder curves and chin support. This pillow does have hand-rest grooves, a place where you gently lay your hands while sleeping. This is an amazing alternative to sleeping on your hands or sticking them under the pillow while sleeping, causing you to wake with numbing, cramped hands.

- Designed for side sleepers

- Made with Memory Foam

- Hand Rest Grooves. No more cramped hands by allowing the sleeper to gently rest their hands in the hand-rest grooves, as opposed to sleeping on them or sticking them under the pillow. 

- Surface contour, providing amazing head-cradling comfort

- Shoulder Curves, which allows a person to nestle into the pillow

- Satin pillowcases for each pillow(if we reach our Stretch Goals of $150,000), which will not pull your hair out and increase facial wrinkles while sleeping like cotton and polyester cases would.

- This pillow is perfect height, accommodating shoulder to neck distance, thereby allowing for proper neck/spine alignment.

Under every pillowcase are specific contours and curves on the pillow surface, designed to cradle your head, allow for proper neck/spine alignment and dissuade you from laying on your hands.

Now, most of us can relate to waking with numbing or cramped hands. This is caused mainly by sleeping on our hands or sticking our hands under the pillow while sleeping, thereby, cutting off proper blood-flow to the hand/s. There are no pillows like this on the Market. A good night sleep can account for a productive day. More than sleeping on the right mattress, a comfortable pillow, which offers proper head-neck-spine alignment is the holy grail of a good night's sleep.     

    

Other Benefits of these amazing pillows:

           

 

How you can help me in my journey?

To be able to successfully place an order with the Factory, I will need to raise USD $25,000. The monies raised will go towards: 

1) The production of your Molded pillows

2) Bamboo pillowcase(Satin pillowcase if we reach our stretch goal)

3) Outer packaging for your pillows

4) Ground transportation from the Factory to the Shipping Port in China

5) Importing of the pillows

6) Customs Clearance and Brokers Fee

7) Delivery to Warehouse

8) And finally, Shipping to you, my Backers.....Yay!

The days of crushing your face on traditional down pillows or flat surfaced memory foam pillows are over!! The days off sleeping on your hands, or sticking your hands under the pillow while sleeping, waking with numb, cramped and painful hands are also over!!

You deserve a better night's sleep, and it starts with the pillow you lay your head on.

It would mean a lot to me if I reach my Funding Goal, however, if I don't reach my Goal, every single Backer will still receive the pillow they selected when they Backed my project.

As a Restaurant Manager, I know a lot about top-notch customer service. These are the same principles I will put into play with my Backers. Every one of you will be cherished, and that is my Gym Hoodie™ Service Guarantee :)

Risks & Challenges

From the first day I decided to Patent these pillows, I have always made sure to partner with the right team. From the Prototype phase, to the Patent phase, to partnering with a reputable manufacturer that sent me perfectly molded pillow samples, I am ready to get these pillows under your heads.

Though mishaps may happen from time to time, I do not foresee anything that will prevent your pillows from being delivered in a timely manner. Everything has been factored in to ensure a smooth process, from your Backing to you receiving your pillow.

As a General Manager of a Fine Dining Steakhouse in Brooklyn, I know a lot about customer service and satisfaction and I intend to bring that same diligence that has made me a successful Manager, into this Campaign. You won't regret it, I promise!

Other Ways You Can Help

Back, back, back and share, share, share my project!!! Even if you are not able to back my project, please take a moment and share the link around. It would mean a lot to me and bring me one more step to reaching my goal!

Thank you so much!

Special thanks to Arie Ohayon, his wife Michelle and the entire production team at Wild Pixel Pro, for making this video possible!

story:
Join us! Let's raise more money together. Sport Botanics has 22 more days to reach the goal of $25,000. Funds will go to manufacturing and marketing organic and vegan body care for athletes. We have raised some money and still need your help!
 
Check out who supports us already:
Julia & Robert Stein
Chioma & Dominik Wagner
Kevin Nennhuber
Heidi Petruzzi
CA Soccer Fan
Maria & Bob Capuzelo
Jen & John Capuzelo
Christina Colon


The Solution 
Sport Botanics is a green solution to a long-term problem and need. As a professional athlete, I was showering at least eight times per week and using countless amounts of body, hair and skin care products. Sunscreens packed with chemical ingredients, shampoos filled with sodium lauryl sulfate and lotions with hidden PEGs were all in my daily regimen.

Not only did I see the impact of harsh chemicals on my skin, I saw it on my teammates’ skin as well. Premature aging from sunscreens that did not protect against the sun’s rays, shampoos with harsh sulfates that caused thinning hair and consistent dryness from creams with alcohol as the first ingredient were just a few. My teammates and I were fed up with bad conventional products, but couldn’t find anything on the market that was natural and affordable.

After experiencing the body care problems of my friends firsthand, I was concerned and wanted to do something about it. I wanted to make their lives easier by improving their body care choices. I knew the needs and wants of athletes from long discussions of the benefits they were looking for in products, so it was just a matter of motivation and will on my part to make it happen.

Making a Difference
After researching, I came across a plethora of frightening information. Some included the FDA ban of a mere 11 cosmetic ingredients since 1934, while the EU has prohibited the use of close to 1400. Other data I came across was the severe body effects and skin reactions from common, but harmful ingredients. Needless to say, I had had enough. I immediately had my light bulb moment!

I started scouring the internet for natural recipes, manufacturing and quality ingredients in order to start making my own products at home. After much trial, error and success, I am now working with a scientist from Stanford University with a Masters in Biochemistry. I am so excited about the first product, Defense - a SPF 32 mineral sunscreen with non-nano zinc oxide, 86% organic and all natural ingredients. We have an original formula with SPF 32 and a tinted formula with SPF 31. Later in the year, we will be introducing 2-in-1 hair and body wash, as well as muscle relaxing cream and other products.

Check out the life-changing skin, body and environmental benefits of Sport Botanics products and ingredients:

  • All of Sport Botanics' products are made with natural, organic, vegan and animal-friendly ingredients. Some of the favorites are organic sunflower, jojoba and olive oils.
  • Products are non-comedogenic and fragrance-free.
  • The active ingredient in Defense Sunscreen is a non-nanoparticle zinc oxide. It does not absorb into the skin and possibly cause hormone disruption or cancer, and is the only FDA-approved sunscreen ingredient for children under 6 months old.
  • Non-nanoparticle zinc oxide is safe for ocean reefs, is biodegradable and has broad spectrum protection against UVA & UVB rays.
  • Defense Sunscreen is gluten-free, corn-free, soy-free and dairy-free.

  • The tinted version of Defense Sunscreen uses natural iron oxides to blend in with the skin and create an even glow.

 

So, why organic in body care? Vast amounts of scientific evidence (and your own common sense) prove organically produced fruits and veggies have higher levels of vitamins and nutrients than conventional ones. If athletes can benefit from extra nourishment with organic food intake, imagine the impact on sports performance through organic skin and body care - substantially less likelihood of rashes, redness, itchiness, flakiness or dryness.

High-performance athletes have so much to worry about - coaches, team tactics, diet, traveling, strength training, school or work and games. The highest priority is to stay fit and healthy for training and games, and when you feel amazing, you perform amazing. When you wash off the sweat and dirt after a game, no residue should be left and your skin and hair should be not dry. When you use sunscreen, it should not feel chalky or wear off after a little sweat. When you need a bit of warming cream to activate your muscles, it should not burn your skin.

By providing athletes with products made from organic, vegan and animal-friendly choices, they not only help themselves, but also can affect a positive change one cosmetic bottle or tube at a time.

Getting the Word Out There
Sport Botanics relies on Instagram, Facebook, the KicksAndChronicles.com blog  and newsletters to promote the brand and products. With images, GIFs, videos and blog posts, I plan to build the expand these networks over the next several months.

Having a huge network of professional friends, including athletes, amateur and young players, coaches, trainers and sport associations, allows Sport Botanics to have a direct link to the field, court or track. Preparing media kits and samples is one specific way to have athletes use products, and in return athletes can post images or videos on social media networks to promote Sport Botanics.

 

 

How Do We Sell Our Products?
Shopify makes it easy to manage the Sport Botanics e-commerce store. We send all products to Amazon. After a purchase is made in our store, FBA will handle all packing, storage and shipping to customers . FBA will make it easier to meet the needs of 4 major global markets (USA, Canada, Mexico and Germany).

Examining major global brands like Nike and Under Armour, we want to follow suit and create products that not only appeal to athletes, but also the athlete in you. Everyone benefits from great body and skin care.

Perks
Here are the gifts you can receive:

  • All contributions - your name on the contributor list permanently on the e-commerce shop
  • $15 contribution - 10% off products for 1 year
  • $25 contribution - 1 full-size product and 1 travel size product and 10% off products for 1 year
  • $50 contribution - 2 full-size products and 15% off products for 1 year
  • $100 contribution - 5 full-size products & 15% off products for 1 year
  • $250 contribution - 10 full-size products, 15% off products for 1 year & 1 of all future released products through 2017
  • $500 contribution - 20 full-size products, 25% off products for 2 years & 1 of all future released products through 2017

Contribute Towards a Better Future
I have a deep passion and relentless motivation to change athlete perspectives on body care. My promise to athletes, contributors, consumers and myself is that I will do everything in my power to make a difference in athletes’ lives. I will research, investigate, read, question, create, write, learn and build anything that will help Sport Botanics have a positive impact.

Hopefully, I have sparked your interest toward providing organic, vegan and animal-friendly products to athletes. Your gift to Sport Botanics would support efforts to accomplish goals of more inventory, manufacturing and marketing in order to improve athletes' lives and to bring greater change to the cosmetic industry.

 

Brought to you by the Kicks & Chronicles Blog

As featured in:

story:
HOW DO ZIKA WIPES WORK?

Premium Zika Wipes are 100% all natural and use no toxic chemicals or DEET.  Although bugs may not like the peppermint oil Zika Wipes contain, kids and adults enjoy the gentle, energizing scent. They are formulated with non-greasy, essential oils. Peppermint oil is a natural deterrent against mosquitoes and flying insects. Peppermint is a natural insecticide that kills as well as repels mosquitoes, but is harmless to humans. Other skin treatments containing peppermint oil are used for the following conditions: muscle pain, allergic rashes and itchiness, nerve pain, and joint conditions. Peppermint oil vapor is can also be inhaled to treat symptoms of colds and coughs. It is truly a miracle plant!!!

HOW DO THEY SMELL?

Most bottle products don't smell very good even if the bottle claims they are "scent free," this isn't the case with all natural Zika Wipes.They smell great! We love the smooth, gentle peppermint smell, it is not too strong, but strong enough to keep those annoying mosquitoes away. When people open the packet and smell the product we typically hear something like "Ummmm, that smells goooood!" We guarantee that you and your kids will love the light, minty smell.

WHERE ARE THE MAJOR AREAS OF CONCERN IN THE USA?

Local mosquito-borne Zika virus transmission has been reported in the continental United States. Many areas in the United States have the type of mosquitoes that can become infected with and spread Zika, chikungunya, and dengue viruses.

Recent outbreaks in the continental United States of chikungunya and dengue, which are spread by the same type of mosquito, have been relatively small and limited to a small area.

Areas with past outbreaks of chikungunya and dengue are considered at higher risk for Zika. These include U.S. territories like Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and Guam. Local outbreaks have also been reported in parts of Hawaii, Florida, and Texas.

http://www.cdc.gov/zika/vector/range.html

WHO ARE THESE PESTS?

AEDES AEGYPTI 

These mosquitoes live in tropical, subtropical, and in some temperate climates. They are the main type of mosquito that spread Zika, dengue, chikungunya, and other viruses. Because Aedes aegypti mosquitoes live near and prefer to feed on people, they are more likely to spread these viruses than other types of mosquitoes.

AEDES ALBOPICTUS

These mosquitoes live tropical, subtropical, and temperate climates, but can live in a broader temperature range and at cooler temperatures than Aedes aegypti. Because these mosquitoes feed on animals as well as people, they are less likely to spread viruses like Zika, dengue, chikungunya and other viruses.

Aedes aegypti or Aedes albopictus mosquitoes can cause an outbreak, if all of the following happens:

People get infected with a virus (like Zika, dengue, or chikungunya).

An Aedes aegypti or Aedes albopictus mosquito bites an infected person during the first week of infection when the virus can be found in the person’s blood.

The infected mosquito lives long enough for the virus to multiply and for the mosquito to bite another person.

The cycle continues multiple times to start an outbreak.

http://www.cdc.gov/zika/vector/range.html

DO ALL NATURAL ESSENTIAL OILS REALLY WORK?

Zika wipes has been 3rd party tested and proven! Here are some actual hand written, excerpts from the independent scientific independent studies conducted. Yes, they really work!!!

WHY CONTRIBUE???

You will see in the PERKS that we are offering that we want to help underprivileged countries fight these deadly diseases also. Most of our staff have themselves lived, worked, or have family that are  living in these areas of the world. We have traveled to a number of the countries that are being hit the hardest and it is devastating. One of our founders is taking thousands of wipes down to Mexico this fall. Another one of our founders has a nephew doing charity work in Brazil  for the next year, and regularly travels to Latin America on business. Your contribution will help us help you and our global neighbors. Until we wipe-out these viruses with vaccinations and other means, wipe on with Zika Wipes!!

We have produced product and packages and are ready to ship, but we want to do more!!!  We have a limited quantity of product and are at risk of depleting our inventories.  Your contribution will help us restock our supplies and send out more effective, all natural protection! We are sincerely grateful to our backers for all of your support. We can't do it without you. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

- Zika Wipes Team

When people open the packet and smell the product we typically hear something like "Ummmm, that smells goooood!" We guarantee that you and your kids will love the light, minty smell.WHERE ARE THE MAJOR AREAS OF CONCERN IN THE USA?Local mosquito-borne Zika virus transmission has been reported in the continental United States. Many areas in the United States have the type of mosquitoes that can become infected with and spread Zika, chikungunya, and dengue viruses.Recent outbreaks in the continental United States of chikungunya and dengue, which are spread by the same type of mosquito, have been relatively small and limited to a small area.Areas with past outbreaks of chikungunya and dengue are considered at higher risk for Zika. These include U.S. territories like Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and Guam. Local outbreaks have also been reported in parts of Hawaii, Florida, and Texas.http://www.cdc.gov/zika/vector/range.htmlWHO ARE THESE PESTS?AEDES AEGYPTI These mosquitoes live in tropical, subtropical, and in some temperate climates. They are the main type of mosquito that spread Zika, dengue, chikungunya, and other viruses. Because Aedes aegypti mosquitoes live near and prefer to feed on people, they are more likely to spread these viruses than other types of mosquitoes.AEDES ALBOPICTUSThese mosquitoes live tropical, subtropical, and temperate climates, but can live in a broader temperature range and at cooler temperatures than Aedes aegypti. Because these mosquitoes feed on animals as well as people, they are less likely to spread viruses like Zika, dengue, chikungunya and other viruses.Aedes aegypti or Aedes albopictus mosquitoes can cause an outbreak, if all of the following happens:People get infected with a virus (like Zika, dengue, or chikungunya).An Aedes aegypti or Aedes albopictus mosquito bites an infected person during the first week of infection when the virus can be found in the person’s blood.The infected mosquito lives long enough for the virus to multiply and for the mosquito to bite another person.The cycle continues multiple times to start an outbreak.http://www.cdc.gov/zika/vector/range.htmlDO ALL NATURAL ESSENTIAL OILS REALLY WORK?Zika wipes has been 3rd party tested and proven! Here are some actual hand written, excerpts from the independent scientific independent studies conducted. Yes, they really work!!!WHY CONTRIBUE??? You will see in the PERKS that we are offering that we want to help underprivileged countries fight these deadly diseases also. Most of our staff have themselves lived, worked, or have family that are  living in these areas of the world. We have traveled to a number of the countries that are being hit the hardest and it is devastating. One of our founders is taking thousands of wipes down to Mexico this fall. Another one of our founders has a nephew doing charity work in Brazil  for the next year, and regularly travels to Latin America on business. Your contribution will help us help you and our global neighbors. Until we wipe-out these viruses with vaccinations and other means, wipe on with Zika Wipes!!We have produced product and packages and are ready to ship, but we want to do more!!!  We have a limited quantity of product and are at risk of depleting our inventories.  Your contribution will help us restock our supplies and send out more effective, all natural protection! We are sincerely grateful to our backers for all of your support. We can't do it without you. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!- Zika Wipes Team

story:
WELCOME TO THE FUTURE OF SMOKING!



In over 5000 years since the pipe was invented, many minds worked on improving the performance adding new features, creating mind-blowing art pieces. But with the modern on-the-go lifestyle we needed a smoking device that is harmless, functional, durable, easy to operate, portable, discreet and eye-pleasing. Here it is – GeniusPipe – the ultimate smoking experience for thousands of people around the world and soon for you!


GENIUS FEATURES



How this new Genius 4.0 edition is different from the previous model?

Genius 4.0 is still made of surgical grade aluminum, however, the new manufacturing process allows for these advancements over Genius 3.0 series:

- Better precision, cleaner lines, and better air flow
- More durable and scratch resistant finish 
- Unlimited color variations
- Custom image printing



JUST PACK'N'SMOKE


No cable or battery needed. It doesn’t need water or ice or large size to perform. We removed all challenges from the user! It's just a 3-piece magnetic pocket pipe. Genius is pleasant to hold, easy to replace screen, easy to pack and cache the ash, and easy to smoke. And if it falls flat on the ground, your biggest challenge will be leaning down to pick it up and smoke.


SLIDE'N'SMOKE


Magnetic sliding cover will protect from spilling and contain the smell. Keep it out in the open before the eyes of many and chances are no one will know what it is.  Although, it could be a conversation starter. Slide'N'Smoke through the logo in the cover for the most efficient way to smoke.


GENIUS COVER


If you prefer to smoke Genius without the cover, we made sure that you don't lose it! :)


CASH THE ASH


Steel sliding cover is not only beautiful but also functional. Its corners fit perfectly into the bowl and can be used to cache the ash.


GENIUS BOWL


Genius two-tiered bowl is perfectly designed to hold standard 0.75” screen.  However, your GeniusPipe will come packed with high temperature resistant, self-repairing Genius TruTaste Screen.  Specifically designed to eliminate drawbacks to pipe screen use such as metallic taste and loose wires, Genius TruTaste screen won't change integrity after multiple cleanings and won't burn through. It will fit Genius bowl perfectly and is super easy to remove!


GENIUS DIMPLES

GeniusPipe's  2000 dimples are always hard at work. As you can see, tar, oils and resin are captured immediately at the top, way before it can get to you.


CLEANING GENIUS

Genius cleaning is easy and fast!  We took a one minute cleaning challenge and here's what we got...


HEALTH & TECHNOLOGY



NO COUGH - GUARANTEED!
GENIUSPIPE FILTERS OUT 95% OF ALL THE TAR AND RESIN.
SMOKE COMES OUT SUPER SMOOTH AND CLEAN!


WHY COOLING SMOKE IS SO IMPORTANT?

Since ancient times people knew that hot smoke can be damaging to lung’s health. Indeed, medical studies show that Bullous and other lung diseases are mostly caused by inhaling hot fumes. Creating devices that cool smoke has been an ongoing effort for millennia and eventually has become an art. This is the reason we now enjoy incredibly large variety of intricate smoking devices such as water-pipes and hookahs. Unfortunately, since the beginning of times all smoking devices that effectively cool hot fumes were also large in size. And all portable devices such as pipes did not effectively cool the smoke… Until now.

Genius is the revolutionary pipe that combines the best of both worlds. It can easily fit into your pocket and it cools hot smoke more effectively than any other smoking device. 



WHY ANODIZED ALUMINUM?

Aluminum’s Thermal Conductivity is 250 times greater than glass and 1000 times greater than wood. This means that cooling effect of Genius is same as 250 glass pipes or 1000 wooden pipes! 

Aluminum is one of the safest materials on Earth.

“Aluminum is the third most abundant element after oxygen  and silicon. It makes up about 8% by weight of the Earth's solid surface. Despite its  natural abundance, aluminum has no known function in biology. It is remarkably nontoxic.”
- Wikipedia
“Average person consumes 0.12 mg of Aluminum every day and can ingest much larger amounts of aluminum than in the diet, possibly as high as 71 mg a day.”
- Centers for Disease Control (CDC)


WHY DIMPLES?


A golf ball with dimples flies much further than a smooth one because each vortex created by a dimple acts like a bearing made of air.

Same effect  is created inside GeniusPipe.  Thousands of vortexes, created with each breath, filter and cool the smoke better than water!

The Dimple technology used in Genius has been used in variety of applications: Super quiet fans, Military supersonic jets, Cycle sport, Nuclear power plants, Track and field, Super fast trains, Fuel-efficient cars, Stealth Submarines, Food storage, Gaming Computers, Boiler tanks, and even High-tech weaponry - all utilize Dimple Technology!

GENIUS TOOK THIS INCREDIBLE COOLING AND FILTERING TECHNOLOGY TO A WHOLE NEW LEVEL AND PUT IT IN YOUR HANDS!


Genius is specifically designed to protect your lungs from hot fumes and enhance your smoking experience. Our patented pipe is a work of art incepted by PhDs, designed by expert engineers using incredibly advanced computational algorithms, and regarded as the most advanced smoking pipe ever! Genius is guaranteed to impress your friends and will last you a lifetime.


WHICH PACKAGE TO GET?



GENIUS CLASSIC


GeniusPipe offers a unique mix of functionality and beauty. You will love all the high-tech features, concealed under absolutely gorgeous Art-Deco design. Made of highest grade materials, with black and silver finish, this pipe is the least expensive and the most practical piece of modern art you can find for $100.


GENIUS COLORS


GeniusPipe is the ultimate bragging device. Every little aspect of this masterpiece is tailored for your enjoyment. It's slim, sexy and easy to use. Designed to fit your busy urban lifestyle, this pipe will become your most loved gadget for $120


MY GENIUS


Design a unique pipe and own a piece of history forever! Instant collectible for $200


MAKE-A-MODEL


GeniusPipe is an open canvas. Mix Genius colors and create your design to be among early adopters of the new medium. This 20-piece miniseries could be your business card to new relationships and greater possibilities for $3000.


PROJECT TIMELINE




GENIUS STORY

The idea to apply Vortical Boiling technology to a pipe came as a joke at a birthday party. When later the prototype was created, we had even more laughs.

But when we tested it, we knew, we are onto something. We wanted to learn more so we started showing it to other smokers.

Over the time we’ve met many like-minded people and learned a great deal of what smokers want.  We realized that GeniusPipe does no longer belong to us. Our customers and fans made it their own, exploring and expending their horizons in the process. We are just a part of Genius tribe and we are building our future within it. We want to continue learning from our fans and find Indiegogo to be a great platform to accomplish that.

story:
Short Summary

We are Kevin and Tina. We moved from the UK to Bulgaria in 2011 and two years ago we bought a derelict small holding near the beautiful Rila mountains. We have already rebuilt the farmhouse, maintaining its rustic charm and we have renovated the farm. We now grown our own fruit and vegetables and keep livestock. We are very active in the local community and even take part in the communal herding of the village goats! 

We now want to restore our original timber-framed farmhouse, many of which have disappeared from the countryside. Our aim is to provide a lovely holiday let venue and a community space which can be used for events, classes on eco farming and cooking demonstrations using our own produce (we are former teachers and good cooks, so we're ok with this bit!). 

Your contributions would mean the world in saving this lovely piece of Bulgarian heritage, will offer work and opportunities to local villagers and will provide a beautiful escape for those seeking some peaceful country life. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need 20,000 Euros to restore and repair the old farmhouse. The money would be used to repair/renew the timber frame where necessary, strengthen the foundations, install new flooring, insulation, plumbing, heating, water and electrics, windows and doors. We have already replaced the roof to save the fabric of the building. 

In return for your help, you can choose from a range of perks, from naming a goat to a hog-roast party. 

If we don't reach the goal, any funding received will go towards the project as we feel passionate about its potential. 

The Impact

Your contribution would have a tremendous impact on our local, small community, offering work, community projects and courses, as well as saving and preserving a beautiful building which is part of Bulgarian rural heritage. 

We have already successfully restored the farm and farm house (check out our website www.cottagefarm.bg), but now we could really do with your help for this next step. 

Risks & Challenges

The building is old and needs a lot of work, but we know that with our own proven hard work and that of local tradesmen, we can make the Hayloft a beautiful and useful reality. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't help financially, your good wishes will help us on our way. Please share our project around to your friends and anyone you think might be interested and remember to use the Indiegogo share tools - thank you!

story:
I run a small design studio and this project started after having talked to some fellow designers. We were talking about responsibilities, and I remember how Andy, a Norwegian fellow designer said that we, as designers, can make things look good - but to what result, if they pollute the environment?

Yes, we can make them look good, we can make people want them. But what if they end up infesting the oceans and waterways? Why this craze about plastic water bottles? I mean I live in a developed country and I drink tap water - I feel great and I am still alive and well:)

Besides, if you are not sure about the quality of your water then you can always purify it/filter it using any of the commercially available purifiers and filters, then use this tap water bottle to carry it around with you.

Inspire others

When you fill this tap water bottle and take it with you on walks, to the gym, at work, people notice the tap and realize you drink tap water. In a week you would have saved the planet from another 4-5 plastic water bottles.


The Industry

Many talented marketers and directors will tell you how good they are at recycling their plastic water bottles. But are they really? Why so many plastic nano particles in the fish we eat? Really, the best solution is to go back to drinking tap water, with or without at-home purification, depending on where you live.




Infrastructure

There are quite a few countries and communities that have invested heavily into having good, clean tap water. Why not use the present infrastructure and drink this water? Why go to a supermarket, buy plastic water bottles, take them with you, then throw these empty shells away when you do not really need to do that. The carbon print alone resulting from these plastic water bottle transports is enormous.




Getting off the ground

I have made a few prototypes and the latest one is made out of stainless steel, 100% recyclable and long lasting. The actual tap could be made of metal as well, but for the moment it's an chromed ABS plastic tap.

To make these two components out of metal, I need to invest into molds, and some R&D. But the end result would be a water bottle that is not only stylish and inspirational, but one product that would last for many years. And for every time you use it, you would rid the world of another plastic bottle.

story:
ProlenaOne™ is a herbal product  that is 100 % natural and used as a multi-purpose medication. It was approved by Health Canada 3+ years ago in 2012 for 3 different ailments; inflammation, abdominal fullness (stomach disorders), and urinary difficulties. ProlenaOne™ was invented in Toronto, ON. The  main ingredient is a plant in the species of  Phaseolus Vulgaris (Adzuki Bean) and its a well known plant for its many benefits. ProlenaOne™ is a very potent medicine and can treat various ailments. It has been used for pain management, different cancers, urinary difficulties, prostate problems, weight loss, diabetes, circulatory problems, and many other ailments. See testimonials by going to www.prolenaone.com and go to our Youtube page. 


ProlenaOne is

• non GMO
• made from Organic seeds
• no pesticides
• 100% Vegetarian
• no artificial colors or flavors
• Gluten Free

Contains:
• no dairy • no sweeteners • no soy
• no wheat • no yeast




A Message from the inventor

Would you believe that a single herb could be the answer to multiple medical mysteries of our time?

For nearly Twenty years , I  endeavored  to find a medicine that could help with many debilitating conditions that was afflicting many friends and people around me . I was inspired at the time to discover a single natural substance that could serve as a remedy; being able to settle most questions that related to good health.

I realized, in order to develop a natural remedy, it would require an extensive knowledge base in medicine. This initiated my endeavor to pursue a degree in  Natural Medicine and ultimately, my dream of producing a remedy. Through the study of medical science in homeopathy, I learned to discern the obstacles that would hinder the progress towards a cure. I became abreast of the major diseases prevalent in today's society, which would assist in the development of an interesting, valuable, and successful remedy. Fortunately, through the years, I have been exposed to practical experiences that outlined various health conditions and information necessary to my dream becoming a reality. Specifically, I would come into contact with individuals inflicted with illnesses that fit the criteria for ProlenaOne.

I steadily gained progress as many people aided in the process and made production of ProlenaOne possible. There have been numerous remarkable testimonials and information based on the consumers' healing processes. Many of which were dealing with persistent, weakening, and deteriorating diseases. I was able to successfully treat conditions exceeding the reach of conventional medicine.

As time progressed, I was able to appreciate my role in helping others through their difficult illnesses. The rewarding satisfaction in contributing to society and serving for a cause greater than myself, was beyond my vision. I am very grateful for the opportunity thatProlenaOne has provided, as it has helped individuals cope and get through difficult times in their lives. As well, it has given them a sense of purpose and hope."


- H. Eric Courtney, DHMS


ProlenaOne

It has taken over 5 years in order to get approval from Health Canada. Health Canada is the equivalent of the FDA in the US and is been known to be more stringent with their testing. Our results in the last 3 years have been fantastic. We felt that in order to do this right that we needed to get government approval for this product before we put it to market despite the fact that we are a very small company with few resources we manage to do just that. We feel that we are now  ready to bring this powerful medicine to the world and we need your help to do it. We need your help to be able to produce it in a large scale to meet the expected demand, unfortunately at the moment we can only produce in small quantities because our resources are small. (We need a larger farm facility to produce the raw product as well get full time production to the lab so we can bring our costs down and some office space. Up until now we have planted every plant by hand and reaped it by hand and we will like to continue doing it that way so we can control the quality and effectiveness of this medicine as well to keep the formulation propritory), oh and one more thing 20% of all moneys raised through this campaign will go to producing ProlenaOne to be given for free to people that cannot afford it, so please, give from the heart whatever you can afford. For these above contributions we will be going out to the local shelters ,underprivileged areas and old folks that cannot afford most medicines and distributed in person and we will list individuals info in our website so contributors know were their money went to. As well we will ship worldwide to individuals that needed so long as we get proof of need. Please pass the word wherever you can it will help a lot .


If you are sick with a chronic disease and cannot get relief, try this medicine and see for yourself.

Through the study of medical science in homeopathy, I learned to discern the obstacles that would hinder the progress towards a cure. I became abreast of the major diseases prevalent in today's society, which would assist in the development of an interesting, valuable, and successful remedy. Fortunately, through the years, I have been exposed to practical experiences that outlined various health conditions and information necessary to my dream becoming a reality. Specifically, I would come into contact with individuals inflicted with illnesses that fit the criteria for ProlenaOne.
I steadily gained progress as many people aided in the process and made production of ProlenaOne possible. There have been numerous remarkable testimonials and information based on the consumers' healing processes. Many of which were dealing with persistent, weakening, and deteriorating diseases. I was able to successfully treat conditions exceeding the reach of conventional medicine.
As time progressed, I was able to appreciate my role in helping others through their difficult illnesses. The rewarding satisfaction in contributing to society and serving for a cause greater than myself, was beyond my vision. I am very grateful for the opportunity thatProlenaOne has provided, as it has helped individuals cope and get through difficult times in their lives. As well, it has given them a sense of purpose and hope."
- H. Eric Courtney, DHMS

ProlenaOne
It has taken over 5 years in order to get approval from Health Canada. Health Canada is the equivalent of the FDA in the US and is been known to be more stringent with their testing. Our results in the last 3 years have been fantastic. We felt that in order to do this right that we needed to get government approval for this product before we put it to market despite the fact that we are a very small company with few resources we manage to do just that. We feel that we are now  ready to bring this powerful medicine to the world and we need your help to do it. We need your help to be able to produce it in a large scale to meet the expected demand, unfortunately at the moment we can only produce in small quantities because our resources are small. (We need a larger farm facility to produce the raw product as well get full time production to the lab so we can bring our costs down and some office space. Up until now we have planted every plant by hand and reaped it by hand and we will like to continue doing it that way so we can control the quality and effectiveness of this medicine as well to keep the formulation propritory), oh and one more thing 20% of all moneys raised through this campaign will go to producing ProlenaOne to be given for free to people that cannot afford it, so please, give from the heart whatever you can afford. For these above contributions we will be going out to the local shelters ,underprivileged areas and old folks that cannot afford most medicines and distributed in person and we will list individuals info in our website so contributors know were their money went to. As well we will ship worldwide to individuals that needed so long as we get proof of need. Please pass the word wherever you can it will help a lot .

If you are sick with a chronic disease and cannot get relief, try this medicine and see for yourself.

story:
Meet the Radius. When you need a serious mask that combines comfort, breathability, durability, and reduces environmental impact while maintaining the highest quality of N95 filtration – you need the Radius.

The Radius offers valveless 2-way N95 filter protection and filters during both inhalation and exhalation, keeping both you and those around you safe. Unlike vented masks (which the CDC currently recommends against) which do not filter exhalation or disposable cloth masks which do not filter inhalation.

The Radius mask has been tested by Nelson Labs and conforms to NIOSH NRC120 criterion for airflow resistance, - 42 CFR Part 84.180, and is in compliance with US FDA GMP regulations 21 CFR Parts 210, 211, and 820.

 

Our Story

In early March 2020, Rory Larson saw an opportunity to help communities build resiliency by 3D printing personal protection equipment (PPE) that was desperately needed to support the safety of individuals, and most importantly, frontline and essential workers. During a marathon 3D printing design session lasting 48 hours, Rory created the first 3D printed respirator. With the help of a Seattle non-profit, the Maker Mask movement was launched with the intent to initially focus on distributing free 3D printed designs across the nation, and the world.

After the original design received approval from the National Institute of Health (NIH) we began receiving inquiries and new feature requests.  As Maker Mask continued to evolve and release new product designs, we learned that the demand both domestically and internationally far outpaced the capabilities of community makers and the small-batch manufacturers. We are now shifting to injection molding (IM) production to promote manufacturing efficiency and need your help to do so.

Radius Mask Overview

The Radius' simple design allows for intuitive use. The mask, covers, tray, and replaceable filters enable users to continually clean and reuse the masks to maximize comfort, minimize environmental impact, and prolong mask lifespan. 

The N95 filters are cut to size and offer effective protection from airborne particles even after hours of use. 

Radius vs. Other Masks

Not all masks are created equally!  The efficacy of a mask is determined by 2 things: the filter quality and the seal of the mask to your face.

The Radius is an improvement on other mask alternatives for these key reasons: 

  •  Comfortable: The Radius Mask is made of silicone which forms a tight seal to the face maximizing comfort and protection for the user.
  •  Reusable: N95, surgical, and cloth masks must be disposed of frequently. The Radius mask is durable and can be cleaned allowing for hundreds of uses. We don't have to compromise sustainability for protection - we can protect ourselves and the environment simultaneously.
  •  Breathable: Other masks lack adequate airflow making it difficult for the user to breathe. The Radius' unique valveless design with 3 large 2-way filters allows for increased airflow while maintaining high-quality filtration.
  •  Effective: Surgical and cloth masks do not provide 2-way protection! Our N95 filters provide 2-way protection, protecting you when breathing in and others when breathing out.

How Does the Radius Work?

  • Filters: Each of the Radius’ 3 filters provide an N95 level of protection which is effective in filtering out airborne particles up to .3 microns during inhalation and exhalation. The filters are extremely easy to change by simply twisting and clicking the caps on and off. We recommend following the CDC guidelines for cleaning and frequency of changing the filters.
  • Fit: The Radius is made in a flexible silicone that forms to the face to create a tight, yet comfortable fit.  It comes in 3 sizes* with adjustable strapping for the individual allowing for a customized fit. 

        *the first production run will be size Medium only 

  • Cost: With Injection Molding production the Radius can be efficiently mass-produced to provide maximum protection at a low cost. We are pricing the Radius mask to recover costs and to provide funding for our mission-related programs. With this approach, the mask is exceptionally affordable in comparison to other reusable options.
  • Impact: In comparison to disposable masks, the Radius can be cleaned and worn hundreds of times, therefore, minimizing waste. We also provide the option to receive a mask for yourself and fund the donation of a mask to a frontline or essential worker.

Size and Fit 

We are in the process of fabricating the molds for the Adult Size Medium. The guidelines below are helpful for determining fit.

Timeline 

With your support, we plan to move into production in November pending final prototype revisions and supply chain logistics.  This should put the Radius mask in your hands by December.  We will be as transparent as possible with the progress of production and any delays that may occur along the way. 

 

Opportunity for Impact 

 We are for humanity, not profit! 

Maker Mask has already had tremendous success distributing masks to frontline workers and communities in need. Reaching our goal will enable us to rapidly upscale production to distribute our masks to essential workers and for community members worldwide. 

In addition to ramping up production, the team is working to launch a 3D printing curriculum and grow 3D printing knowledge and skills around the world. We believe that investment in 3D printing initiatives can serve as a force for social mobility – not only allowing communities to learn valuable STEM principles but also empowering communities to support themselves and others through the creation of 3D printed products. 

Team

Rory Larson, the chief architect, is a bring to market rapid prototyping expert with 10 years of experience in engineering, CAD, 3D printing, CNC and small batch production manufacturing. His previous projects have included a robotic agrobot system, an autonomous driving module,  a fully-funded Kickstarter expandable and affordable 3D printer, and a digital library of thousands of jewelry charms for the largest U.S.-based accessory company.

Growth Through Key Partnerships 

Our engaged user community has provided feedback that has informed several 3D printed iterations of the mask and four distinct designs: the Respirator, the Rapid, the Children's Respirator, and the Radius. The Radius reflects the culmination of that feedback and we are transitioning the manufacturing process to injection molding in order to enable us to scale and provide a cost-effective solution across the globe.  

As we prepare to manufacture and distribute the masks, we are partnering with incredible organizations across the nation, ensuring we can leverage their skills, expertise, and invest in our economic stability. Our distribution partnerships have been selected based on their proven track record of success, expertise in their respective fields, and align with our nonprofit mission to support our local communities.  We're thrilled to be working with an incredible ecosystem of partners that provide top-notch service and industry-leading quality. 

 

By selecting one of the GOGO (Get one, give one!) backer tiers, you too can contribute to this success and allow us to provide donations to communities most in need: frontline employees, school children in low-income communities, agricultural workers, etc. 

Regulatory Approval and Certification 

The Radius was designed with the safety of the user in mind. It has been tested by Nelson Labs and the differential pressure of non-powered air-purifying particulate respirators was evaluated in accordance with 42 CFR Part 84.180. The air exchange differential or breathability of respirators was measured for inhalation resistance using NIOSH procedure TEB-APRSTP-0007 and exhalation resistance with NIOSH procedure TEB-APR-STP-0003.

Testing was performed in compliance with US FDA good manufacturing practice (GMP) regulations 21 CFR Parts 210, 211 and 820, and all test method acceptance criteria were met. 

Recognition

The original design received approval from the National Institute of Health (NIH) and within the first two weeks of launching, the design was downloaded over 100,000 times in 137 countries.

 

Connect With Us

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Twitter

 

For more information on testing, please visit our

compliance page makermask.com/compliance 

Risks and challenges

The safety of our community is our number one priority. We will ensure that the highest rated materials and protocols are used. If we determine a quality issue in our process, we will prioritize fixing it rather than meeting the timeline.

Currently, the budget we are targeting is based on the estimate provided by the injection molding companies we are evaluating. Final costs will be dependent on which vendor and materials are selected after testing is completed. 

Timeline for Delivery: We are dependent on our manufacturing and fulfillment partners’ schedules for delivery. If we receive more orders than we originally anticipated, our estimated delivery dates may be impacted. We will monitor throughout the campaign, work diligently to mitigate the likelihood of this happening, and communicate information promptly.

Cost: We want to ensure that the vendors we partner with are paying a fair and competitive wage.

If any such problems arise, we will keep all our backers updated with any changes to the schedule.

story:
Only 2 features!! 

First, the mites will bounce up by tapping them.

Secondly, the electric spark will kill the mites.

This is how you kill the invisible dust mites.

 

 

 

TEOM weighs 980g! very light~

 

Broadcasting appearance video

 

 

 

Broadcasting appearance video URL

-> https://www.facebook.com/kingmitekiller/?ref=bo...

 

Anytime, anywhere with TEOM!!

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

Q&A

 

1. What is TEOM?

- TEOM is a bedding cleaner that help you get rid of dust mites and bed bugs.

2. How does TEOM work?

- Using Solenoid motors and electric wire mesh, TEOM capture and kill dust mites.

3. Does TEOM really kill dust mites?

- TEOM produce a voltage of 2,000V when dust mites are caught in its electric wire mesh in the bottom and they are killed by the electric shock.

4. Can we really see the dust mites dead with our bare eyes?

- When dust mites are touched on the wire mesh, it generates spark. Sparks are the evidence of elimination of dust mites.

5. How can you be so sure that sparks mean the sign of dead bugs? What if it occurs because of hair or dead skin cells or dust?

- For Sparks to be generated, there should be some amount of H2O. Human hair and dead skin cells do not contain enough amount for sparks, not to mention dust. Therefore, we can be sure that sparks are generated by H2O that is contained in dust mites and bed bugs.

6. What about shipping cost?

- Shipping cost may vary depending on the delivery address for your order. Maximum shipping cost is $50.00. If the destination is in a “hard place to deliver to”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs can be applied. Please note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove impossible to deliver. If you wanna know whether your destination is the case, Please feel free to contact us before placing order via email(kingmitekiller@gmail.com)

7. What is a starting price and What is the incentive rewards?

- Fundraising rewards start at $79-a TEOM and A charger included. Other accessories vary depending on the fundraising levels. For more details, please see our fundraising page.

8. What is TEOM mainly used for?

- You can use TEOM to clean every fabric you have such as beds, carpets, couches you think have bugs.   

9. How can I get more information about TEOM?

- For more information on TEOM, please visit ​https://www.facebook.com/kingmitekiller/?ref=bookmarks.

story:
Professional Results

Made with lemongrass and natural ingredients, this highly concentrated formula will condition your skin & beard for an ultra close, smooth shave. Try it for a week and you'll FEEL the difference.

Easy to pack for travel. TSA friendly.


Ethics

Paraben-free, vegan friendly, cruelty-free. Eco-friendly, clean manufacturing.


Our Story

Salons and retail stores have neglected men. Old style barbershops are making a comeback, but don't deliver to home or office. We were determined to provide better grooming options for men. It was a requirement that we eat our own dog food.

After 2 years of development, we are prepared to release a premium line of natural hair care, shaving, and skin care products for men. Shaving Cream will be our first release in mid-2019, followed by additional products through 2020.

Natural ingredients are carefully hand-picked for quality and freshness, then extracted in-house to preserve in its purest form. With over 40 years of experience in the health and beauty industry, our team proudly stands behind the quality of each product.


Operating Philosophy

We are a private business, owned and operated by men. This distinction cannot be understated.

Companies like Gillette, Dollar Shave Club, Harry's, and Bonobos are publicly traded and/or have taken investment capital. The disposition of their teams include feminist voices and social justice warriors, and their actions reinforce the emasculation of men.

The MEN'S HAIR team answers to NO ONE except our loyal customers. We operate with the alpha mindset. No betas or soy boys were employed in the making of our products.

Gillette's "Toxic Masculinity" Ad Campaign Backfires Spectacularly

Dollar Shave Club - In Defense of the Newly Feminist Dad

Harry’s Razors deletes tweet calling for ‘NEW DEFINITION OF MASCULINITY’

Bonobos Responds To #MeToo With A Campaign To Evolve The Definition Of Masculinity


Gillette's Worst Nightmare

Talk about throwing your core demographic under the bus. Gillette's attempt to stereotype, shame, and preach to men backfired tremendously. It is clear from the outside looking in that there are pro-feminist voices shaping the company's marketing strategy. The director of the commercial, Kim Gehrig, is known for creating feminist style ads that have a social justice bent.

 
Gillette's ad features Ana Kasparian (0:40) from the Young Turks. Here's a clip of her in action. Should this woman tell men how to live their lives?
 

That idiotic Gillette ad may have turned the tide on ‘toxic masculinity’
 
This is Why P&G Doesn’t Care If Males Are Hurt By Their Ads



Make Men Masculine Again

Masculinity was never toxic to begin with. Men have defended nations, sacrificed life and limb, built lasting monuments, and invented technologies that have made our lives easier. They do the dirty work such as digging ditches, fixing broken pipes, and hauling trash. And oh, did we mention in their spare time they are doting fathers, loving husbands, faithful sons, and loyal brothers?

 

"A society that emasculates its men will eventually be replaced by a society that doesn't." - Paul Joseph Watson

 

Men Are Getting A Raw Deal

Men's rights and issues are largely ignored by society and the mainstream media. The MEN'S HAIR company pledges to support content creators and influencers who actively work to improve the mental and physical health, livelihoods, and reputation of men.



How You Can Help

This crowdfunding campaign provides the runway needed to accelerate the launch of the MEN'S HAIR company. Given the current business, social, and political climates, it is imperative that we execute with urgency. To date, we have NOT accepted venture capital, so as to remain independent in our philosophy and operations.

Help us become Gillette's Worst Nightmare. Let's build a company that will directly compete and take away their market share.

Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Please spread the message.

Thank you for your support.

 

​Contact Us

For business and media inquiries, send a message.


​Credits

Special thanks to those who have volunteered their time and resources to make this possible.

Mark Szorady
YogiOabs
