story:
☞  gammabrainpills.com  ☜

__________________________________________________________________

Nice to meet you.

Hi, Marshal and Brad here. We live in Austin, Texas. We are fun, passionate individuals who believe in making the world a better place and that starts with helping each other. Here at GAMMA, we believe that your mental health is as important as your physical health. So, we set out to make a naturally derived neural pathway supplement that supports your brain function and health.

What about the Ingredients?

Let's get down to brass tacks. Here's a quick list of our beneficial ingredients.

Each ingredient in GAMMA was thoughtfully picked to deliver the best possible stack for optimal performance. Similar in qualities, yet each brings its own specialty to the table. The GAMMA "stack" is designed for balance and neural release creating one of the best nootropics on the market today.   

What our clients are saying.

Here's the playbook.   

Ok IndieGoGo fam, here is a breakdown of how your donation will be used:

The total amount we are trying to raise is $20,000. The full amount will be going to the GMP facility. That's right, the whole $20,000 will be used to open the doors of production. That means you will have effectively contributed to making this dream of ours a reality.

Check out some of the awesome perks you'll get based on your level of donation:

                                                                                         ➪           ➪           ➪            ➪

                                                                                         ➪           ➪           ➪            ➪

The Impact.  

It's no secret that our society's intellectual standard has dropped a tad bit. We find ourselves more impressed with the persona that we portray online than our actual reality.  While GAMMA won't completely solve our plummeting IQ scores, it will certainly help to ameliorate the trend.

Our goal is to bring awareness to our social and mental epidemic. Shine a light on the fact that our mental health is just as important as our physical health. We should be eating the right nutritious foods that promote brain activity and of course, taking supplements like GAMMA that support both said habits. Let us be clear, social media is a great tool especially when it is used correctly in a balanced routine/lifestyle. Join us BACKER WARRIORS as we aim to unlock the limitless potential of our minds!

In The Know.

Some of you are probably not familiar with what a nootropic is, and why you should be taking a nootropic supplement like GAMMA. Simply put, nootropics incorporate natural or synthetic antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, amino acids, fatty acids, and other herbal ingredients combined ("stacked") together in order to improve cognitive performance.  

The very first synthesized nootropic – a substance that inspired researcher C.E. Giurgea to coin the term “nootropic” and conceptualize the category of cognitive enhancers in the first place – was Piracetam. All modern "racetams" derive from Piracetam. Why did I tell you this? Because 2 of our main ingredients in GAMMA include racetams!

As well as knowing what racetams are, it is also useful to understand what they are not:

They are not stimulants, for instance, and don’t aim to affect the stimulating neurotransmitters that often bring side effects such as anxiety, insomnia, or the jitters, which is what other nootropic supplements can do. 

Speaking of the competition, let's take a look at some key ingredients our competitors are using in their nootropics that you need to watch out for... 

So Why Take GAMMA?

Below is a simulation of a neuron sending a signal to another neuron.  A single neural link can fire 5 - 50 times every second! If you extrapolate that between all the neural links in your brain, you can fire between 50 - 1,000 Trillion synapses (no that is not a typo). In case you didn't notice, that is a HUGE difference! The stronger the links the better and more often the synapses fire. 

When you take GAMMA, the link between neural pathways gets stronger i.e. a better signal can be delivered. Below is a simulation of how GAMMA starts working over a 10 day period. 

A good nootropic is not a "quick fix". As we said earlier, it is not a stimulant and therefore it takes some time to take effect. Our formula is strategically designed to cross the blood/brain barrier and over time you will start to peak. 

Below is a breakdown of what each ingredient does for the brain: 

SASSAFRAS- It is the natural delivery mechanism for our formula. Safrole, the main ingredient found in sassafras is an acetylcholine "AChE" inhibitor. Choline is what helps keeps you alert. It is the building block of memory formation. Clinical studies have also shown that sassafras inhibits cancer in lab rats. 

GREEN TEA LEAF- Being rich in antioxidants, Green Tea Leaf helps reduce oxidative stress by fighting cell damage caused by free radicals. Furthermore, it increases the cognitive capacity for memory by enhancing the connection between different receptors of the brain.

GUARANA- Rich in caffeine, reducing fatigue, and improving focus. Adenosine is a compound that makes you feel drowsy and helps your brain relax. The caffeine found in guarana blocks the effects of adenosine by binding to the receptors and preventing them from being activated.

ANIRACETAM- Part of the racetam family. Aniracetam acts as a positive modulator and decreases the rate of receptor desensitization. It also targets specific serotonin and dopamine receptors increasing mood and behavior while alleviating depression. It also helps increase the levels of our natural neurotransmitter, acetylcholine. 

GLUTATHIONE- A powerful antioxidant that is naturally produced in the body. Parkinson's and Alzheimer's disease are both linked to oxidative stress and low levels of glutathione. Increased levels of glutathione in the body have been linked to improving cognitive function and assisting users diagnosed with OCD, ADHD, IBS, autism, AND cancer. Increasing the levels of this antioxidant in your body may help slow or ameliorate the progression of these neurodegenerative disorders.

L-THEANINE- Derived from green tea leaf and fungi. L-Theanine acts as a calming agent, reducing anxiety while boosting the brain's dopamine levels. It is synergistic with caffeine, helping to alleviate the 'edge' found in stimulants while promoting cognition and attention.

THEOBROMINE- Theobromine comes from the cacoa plant, which is used to make chocolate. Promoting heart health, theobromine naturally lowers blood pressure. Like caffeine, it is a stimulant, boosting alertness and improving concentration. Studies have shown that theobromine has been found to increase concentration and focus immediately following ingestion.

PHENYLPIRACETAM- Part of the racetam family. Phenylpiracetam possesses psychostimulatory properties that help decrease the rate of cognitive decline and enhance physical performance. It increases tolerance to pain and cold weather.

NOOPEPT- Developed from the core molecule in piracetam (proline) and combined with the structure of a neuropeptide. Noopept enters systemic and cerebral circulation with excellent bioavailability. It enhances mood and relieves stress.

GAMMA is about balance and quality. We have many "health hacks" that will enhance the effects and potency of our supplement.   

A Flexible Goal??

Yes, and what that means is, you are getting a bottle of GAMMA no matter if our goal is met or not! The reason? MOQ  (Minimum Order Quantity). The more support we have from you the less money it will cost us to get GAMMA to you. This, in turn, allows us to offer very competitive prices and deliver GAMMA to you at the best price possible.

We need your help to make this passion of ours a reality.

By donating to our campaign you will be helping us get to the assembly line. Yep, our next step is the packaging. This is done in a GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) facility. Here, our naturally derived ingredients are sourced, 3rd party tested, portioned, bottled, labeled, sealed, and sent out for delivery! That might sound easy but it's not. There is a lot that goes into this process. We do like to have fun but we take this part very seriously because this is how we deliver a quality product to you!

Here's a look at our timeline map: 

Risks & Challenges

Some of the ingredients in GAMMA are considered controversial. We would like to shed some light on the topic to better equip you with accurate knowledge and to challenge you to dig deeper to find the truth about each ingredient. 

We are aware that the FDA does not approve of some of the ingredients in GAMMA, specifically, Sassafras, Phenylpiracetam, Aniracetam, and Noopept.  

The truth is, Sassafras has been used for thousands of years and is a natural key component to help deliver nutrients to the body. Additionally, it blocks the degradation of acetylcholine, a main neurotransmitter produced in the body responsible for multiple functions including memory and learning.

Additionally, the racetams are used in other countries as prescription medicines and only here in the states are they labeled as experimental.

FAQ

How do you maximize the effects of GAMMA? - Eating healthy foods like blueberries, almonds, and omega oils that directly deliver nutrients to the brain.

Can I take GAMMA with my coffee? - Absolutely! GAMMA was designed to accommodate you current lifestyle. Our ingredient L-Theanine helps balance your intake of stimulants by alleviating that common "edge."  

What's the best way to use GAMMA? - In order to get the most out of our product, we highly recommend maintaining a healthy balanced lifestyle. That entails eating a healthy balanced diet, exercising at least 3-4 times a week, AND getting plenty of rest. It is important to listen to your body. It will tell you what you need! The effectiveness of Gamma will only be enhanced when you maintain a healthy lifestyle. 

Who is GAMMA for? - Gamma is for individuals who are looking for a performance boost in their daily life. It gives people the ability to deliver extreme focus & alertness in their day to day activities. Whether it's focusing on school studies, creating a proposal for work, staying sharp in your gaming, or simply focusing on Yoga poses.

When do I take GAMMA? - The best time to take your GAMMA supplement is 30 - 45 minutes before your first meal. This will allow the supplement to absorb quickly into your body. Due to its stimulating properties, we do not recommend taking this product at night before bed.

For any other questions, just drop us a line! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have the means to support us financially? That's ok! There are many other ways you can contribute to our cause. One awesome way to contribute would be to spread the word online and to your friends and family. Word of mouth is a powerful tool, so spread the word!

story:
*All contributors will have their order shipped within ONE DAY!

**Get ahead of your hangover for less than less $4.00 a night (as low as $2 for larger purchases)

 

Our Story

What if there was a way to prevent hangover symptoms from even starting?  Recoverthol is the world’s first liquid supplement that can be added to alcoholic drinks without affecting the taste.

After years of research and development we launched Recoverthol in Australia in 2018 with a large following of satisfied customers.  Please help us to take Recoverthol to the rest of the world by supporting our global expansion.

Unlike other liver tonic-based hangover products that contain herbal ingredients to alleviate the symptoms of alcohol consumption, Recoverthol only contains fuel for the enzymes involved in alcohol metabolism.

Recoverthol has been specifically designed to be added into alcoholic drinks so that the necessary fuel can reach the enzymes at the same time as alcohol. This is a world-first innovation in hangover management which promotes the more efficient metabolism of alcohol whilst you are drinking.

 
**All 40 contributors will have their products shipped within one week!
 

Other hangover prevention products on the market attempt to tackle symptoms the next day (when they are in full swing) or at the end of a night of drinking when the damage is already done.

Recoverthol is different as it starts to work right from the time you start drinking and assists in avoiding the development of hangover symptoms from the outset.

Some of our customers have also reported that Recoverthol assists in reducing the symptoms of Alcohol flush syndrome (Asian Flush) which is caused by the build up of toxins associated with alcohol consumption (i.e. acetaldehyde).

 

 

Recoverthol allows you to get ahead of hangover symptoms by providing an extra boost of cofactors and coenzymes that your body needs naturally to process alcohol efficiently.

No more having to take awful tasting shots or fizzy, sugary drinks the next morning when you are already feeling the pain of hangover symptoms (e.g. headache, nausea and tiredness).  You will be able to handle next day activities (such as spending time with the kids) with a lot more energy and vigour!  

We have great customer reviews. Recoverthol could be the solution for you!

 

 

Research and Development

Recoverthol is the brainchild of an Australian pharmacist and has been developed and manufactured entirely in Australia. Recoverthol is more than just a ‘me-too’ liver tonic like most other hangover products on the market that contain long lists of vitamins and exotic ingredients.

Alarmingly, there is little to no scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of these ingredients, yet people still buy these products in the hope of finding a golden bullet. 

Recoverthol was formulated on the basis of the science of alcohol metabolism.  For the scientists out there, Recoverthol supplies additional cofactors and co-enzymes that are the fuel for the Alcohol Dehydrogenase (ADH) enzyme to process alcohol.

Recoverthol has been specifically designed to be added to alcoholic drinks so that these cofactors and co-enzymes can reach the ADH enzyme at the same time as alcohol.

 

 

We are dedicated to educating people about how to look after yourself whilst you get the most out of life. We all like to let our hair down from time to time and enjoy the company of friends over a few drinks.

Recoverthol was formulated to assist in preventing hangover symptoms before they begin, allowing you to enjoy yourself and to get the most out of the next day.  

 

Why use Recoverthol?

Recoverthol is superior and more convenient in comparison to other hangover products because:

  • It has a unique delivery method which involves SNAPPING and SQUEEZING a small liquid supplement into a drink.
  • The formulation is clear, and when added to alcohol it is odourless and tasteless. It will not affect the taste of your drink.
  • Recoverthol is taken when you start drinking (not before or after) so that you can get ahead of your hangover symptoms before they even begin. 
  • No additional fillers. 
  • Each dose is a small 2ml liquid vial that can easily fit into your pocket or handbag. 
  • Recoverthol is TGA (Therapeutic Goods Administration - Australia) listed and manufactured in Australia in a TGA and FDA approved facility to ensure the ingredients and manufacturing processes are of the highest quality and standard.
  • Anecdotal evidence suggests that Recoverthol may assist in reducing the symptoms of Asian flush (alcohol flush syndrome).

 

Encouraging a responsible drinking culture

Recoverthol is a hangover management product in one sense, but it’s also about giving you the tools to better manage your drinking habits.  We have created a free (drinks calculator) mobile app (for iOS and android users) that is a great tool for encouraging you to learn more about and improve your drinking habits.  

                                         

The Recoverthol App is a self-quantifying tool that you can use to predict the effect of alcoholic beverages on your body (based on weight and gender) prior to drinking.  It keeps a track of how many standard drinks you have consumed so that you can stick to recommended safe drinking guidelines. 

The app also calculates the time to sober so that the user can estimate what time they would need to stop drinking in order to be sober for work the next day OR to allow for a good night’s sleep.

Did you know that if a 60kg female drinks two glasses of white wine, it will take over six hours to clear out of her body?  Try the app for yourself today.

The potential upside of learning more about your drinking habits and using a product like Recoverthol is being able to boost your productivity the next day.  No one likes to waste the day after having a few drinks the night before and this is where Recoverthol can be a game-changer in improving both well-being and productivity.

Recoverthol has a number of trademarks and patents that protect the intellectual property of the product and its delivery method.

 

Recoverthol in the Media

Check out the following National Nine news story about Recoverthol. Channel Nine is a major commercial free-to-air network in Australia.

 

Recoverthol has also received the Thumbs Up award from Mum Central, Australia’s premier lifestyle hub for women with a love for parenting and lifestyle, beauty and fashion, food and travel.

 

Other articles:

http://threadsnetwork.com/brisbane/goodbye-hang...

https://mumcentral.com.au/recoverthol-review-ha...

https://www.traveldailymedia.com/recoverthol/

https://www.stylingyou.com.au/2019/01/replenish...

How you can help us and what we can offer

Recoverthol is currently being sold on our Recoverthol website.  The purpose of this funding campaign is to build brand awareness about the product in overseas markets.  We would like to offer you the opportunity to try the product for yourself.   

The proof is definitely in the pudding!

Many people are skeptical of so-called 'hangover cures' so we want you to try it for yourself as we know you will love it!  We already have a number of happy customers as you can see from our facebook reviews where we have an average rating of 5 stars!!

 

   

 

We are looking to raise AUD$15,000 which will go towards building brand awareness overseas and contributing to product registration costs.

**All contributors will have their products shipped within ONE DAY!

As part of this crowdfunding campaign we are offering various quantities of Recoverthol at greatly reduced prices (RRP is $20.00 for a box of 4 vials). 

  • 2 boxes for $30.00 (25% discount - $3.75 per vial)
  • 6 boxes for $84.00  (30% discount - $3.50 per vial)
  • 12 boxes for $156.00   (35% discount - $3.25 per vial)
  • 24 boxes for $288.00  (40% discount - $3.00 per vial)
  • 48 boxes for $528.00  (45% discount - $2.75 per vial)
  • 250 boxes for $5,000 (50% discount - $2.50 per vial) - Distributor Sampler Pack
  • 5,000 boxes for $40,000 (60% discount - $2.00 per vial) - Exclusive Distribution Deal

It is recommended that you take 1-2 vials when you start drinking (i.e, in your first alcoholic drink).

There are shorter term plans in place (depending on the amount raised) to produce various packaging sizes, such as a single vial pack and two vial packs (see below).  These may also be followed by larger pack options such as a 10 or 20 vial pack offering.

If we are not able to reach our target we will simply scale back our marketing and brand building efforts.

 

What we hope to achieve

We want to allow people to be able to enjoy themselves and at the same time provide them with the means (through education and products like Recoverthol) to be able to better manage their relationship with alcohol. 

The product does not allow you to drink excessive amounts of alcohol and Recoverthol always encourages responsible drinking. 

Each year billions of dollars in lost economic activity are attributed to alcohol-related work place absenteeism and low productivity due to hangover symptoms.  We hope to contribute to being able to dramatically reduce this issue and improve the well-being of our customers.

 

What do we need to overcome

One of the biggest hurdles we will need to overcome is the skepticism that comes with "another" hangover product.  We strongly believe that Recoverthol is markedly different to other hangover products.

As a qualified pharmacist, I understand the root cause of hangover symptoms and Recoverthol has been designed specifically to prevent these symptoms from occurring.

If you are still skeptical then we are also offering a 100% money back guarantee as part of this campaign.  If you are not happy with the benefits of the product then we will refund 100% of the purchase price.

                                             

Our customers are our best advocates for the product as once they try Recoverthol they are excited to recommend its benefits to family and friend.  As much as possible, we want to build up an active and loyal customer base that will spread the word about Recoverthol and how it allows them to reclaim time typically lost to hangovers.

 

Are you interested in a wholesale distribution agreement?

We are more than willing to entertain wholesale agreements in any country where Recoverthol can be sold.  As mentioned previously we already have patents in place for a number of countries.

Please reach out to us using the contact details below or at sales@recoverthol.com.

 

Other ways you can help

We understand that perhaps being able to contribute to the Recoverthol campaign may not be possible for you at this stage, however, we would still love any assistance you can provide in spreading the word about Recoverthol.  

Please share this campaign with family and friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools and if you want to try Recoverthol for a very small outlay, then you can buy single vials of Recoverthol from our website.

Whatever action you decide to take in relation to this campaign, we thank you for your time and hope you will begin this journey with us.

 

Regards

The Recoverthol Team

info@recoverthol.com

www.facebook.com/recoverthol/
story_txt:
*All contributors will have their order shipped within ONE DAY!
**Get ahead of your hangover for less than less $4.00 a night (as low as $2 for larger purchases)
 
Our Story
What if there was a way to prevent hangover symptoms from even starting?  Recoverthol is the world’s first liquid supplement that can be added to alcoholic drinks without affecting the taste.
After years of research and development we launched Recoverthol in Australia in 2018 with a large following of satisfied customers.  Please help us to take Recoverthol to the rest of the world by supporting our global expansion.
Unlike other liver tonic-based hangover products that contain herbal ingredients to alleviate the symptoms of alcohol consumption, Recoverthol only contains fuel for the enzymes involved in alcohol metabolism.
Recoverthol has been specifically designed to be added into alcoholic drinks so that the necessary fuel can reach the enzymes at the same time as alcohol. This is a world-first innovation in hangover management which promotes the more efficient metabolism of alcohol whilst you are drinking.

 
**All 40 contributors will have their products shipped within one week!
 
Other hangover prevention products on the market attempt to tackle symptoms the next day (when they are in full swing) or at the end of a night of drinking when the damage is already done.
Recoverthol is different as it starts to work right from the time you start drinking and assists in avoiding the development of hangover symptoms from the outset.
Some of our customers have also reported that Recoverthol assists in reducing the symptoms of Alcohol flush syndrome (Asian Flush) which is caused by the build up of toxins associated with alcohol consumption (i.e. acetaldehyde).
 

 
Recoverthol allows you to get ahead of hangover symptoms by providing an extra boost of cofactors and coenzymes that your body needs naturally to process alcohol efficiently.
No more having to take awful tasting shots or fizzy, sugary drinks the next morning when you are already feeling the pain of hangover symptoms (e.g. headache, nausea and tiredness).  You will be able to handle next day activities (such as spending time with the kids) with a lot more energy and vigour!  

We have great customer reviews. Recoverthol could be the solution for you!
 

 
Research and Development
Recoverthol is the brainchild of an Australian pharmacist and has been developed and manufactured entirely in Australia. Recoverthol is more than just a ‘me-too’ liver tonic like most other hangover products on the market that contain long lists of vitamins and exotic ingredients.
Alarmingly, there is little to no scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of these ingredients, yet people still buy these products in the hope of finding a golden bullet. 
Recoverthol was formulated on the basis of the science of alcohol metabolism.  For the scientists out there, Recoverthol supplies additional cofactors and co-enzymes that are the fuel for the Alcohol Dehydrogenase (ADH) enzyme to process alcohol.
Recoverthol has been specifically designed to be added to alcoholic drinks so that these cofactors and co-enzymes can reach the ADH enzyme at the same time as alcohol.
 


 
We are dedicated to educating people about how to look after yourself whilst you get the most out of life. We all like to let our hair down from time to time and enjoy the company of friends over a few drinks.
Recoverthol was formulated to assist in preventing hangover symptoms before they begin, allowing you to enjoy yourself and to get the most out of the next day.  
 
Why use Recoverthol?
Recoverthol is superior and more convenient in comparison to other hangover products because:

It has a unique delivery method which involves SNAPPING and SQUEEZING a small liquid supplement into a drink.
The formulation is clear, and when added to alcohol it is odourless and tasteless. It will not affect the taste of your drink.
Recoverthol is taken when you start drinking (not before or after) so that you can get ahead of your hangover symptoms before they even begin. 
No additional fillers. 
Each dose is a small 2ml liquid vial that can easily fit into your pocket or handbag. 
Recoverthol is TGA (Therapeutic Goods Administration - Australia) listed and manufactured in Australia in a TGA and FDA approved facility to ensure the ingredients and manufacturing processes are of the highest quality and standard.
Anecdotal evidence suggests that Recoverthol may assist in reducing the symptoms of Asian flush (alcohol flush syndrome).

 
Encouraging a responsible drinking culture
Recoverthol is a hangover management product in one sense, but it’s also about giving you the tools to better manage your drinking habits.  We have created a free (drinks calculator) mobile app (for iOS and android users) that is a great tool for encouraging you to learn more about and improve your drinking habits.  
                                         
The Recoverthol App is a self-quantifying tool that you can use to predict the effect of alcoholic beverages on your body (based on weight and gender) prior to drinking.  It keeps a track of how many standard drinks you have consumed so that you can stick to recommended safe drinking guidelines. 
The app also calculates the time to sober so that the user can estimate what time they would need to stop drinking in order to be sober for work the next day OR to allow for a good night’s sleep.
Did you know that if a 60kg female drinks two glasses of white wine, it will take over six hours to clear out of her body?  Try the app for yourself today.

The potential upside of learning more about your drinking habits and using a product like Recoverthol is being able to boost your productivity the next day.  No one likes to waste the day after having a few drinks the night before and this is where Recoverthol can be a game-changer in improving both well-being and productivity.

Recoverthol has a number of trademarks and patents that protect the intellectual property of the product and its delivery method.
 
Recoverthol in the Media
Check out the following National Nine news story about Recoverthol. Channel Nine is a major commercial free-to-air network in Australia.

 
Recoverthol has also received the Thumbs Up award from Mum Central, Australia’s premier lifestyle hub for women with a love for parenting and lifestyle, beauty and fashion, food and travel.

 


Other articles:
http://threadsnetwork.com/brisbane/goodbye-hang...
https://mumcentral.com.au/recoverthol-review-ha...
https://www.traveldailymedia.com/recoverthol/
https://www.stylingyou.com.au/2019/01/replenish...
How you can help us and what we can offer
Recoverthol is currently being sold on our Recoverthol website.  The purpose of this funding campaign is to build brand awareness about the product in overseas markets.  We would like to offer you the opportunity to try the product for yourself.   
The proof is definitely in the pudding!
Many people are skeptical of so-called 'hangover cures' so we want you to try it for yourself as we know you will love it!  We already have a number of happy customers as you can see from our facebook reviews where we have an average rating of 5 stars!!
 
   
 
We are looking to raise AUD$15,000 which will go towards building brand awareness overseas and contributing to product registration costs.
**All contributors will have their products shipped within ONE DAY!
As part of this crowdfunding campaign we are offering various quantities of Recoverthol at greatly reduced prices (RRP is $20.00 for a box of 4 vials). 

2 boxes for $30.00 (25% discount - $3.75 per vial)
6 boxes for $84.00  (30% discount - $3.50 per vial)
12 boxes for $156.00   (35% discount - $3.25 per vial)
24 boxes for $288.00  (40% discount - $3.00 per vial)
48 boxes for $528.00  (45% discount - $2.75 per vial)
250 boxes for $5,000 (50% discount - $2.50 per vial) - Distributor Sampler Pack
5,000 boxes for $40,000 (60% discount - $2.00 per vial) - Exclusive Distribution Deal

It is recommended that you take 1-2 vials when you start drinking (i.e, in your first alcoholic drink).
There are shorter term plans in place (depending on the amount raised) to produce various packaging sizes, such as a single vial pack and two vial packs (see below).  These may also be followed by larger pack options such as a 10 or 20 vial pack offering.
If we are not able to reach our target we will simply scale back our marketing and brand building efforts.

 

What we hope to achieve
We want to allow people to be able to enjoy themselves and at the same time provide them with the means (through education and products like Recoverthol) to be able to better manage their relationship with alcohol. 
The product does not allow you to drink excessive amounts of alcohol and Recoverthol always encourages responsible drinking. 

Each year billions of dollars in lost economic activity are attributed to alcohol-related work place absenteeism and low productivity due to hangover symptoms.  We hope to contribute to being able to dramatically reduce this issue and improve the well-being of our customers.
 

What do we need to overcome
One of the biggest hurdles we will need to overcome is the skepticism that comes with "another" hangover product.  We strongly believe that Recoverthol is markedly different to other hangover products.
As a qualified pharmacist, I understand the root cause of hangover symptoms and Recoverthol has been designed specifically to prevent these symptoms from occurring.
If you are still skeptical then we are also offering a 100% money back guarantee as part of this campaign.  If you are not happy with the benefits of the product then we will refund 100% of the purchase price.
                                             
Our customers are our best advocates for the product as once they try Recoverthol they are excited to recommend its benefits to family and friend.  As much as possible, we want to build up an active and loyal customer base that will spread the word about Recoverthol and how it allows them to reclaim time typically lost to hangovers.
 
Are you interested in a wholesale distribution agreement?
We are more than willing to entertain wholesale agreements in any country where Recoverthol can be sold.  As mentioned previously we already have patents in place for a number of countries.
Please reach out to us using the contact details below or at sales@recoverthol.com.
 

Other ways you can help
We understand that perhaps being able to contribute to the Recoverthol campaign may not be possible for you at this stage, however, we would still love any assistance you can provide in spreading the word about Recoverthol.  
Please share this campaign with family and friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools and if you want to try Recoverthol for a very small outlay, then you can buy single vials of Recoverthol from our website.
Whatever action you decide to take in relation to this campaign, we thank you for your time and hope you will begin this journey with us.
 
Regards
The Recoverthol Team
info@recoverthol.com
www.facebook.com/recoverthol/

story:
Robotic Grasp Assist

 

Auxiliary glove that helps paralyzed fingers grasp

Neomano is a wearable, soft robotic hand created by Neofect that enables and empowers people with hand paralysis to perform daily activities. It fits over the thumb, index, and middle finger while leaving the other fingers and part of the hand uncovered. With the use of Neomano, people with hand paralysis have the ability to move their fingers in order to perform daily activities like hold and drink a cup of water, brush their teeth, or turn a doorknob to open a door. It does this by providing active grasp to maintain grip, followed by passive release. Neomano helps people gain independence and confidence in performing everyday tasks.

 

 

 

Who can use Neomano​?

 

The Neomano is helpful for people with movement in their wrist and arm but little to no strength in their hands. This includes people who suffer from hand paralysis due to spinal cord injury (SCI), stroke, Lou Gehrig's disease (ALS), multiple sclerosis, cerebral palsy and nerve injury. Please note that the range of product use may differ by the diagnosis and individual hand function. Learn more.

 

 

How does Neomano affect your life?

 

  • Users can grasp a knife and exert force onto the utensil to cut food, such as fruits. 
  • Users can grasp a fork to pick up food and have a meal. 
  • Users can grasp a spoon to lift food and have a meal. 
  • If the wrist functions properly, Users can grasp a water bottle to pour water into a cup. Users can hold a cup to drink water.
     

​ ​

  • Users can hold a bottle and open the lid.  
     

  • Users can grasp a pen to write texts or a signature.
     

  • Users can hold a cup and feed a dog.  
     

  •  Users can hold a golf club to putt a golf ball.
     

  • Users can hold a smart phone and take photos.  
     

  •  Users can grasp a medicine bottle and open a cap. 
     

  • Users can grasp a leash and take a dog for a walk.

 Other Activities that Users Can Do with Neomano! 

  • Users can hold a toothbrush to brush their teeth.
  • Users can hold a razor to shave.
  • Users can hold a makeup brush to apply cosmetics.
  • Users can hold a hair comb to brush their hair.  
  • Users can grab a brush to paint a picture.
  • Users can read a book as they flip the pages.
  • Users can hold a cellphone to make a phone call.

 

Expert Testimonials


Ulisses Jara-Manual, Rachel’s Therapist  

"When I first saw the Neomano device, I just immediately thought it would be helpful for somebody like Rachel. My hope with the glove is that she is going to eventually gain a whole lot more dexterity. Being able to pick up things with more ease is gonna be really significant. So now with this Neomano device, she can do more detailed stuff with her hands."

 

 


Kenneth Noto, Mark’s Therapist.  

"This (Neomano) will help him and enable him to hold onto things and let go without him using that voluntary contraction that has become weak. That's really an aid to his disability."

 


Lauren Sheehan, Occupational Therapist  

"It's been interesting because it's so individualized. We can't guess at what the patients would potentially be able to use the tool for. From very simple activities in daily living like eating, taking a top off of a container that they use, golfing, and using it for exercise. You know the activities that are fun. Again, we're bringing it to their lives."

 

Why Neomano?

 

First, Neomano allows people to do a variety of everyday tasks with a single device. 

Daily tasks can be difficult for people that don't have full functionality from their hand, which is why many rely on assistive devices or caregivers. Neomano allows people to return to their daily-living activities and hobbies.

 

Second, with the wide-array of functional uses, Neomano boosts confidence. 

The grasp pattern provides the independence needed to perform tasks single-handedly, allowing people to move forward with their lives.

 

Third, the Neomano design is comfortable enough
to be worn in multiple types of situations. 

The partial glove design allows tactile sensory input to part of the palm and exposed fingers, and the leather allows for flexibility needed for everyday tasks. Neomano can be used by people both in the comfort of their own homes and in public.

 

 

 

The Red Dot Design Award is the world’s largest design competition.
The Red Dot : Best of the Best is awarded for groundbreaking design and is the top prize.

 

 

In the PRESS​

 

     

     

    Neomano Components

     

     

    • Three fingers + aluminum splint on the thumb to enable different degrees of gripping strength. 
      With the aluminum splint on the thumb, the position of the thumb can be easily manipulated. The index and middle finger can also be adjusted to form a C-shaped grip for larger objects, and a pinch grip for smaller objects. The motor allows the fingers to bend and provide various degrees of gripping strength, along with passive release.
       

     

    • Index finger assistive strap helps prevent ankylosis (stiffening). 
      The glove is equipped with an assistive strap, made of neoprene fabric, on the back of the index finger to adjust the degree of tension. This helps people who suffer from finger stiffening maintain a better hand position for functional use. 
       

    • Anti-slip silicone coating on the palm + fingers. The silicone coat on the palm and fingers helps provide a firmer grip on objects and prevents slipping. 
    • Partial glove design. The exposed fingers and palm were designed to provide tactile sensory input.

     

     

    • Actuation of the motor and pulley. 
      The Bluetooth wireless remote control (not pictured) enables the grip and release of the Neomano, powered by 3 AAA batteries that hook into the glove via the motor. When activated, the Grip button flexes the fingers to provide a gripping gesture. The Release button loosens the wires, allowing the hand to return to its original neutral position. The wire is highly elastic, which helps maintain wire integrity despite repetitive winding and loosening.
       
    • Magnets make motor attachment and detachment simple. 
      When the glove is not being used and powered by the motor, the motor can easily be detached by carefully pulling it away from the magnets on the glove. This allows people to easily transition from active to passive use of the glove.
       
    • Power source for pairing with Bluetooth remote control. 
      The power source has a button. The button will pair the Bluetooth remote control to the motor for wireless control of the glove. 

     

     

    • Wireless bluetooth remote control directs movement of the glove. The Grip button will activate the wires within the glove to begin to wind and will create a tighter grip the longer its held down. The Release button loosens the wires, which allows the hand to return to it's original neutral position. 

     

     

    • Arm bands to secure power supply to glove. Two arm bands help to securely and comfortably attach the power supply to the glove. The extra arm band can be used to secure the Bluetooth remote control, if desired. 

     

     

     

    Neomano Size Chart

     

    • To find your size: Please measure from the wrist line to the tip of your middle finger as shown above. Product size is very critical for proper function of Neomano so please measure correctly.

     

     

    Tech Specification

     

      **Note: The tech spec and design can be changed in the future while developing the product. Please note this.

     

     

    Neomano Team

     

    Our team is dedicated to empowering people to regain hand and upper limb function back. By combining multiple experts, we have brought diverse experience to design and develop our newest creation, Neomano. Neomano aims to improve quality of life by providing independence in the form of a soft robotic hand. Learn more about the team behind Neomano!

     

     

    Follow us

     

     

     

     

     

    Timeline

     

     

    Risks and challenges

    The major challenge of this project is to deliver the best size guide for you to choose the right one. Please carefully read and consider the size chart before you choose the size to order.

    Other than that, our best teams in South Korea, Germany, and U.S. have full control over every step of the Neomano project with 8 years of experience in developing, manufacturing, and selling high-quality Smart Rehabilitation devices worldwide,

    We have successfully completed multiple beta-tests of the design and function with patients and hospitals. The alignment with production and delivery channels have been set towards production and shipment, which will be in June of 2019.

    If there are any expected delays related to production and delivery, we will let you know in advance. We are passionately ready and dedicated to helping you regain your hand mobility and improve your quality of life.

story:
Welcome. We are so glad you are here.

Thank you for taking the time to check out our page! Please read on to see if joining our community is right for you.  Let us know if you have any questions! -Tiff & Jo

For an organization, a vision should be something to always strive towards— an ultimate goal either for their business or the world. We truly believe in our vision. How amazing would it be if every woman loved her body? How wonderful would it be if all women moved their body because they love it and not because they hate it? At Athena, we want to use our mission to work towards making this vision a reality.

What does it mean to "redefine feminine focus"? At Athena, we want to shift much of what we've been taught about female bodies and worth.  We want to move our focus from grinding and hustling for six-pack abs or a bigger or better booty to creating community while loving ourselves and learning what works best for our bodies. 

At Athena, we have been thoughtfully building a team that will live our mission every day and embody the values that are important to us.

Go here to learn more about Les Mills fitness classes. Go here to read more information about salt therapy benefits or here for research.

On top of monthly memberships, Athena will have the option for single-day drop-ins and 10 or 20 Class Pass Packs. 

The last thing you might be wondering is, when is this all happening?!  When are we opening?

We would love to be open by January 1, 2020.  Things are moving quickly and we have everything lined up to be on track.  That said, as with any big project, unexpected issues may come up that prevent us from being open right on the first.  Our best answer is sometime in January 2020.  We will be giving updates as often as we can.  Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the day to day stuff.  

And last, but not least, meet our investor team!

Risks and Challenges

We have been working tirelessly for the past two years to develop a business plan for Athena. We have analyzed, crunched, and pinched every number to make sure our plan is viable. We’ve spent years getting to know our fitness and wellness community inside and out and know that our area can benefit from what Athena is offering. We searched for almost a year to find just the right location before executing our lease and starting our build. We also understand that this is a start-up company, and no matter how much planning we’ve done, potential risks and challenges may lie ahead.

1. What if you buy a membership you don’t use?

Research suggests that people are far more likely to use their gym membership consistently when they workout with friends. Relationship and community are the backbone of Athena and something we believe is missing from other fitness centers. Is it possible that you won’t use your membership? Sure, but we’ll do everything we can to provide you with the support you need to keep working toward your health and fitness goals.

2. What qualifies us to successfully operate a fitness studio?

Tiffany and Joanna have nearly 20 combined years of experience in the fitness industry. Through their involvement with local fitness facilities, they have learned what works and what doesn’t when it comes to effective leadership and building and maintaining relationships with members. In addition to her experience in the fitness industry, Tiffany has a background in small business management and operations through her partnership in a thriving local restaurant chain for the past seven years.

Please read on to see if joining our community is right for you.  Let us know if you have any questions! -Tiff & JoFor an organization, a vision should be something to always strive towards— an ultimate goal either for their business or the world. We truly believe in our vision. How amazing would it be if every woman loved her body? How wonderful would it be if all women moved their body because they love it and not because they hate it? At Athena, we want to use our mission to work towards making this vision a reality.What does it mean to "redefine feminine focus"? At Athena, we want to shift much of what we've been taught about female bodies and worth.  We want to move our focus from grinding and hustling for six-pack abs or a bigger or better booty to creating community while loving ourselves and learning what works best for our bodies. At Athena, we have been thoughtfully building a team that will live our mission every day and embody the values that are important to us.Go here to learn more about Les Mills fitness classes. Go here to read more information about salt therapy benefits or here for research.On top of monthly memberships, Athena will have the option for single-day drop-ins and 10 or 20 Class Pass Packs. The last thing you might be wondering is, when is this all happening?!  When are we opening?We would love to be open by January 1, 2020.  Things are moving quickly and we have everything lined up to be on track.  That said, as with any big project, unexpected issues may come up that prevent us from being open right on the first.  Our best answer is sometime in January 2020.  We will be giving updates as often as we can.  Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the day to day stuff.  And last, but not least, meet our investor team!Risks and ChallengesWe have been working tirelessly for the past two years to develop a business plan for Athena. We have analyzed, crunched, and pinched every number to make sure our plan is viable. We’ve spent years getting to know our fitness and wellness community inside and out and know that our area can benefit from what Athena is offering. We searched for almost a year to find just the right location before executing our lease and starting our build. We also understand that this is a start-up company, and no matter how much planning we’ve done, potential risks and challenges may lie ahead.1. What if you buy a membership you don’t use? Research suggests that people are far more likely to use their gym membership consistently when they workout with friends. Relationship and community are the backbone of Athena and something we believe is missing from other fitness centers. Is it possible that you won’t use your membership? Sure, but we’ll do everything we can to provide you with the support you need to keep working toward your health and fitness goals.2. What qualifies us to successfully operate a fitness studio? Tiffany and Joanna have nearly 20 combined years of experience in the fitness industry. Through their involvement with local fitness facilities, they have learned what works and what doesn’t when it comes to effective leadership and building and maintaining relationships with members. In addition to her experience in the fitness industry, Tiffany has a background in small business management and operations through her partnership in a thriving local restaurant chain for the past seven years.

story:
OVERVIEW

Refreshment is important for your body and soul. After an exhausting workout, a pleasant shower relaxes the muscles and turns off the mind. But what about the annoying self-closing push buttons? Filipper Grip.

  • It holds the button for you
  • It stores your most important things
  • It’s a compact, eye-catching sidekick

 

 

 

5 seconds of flowing water, 5 seconds of swearing. We all know that the button always needs to be pushed. You can get the perfect solution which solves this problem through revolutionary technology and unique design. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Filipper Grip has two 60 ml storage compartments for your shower gel and shampoo. Easy and quick dispensing is not just a dream anymore.

 

 

 

 

Keep your locker key or chipcard safe. You can avoid dirty floors and thieves with the hidden storage. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've teamed up with the One Tree Planted non-profit organization because we believe our planet needs help. We decided to plant a tree after each Filipper Grip sold. Would you like to prevent floods and provide habitat for many animals and plants? Help us save the environment!

 

 

 

 

 

Attaching, operation or deposition is easier than you think. Applying: 5 seconds, removing: 10 seconds. Operation: as long as you want.

 

 

  1. Push the Filipper Grip onto the tiles next to the shower tap.
  2. Turn the handle (shower gel storage) over the push button.
  3. Press down firmly on the handle while it is pressed against the push button.
  4. Pull the push button holder forcefully toward you.  

 

 

 

Tile, vinyl, beadboard, glass, metal? No problem. Filipper Grip sticks on almost any surface.

 

 

 

 

 

Size: It fits in your bag, but has more space inside than you think.

Shape: Exclusive sports car? Modern record player? Neither, but they both inspired us.

Material: The ABS-plastic Grip has triangular holes, so the product won’t stay wet and get stinky.

Weight: You won't do your powerlifting with it, but it will work out well after your training.  

 

 

 

What is your favorite color? Flipper Grip, tailored to your personality.

After purchase you’re going to receive a questionnaire where you can choose what color Filipper Grip you want. Here are the basic ones:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The idea of Filipper Grip was born when Gergő noticed his training partners were frustrated by the ever-interrupted flow of water. We inspire each other and we think that problems are just challenges that need to be solved. It was a long journey to get to the ultimate product. Mission accomplished. 

 

 

 

 

 

Don't need Filipper Grip, but know someone who might love our product? We can’t do this without you.

story:
My name is Antonio Marcano and I would like to build a Bed & Breakfast made of adobe, which will be an ideal place for relaxation any time of year. This will be a place where you can enjoy the tranquility in the locale, with  a library and meditation room, as well as,the benefit of healthy food  and excursions in the surrounding national parks of the state of Merida.

 

For the realization of the Andean Casamontaña project, $ 4000 (or equivalent in euros) is required to acquire the following:

  • Purchase and transport of 8 Mt3 of stone

  • Purchase and transport of 1500 adobe bricks

  • Wood for the structure and roof.

  • Materials for sanitary facilities

  • Materials for electrical installations

  • Materials for blacksmithing and carpentry

  • Materials for frieze, painting and finishing

  • Windows and doors

  • Skilled labor and apprentice

  • Biodigestor system

  • Retaining wall 

_________________________________________ 

 

Casamontaña Andina: A model of life

  • The advantage of collaborating and participating in this experience is to give the opportunity to those living in today´s stressful society,  for a return to a simple and healthful environment of nature at a very economical price.
  • I invite you to experience a few days of peace away from the noise, with the possibility of enjoying the scenery, food and especially having time for yourself.
  • Universal changes begin from within, from the being that dwells in each one of us, without affiliation of any particular religion or belief. No external teachings will show us who we really are. It's just a matter of personal experience in silence, and beyond words..

 

With your contribution, the house will become a reality

  • Carrying out the Andean  Mountain House project involves challenges due to the economic situation in Venezuela today, which actually helps in the realization of this project. 
  • I hope to achieve the goal with the support of people who are, like me, convinced that we must rethink life in a different way. 
  • It is well worth investing in this way of life, which is ever harder to find in today´s world.
  • All expenses will be recorded via receipts, which will be available to contributors.

 

Other ways you can help

  • Spread and share comments about the project. For example, you could use the Indiegogo tools to do so.
  • Donate furniture, materials or tools that you no longer use (if you live in Venezuela).
  • Your positive thoughts and moral support are very important to me.

Carrying out the Andean  Mountain House project involves challenges due to the economic situation in Venezuela today, which actually helps in the realization of this project. 
I hope to achieve the goal with the support of people who are, like me, convinced that we must rethink life in a different way. 
It is well worth investing in this way of life, which is ever harder to find in today´s world.

All expenses will be recorded via receipts, which will be available to contributors.

Your positive thoughts and moral support are very important to me.

story:
Hi there,

 

Click this link to check out the live feed of the air quality in my kitchen!

https://thingspeak.com/channels/133364

 

Tl;dr (too long; didn’t read) at the bottom

 

What you have seen in the video is a short summary of what I’ve been up to the past 2 months since school ended. I want to extend a thank you to some friends that donated to my previous campaign. I’m really grateful to you guys because I did not have anything to deserve those $55, but you guys gave based on your faith in me. Well your faith has been rewarded, because I put those $55 towards the $140 cost of this project. I paid for the rest of it myself. Now I’m asking for $50 more in order to fund my next prototype of this device. Currently, the user has to plug an ethernet cable and a power supply cable into the device to make it work. I found that very inconvenient, so my next prototype is going to be completely cordless. I’m going to give the machine a wireless uploading capability (no ethernet cord) and a battery pack (no power supply cord). I’ve already bought all the parts and am waiting for them to be delivered as you read this. All of these parts actually only cost me $100! I’m thrilled at this price point, and I can’t wait to start building it.

 

I’ve built a sensor that measures how many particles are in the air at a given time and can upload that info to the Internet. The goal of this project was to create a device that allowed users to see what kind of air pollution they’re living in. If they see that certain activities cause the air quality to decrease a lot, then my hope is that they will refrain from doing those things as often. This is the basic philosophy behind the products I want to start making. The air quality measurement device is just the start of a long list of feedback devices I am planning on making.

 

I started this project not having much experience with software and having no experience with hardware. I actually used a guide for most of the hardware suggestions. I was able to build the device with no problem, but then I ran into some issues on the software side. First off, I had no idea how to code. I had to rely on the code that was already written in the guide. Unfortunately, the publishing platform that this data was supposed to be uploaded to (Xively) was no longer a viable option. I had to switch to another platform, and I chose ThingSpeak. In the process of switching, I had to also write new code because the language between the two platforms is much different. After a few hours of reading and figuring out the logic, I finally was able to Frankenstein together code that actually took the readings of the sensor and uploaded them to the Internet. I felt very good about myself after that.

 

To house the device, I bought some tupperware and cut some holes into it so the necessary wires could get out and the sensor could “breathe”. After setting up the sensor and plugging it in, I felt that the device annoyed me. I particularly did not like having to plug in the thing to keep it running. I wanted it to be completely wireless and have a battery pack that didn’t require a lot of maintenance or battery switching. This led me to the idea of how to build the new prototype. With the experience I’ve gained by building this machine, it was pretty easy to decide on the parts that the new device would have. Had I not done this first prototype, I definitely would not have been able to conceptualize the next one. I also have a pretty good idea of how the software is going to look too, so I’m really glad that I took the time to take the first steps and actually build/program the device.

 

Tl;dr

  • Air quality measurement device is operational (check the feed at: https://thingspeak.com/channels/133364)
  • Learned a lot about hardware and software
  • This prototype cost $140
  • New prototype costs $100 and is wireless
  • I need $50 to make the next prototype*

*Indiegogo's minimum is $500, which is why it's set to $500

story:
Quien soy y por qué hago esto.

Mi nombre es Francisco Lerdo de Tejada.  Cumplo 43 años el día 10 de Sept del 2017.

Padezco diabetes desde hace 22 años y hasta ahora no tengo otras complicaciones relacionadas a la diabetes.” Culpo” de ello a una dieta muy equilibrada en la que incluyo suplementos, y a distintas formas de ejercicio físico que se combinan entre sí, Yoga, Pilates, artes marciales, cardio, pesas…

Dedicándome profesionalmente al mundo del fitness he aprendido y experimentado la influencia del ejercicio en la calidad de vida, desde un punto de vista tanto físico como mental.

También he aprendido como hoy en día más que nunca hay que llegar a la gente para poder actuar.

Realizando este proyecto puedo llegar a mucha gente a través de las redes sociales, pero también físicamente durante el viaje, hablar con ellos, entrenar con ellos, oír lo que tienen que decir…

 

Como surgió la idea y por qué necesito financiación.

Para realizar este proyecto, entrenar y divulgarlo en las redes sociales he dejado de trabajar desde el mes de Agosto.  Si alguno habéis vivido en Londres, o en alguna gran ciudad, entenderéis el riesgo que eso supone.  Creo plenamente en este proyecto y en la respuesta del público, no solo en cuanto a la financiación, sino también en cuanto a la repercusión posterior que la campaña para motivar a enfermos a hacer ejercicio.

Hace tres meses, me robaron la bicicleta y compre una nueva, Abu la llame.  Me gustó tanto que de broma me dije a mi mismo que cuando me volviera, me iría con ella a España, y a partir de ahí la idea creció hasta lo que es este proyecto.  Llevo montando en bici a diario unos 20 años como método de transporte, pero nunca antes había hecho un viaje en bici. Para realizar este viaje tengo que equipar bicicleta. Alforjas, pedales, manillar con varias posiciones para evitar lesiones, cubiertas, cámaras y frenos nuevos, luces extras.  Necesito también un mínimo de equipo para documentar el viaje.  Necesito también efectivo para el ferri y el vuelo de vuelta al Reino Unido.  Por supuesto también para dietas y acomodación.  Sin contar con un fondo para imprevistos y los gastos de manutención y alquiler de estos dos meses preparando y realizando el proyecto.  He calculado unos 5000 euros y he dividido en dos, haciendo un “crowdfunding”  en el Reino Unido y otro en España, los dos sitios en los que el viaje tendrá lugar y los dos sitios en los que quiero desarrollarme profesionalmente.

 

Recompensas, si el proyecto sale.  Donde irán los fondos, si no sale.

Hay varias recompensas dependiendo de las aportaciones.  Estas recompensas se harán efectivas a partir del mes de Marzo del 2018. Las recompensas son en todo el territorio nacional dentro de la península. 

Por una aportación de 250e daré una sesión deportiva grupal, de unos 90 minutos, para un número aproximado de 20 personas.  Esta recompensa está orientada a equipos deportivos o a asociaciones y colectivos, sobre todo enfocado a personas con algún tipo de condición médica, por ejemplo asociaciones de diabéticos.  Ofrezco tres recompensas como esta.

Por una aportación de 250e daré una charla interactiva con carácter motivacional. Esta recompensa deberá ser negociada con el colaborador para enfocar la charla al colectivo al que vaya enfocado.

En ella se contara la experiencia del viaje y se mostraran videos del mismo para hacerla más amena. También está recomendada para colectivos de personas con condiciones médicas o para grupos deportivos. .  Ofrezco tres recompensas como esta.

Por una aportación de 500e se negociara términos de patrocinador.  Vestir ropa durante el viaje con la marca patrocinadora o el logo del establecimiento patrocinador.  Mencionar el nombre de dicha marca en los videos que haré como crónica del viaje o mostrarlo en fotos.  También  existe la posibilidad de ir durante el viaje a establecimientos patrocinadores.  Antes de realizar la donación se debe contactar conmigo para establecer las condiciones por escrito. No estoy dispuesto a dejarme patrocinar por marcas o establecimientos que no considere que defienden los principios de lo que hago.

El único motivo por el que el viaje no se realizaría seria por una condición física adversa, como por ejemplo una lesión, en cuyo caso el viaje se pospondrá y se utilizaran los fondos ya recibidos.

Tu aportación, por pequeña que sea, me ayudará a llevar este proyecto a delante.

Si tu aportación no puede ser económica comparte la campaña.  Dándome a conocer puedo llevar este proyecto mucho más lejos que un viaje en bicicleta.  Llegando físicamente a más gente, puedo mostrar las posibilidades del ejercicio y la dieta para tratar condiciones médicas que mejoren la calidad de vida y disminuyan el riego de desarrollar otras complicaciones para la salud.

No estoy dispuesto a dejarme patrocinar por marcas o establecimientos que no considere que defienden los principios de lo que hago.El único motivo por el que el viaje no se realizaría seria por una condición física adversa, como por ejemplo una lesión, en cuyo caso el viaje se pospondrá y se utilizaran los fondos ya recibidos.Tu aportación, por pequeña que sea, me ayudará a llevar este proyecto a delante.Si tu aportación no puede ser económica comparte la campaña.  Dándome a conocer puedo llevar este proyecto mucho más lejos que un viaje en bicicleta.  Llegando físicamente a más gente, puedo mostrar las posibilidades del ejercicio y la dieta para tratar condiciones médicas que mejoren la calidad de vida y disminuyan el riego de desarrollar otras complicaciones para la salud.

story:
We live busy lives.

From Work deadlines to Working out or Parties to Parenting or Jet-Lag to Jet-Set, being depleted prevents us from enjoying things that matter most.

Re-Koop has a solution for your lifestyle.

We want people to have more time, focus, health and energy with convenient in home IV hydration treatments.   Our clients will have the ability to prevent or accelerate recovery by scheduling a licensed medic to visit your home, office or hotel with the Re- Koop app.  Our solutions improve mental fatigue, focus, inflammation, muscle soreness, illness, hangovers, stress and appearance. 

We are looking for $25,000 to create an app that will allow clients to review profiles, see schedules and reviews of our licensed medics.  Clients will also be able to book in home visits, complete medical history and pay with the Re-Koop app.  The solutions take 30-45 minutes to administer and prices start at $149-$249.

All money we raise will go into developing the app, which will give people in the Bay Area access to convenient and affordable relief and wellness.  

No more downtime.

If we raise more than $25,000 we plan on purchasing a custom canopy/event tent so we can offer our mobile hydration services at festivals, races, weddings or parties.

Our plan is to launch December 2017- just in time for the hectic holiday season.  As a contributor we would like to offer you 25% off your first in home treatment.  We want you to enjoy the benefits of more energy, boosted immune system and less stress.

Our biggest challenge will be getting the word out, so if Re-Koop excites you as much as it does us, please share our campaign with family, friends and colleagues.  

Everyone can be their best selves in under and hour!

story:
Inspiration provided through the lens of the founder, a former scholar and athlete, The T. Alexander Foundation will launch a benefit corporation in January 2018, aimed at improving the student athlete experience and strengthen communities by providing programming that stimulates the mind and character. Purpose will partner with current youth serving facilities to conduct events -blended workshops and didactic offerings- that are designed to equip students with the skills needed to succeed in the classroom, athletics and in life.

Our Impact

Business Model

Self-sustaining through income earned from Purpose conducted/sponsored events.

                  

There are approximately 188 non-scheduled school days annually for students in Lancaster County. Purpose, will conduct events during these periods for students seeking to improve their academic and athletic skill sets. In addition to the normal rental fees paid for use of facilities, Purpose will donate 20% of event proceeds to the facilities for their respective youth programming. Profit sharing with youth serving facilities, is an incentive that no organization is currently providing to facilities in the area. This supplemental income from events, will help provide organizations the needed assistance as they navigate through their respective budget deficits due to year over year reduction in available funding for non-profits in the area. 

“It takes a village” and our inter-connectedness can bridge the gap of many non-school days that present a challenge relative to unproductive time for our students.

Purpose will offer an innovative blend of social benefit and financial revenues from events that will cover cost and grow operations! Year 1 (2018) Financial Projections:

  • Total Revenues - $303K
  • 68% Profit Margin
  • Provide 3 full time thriving wage jobs 
  • Service 1,805 student athletes over a span of 26 Events (during the 188 non-scheduled school days)

A study conducted by Harvard and the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation found that 26 percent of all parents hope their children become professional athletes.

Youth sports is a $15 billion-dollar industry. Parents over-rely on athletic talents to deliver a lucrative future versus a balanced focus that includes academics and character development. How do we change the narrative? Athletics is not the only way to success. Athletics coupled with  the transformative power of education must be realized by students and their families. 

Over the last two years we’ve taught our curriculum to hundreds of student athletes, many of whom are repeat participants in our events. Our methodology began with personal experience as a collegiate athlete and volunteering (“lift as I climb”); evolved through trial and error via didactic and athletic programs offered – yielding feedback from participants, parents and the public. The outpouring of support is proof-positive; this is programming that will fulfill an un-met need.  

The Visionary Behind Purpose

What’s in it for you? Perks!

Well, the biggest perk is that you'll help us acquire the resources necessary to enrich the lives of more student athletes in the community! Your contribution level will allow visible partnership opportunities as well as display your commitment to a program that positively impacts the community.

If there is any other way that we could show our gratitude that you would appreciate, do not hesitate to let us know! Similarly, if you would like to donate but prefer anonymity, simply use the “Back it” button to specify the amount.

What are some other ways you can help?

Share our story. Please help spread the word by sharing this campaign!

We also accept other kinds of donations, such as new or gently use athletic equipment and free or reduced-price attendance at athletic events and activities, that might prove interesting and instructive for the student athletes. In connection with such donations, please write to us at info@talexanderfoundtaion.org.

If you would like to receive updates about our activities, you can sign up to our newsletter here (www.pddita.com).

We are raising $30,000!

Your investment in Purpose will go towards:

  • $10,000 Infrastructure Development
  • $10,000 Curriculum Development (licensing, editorial reviews, creation of curriculum app) 
  • $5,000 Academic Equipment (3 laptops, 1 projector, 8 portable whiteboards)
  • $3,000 Marketing (flyers, posters, Facebook ads, school visits)
  • $2,000 Professional Services (legal, accounting, and other start up administrative services)

If we exceed our funding goal, our plan is to:

  • Add more interactive features to the app being developed for the delivery of our curriculum;
  • Purchase newer athletic equipment!

​

 

--------

This crowdfunding campaign is part of The Great Social Enterprise Pitch, a friendly competition facilitated by ASSETS and the Lancaster County Community Foundation. The Pitch consists of social enterprise ideas based in Central Pennsylvania. A Social Enterprise is a market-based, income-generating enterprise that aims to solve a social and/or environmental problem through its business activities. Social enterprises focus on a trip bottom line: people, planet, and profit. Upon completion of the Crowdfunding phase of the competition, 5 ideas will be chosen to move on to the Live Pitch, during which the contestants will present their ideas to a panel of judges, with winners receiving a package of cash and pro-bono prizes. In 2017, winners received over $65,000 in cash and pro-bono prizes. Please visit www.lancasterpitch.com for more information. To access to the crowdfunding sites of all participating social enterprise ideas, click here: www.indiegogo.com/partners/SocialEnterprisePitch.

By contributing to this campaign, you give permission to this business and to ASSETS to collect and use your name, email address, and mailing address. Your information will not be sold or shared with other organizations. You may opt out of electronic communications by selecting the unsubscribe link and following instructions on any emails that you receive.

story:
What is Burpees + Brunch?

Burpees + Brunch is a New York City-based wellness brand committed to fostering sisterhood, and inspiring women of all backgrounds, shapes and sizes to achieve a fun, healthy way of life. Through our subscription wellness box service, our mission is to provide quality wellness products directly to you, and create a community that combats the sense of otherness felt by women of color in the wellness space.

Founded by fitness instructor and wellness guru Anicia Anya, we’re increasing the exposure of minority- owned businesses and improving the multicultural market for larger brands with the cool and cultured on-the-go girl in mind. Find us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

Why We Are Expanding?

Fighting against the "One Size Fits All” myth, our goal is to teach women, especially of color, that wellness is far more than losing a specific amount of pounds or having a “ bikini body.” Currently, we are expanding Burpees + Brunch by filling the void of: fitness apparel, workout accessories, nutrition items and beauty products we have discovered in regard to women of color. Simultaneously, we are providing our exclusive content digitally and experientially. 

 

You can be apart of this epic wellness club in just 3 simple steps:

 

 

 

Help Us Bring This Epic Subscription Box To Life:

We're hoping to reach our goal of $15,000 in 30 days and we need your help! Help us make this dream come true by purchasing an exclusive Burpees + Brunch designed tote, branded water bottle, or one of our subscription options.  

Once you pledge, we will send you info on our growing community and our forthcoming product lines. The funds raised will be used to produce vital online content, as well as deliver the very best wellness products to our subscribers!!!

 

So What’s The Point?

 

You read it, the data doesn’t lie—there’s a significant void of diversity in the wellness industry, and it’s time to make an impact. Burpees + Brunch aims to change the way we think about the wellness industry, and the way the wellness industry thinks about us. As we expand, our long-term goal is to assist in the development of other minority business owners. By uplifting others, we can create positive change in any community – and especially in our own.

Other Ways You Can Help: 

Low on funds? No worries! You can still support us and help us grow this campaign beyond your wallet. 

  • Spread the word. This community is unlike any built before in the wellness space. As women of color, our stories are so powerful and we need you to share it. Tweet. Text. Facebook. Email. This is your story!
  • Tell us about your favorite brands. We're looking to build up an unparalleled lineup of brands and products catered toward women of color. Tell us about your favorite brand by emailing burpeesandbrunch@gmail.com 
  • Are you a wellness product maker? Shoot us an email at burpeesandbrunch@gmail.com and tell us about your product line. 
  • Follow us on social media, or check out our latest blog post!          

Thank you so ever much for your contributions and look out for a Burpees + Brunch Box on a doorstep near you soon.

story:
Why do I need SteelBar?

A gold pen, a solid watch, Italian leather shoes, nice belt.  You surround yourself with things that make your environment more beautiful, more connected, more YOU. The SteelBar is a very attractive looking, handcrafted, solid stainless steel.

Take a look at your desk.  What's on it?  What does it say about you?

What’s so special about SteelBar?

  • Turn your office in to gym. 
  • Pick up the Bars anytime and give yourself a boost, improve your blood circulation.
  • Change your energy level which effects your productivity.
  • Transform your body, and get those cuts that you always wanted.
  • Most amazing conversation piece.

 About the SteelBar Effect.

     Every month we spend hundreds of dollars and (TIME) to go to massage therapies, simply        because you need to get that stress of your shoulders, to fix that problem we came up with SteelBar, and it’s what every office needs. SteelBar is designed to give you motivation to grab and give yourself a boost.

 

Feet exercise!!!

 

 

How is it made?

       We're using a precision machining process to get a perfect finish.  A large cylinder of steel is put onto a metal lathe and carefully worked using a CNC.  These results in the most perfect finish you can imagine.  Here is a video of the process:

 

 

Wooden Packaging

 

Rewards

Great conversation piece.

 

                           

We believe the backer community will play an integral role in the mass production of SteelBar . Through indiegogo we’re not just pre-selling our product to early adopters, but rather forging relationships with a passionate community of innovative individuals.

Your feedback will help us and your support will enable us to reach our goals and beyond! please support our campaign and spread the word! 

 

Warranty:

 We stand firmly behind our products. SteelBar has lifetime warranty.

Support: 

We're here for you. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at steelweldingsystemsllc@gmail.com 

Delivery

The delivery of the products in Canada, USA is planned to start in October 2017. We are confident and well-prepared to deliver SteelBar on time.
