story:
Dokido® is the reimagined design of a board sport that uses a patented(U.S. Patent No. 10,463,948) rear wheel system called Saucerang System® to propel the board forward. Dokido translates to “the way of synchronization,” getting its name from a combination of the Japanese words doki, meaning “synchronization,” and do, the word for “way,” like Judo or Aikido. With its specially-designed singular rear wheel, riders rock back and forth to get moving, offering lots of fun and a workout that tones the legs and core.

 

 

The motion of shifting weight forwards (brings eccentric hub at the top position) and backwards (brings the eccentric hub at the down position) between feet forces the patented rear wheel system to turn the wheel one complete revolution forward.

 

 

The Dokido board is made out of 8 layers of bamboo with a carbon fiber bottom layer to add extra strength. The board also includes a built-in stopping mechanism using side bumpers that force the wheel to stop when Dokido is tilted to the side. The bumpers also allow for indoor use as it does not scratch floors or walls. 

"The Red Dots”

"Simple Black Logo"

Aircraft grade aluminum shafts & hubs, solid hand cast molded polyurethane wheel for extra durability

 

 

The traditional skateboard has been a beloved mode of exercise and entertainment for decades, but many beginners find it hard to step on a board and enjoy the ride without losing control. Dokido’s wheel design holds the board in a neutral position that doesn’t move without the rider’s intention. Instead of a freely-rolling board that requires riders to push off from the pavement, Dokido’s one-of-a-kind Saucerang System propels the board forward through a rider's dancing movement. When a rider isn’t actively rocking to move forward, the board keeps still, reducing the risk of injury. Not only is this longboard alternative a fun and easy way for beginners to enjoy the sport, but longtime-boarders will love the new challenge that comes with it. The board can even be propelled uphill.

Dokido is great for entertainment, commuting to work, or a solid workout. Great for young kids to adults and everyone can use the same sized board. 

Dokido is an innovative, eco friendly product. The board has been constructed from expertly designed hands. There are 8 layers of bamboo that are used to make up the board. Bamboo is a strong and sustainable material. The boards also contain many recyclable parts so be sure not to throw them out after heavy use. 

By using a land paddle, overall riding speed increases and make it easier to manage long distance rides. And, of course, you can ride Dokido by pushing or carving like a traditional longboard too. (In these cases, the rider’s up and down motion will be the added driving force.) ​
 
 

                    Saucerang System® Wheel Hub (Prototype)

Dokido makes the biggest difference in the uniqueness and ease of how you ride the board. When you ride a skateboard or a caster board, stepping on the board is usually the hardest part especially for beginners. 

Dokido solves this problem with Saucerang System. Saucerang System is on the rear wheel which can hold the board stable in the neutral position contributes both in ease of learning and minimizing the risk of injury. 

Prototypes

The board is stabilized in the neutral position (down position/ Saucerang System® logo showing up on the rear wheel hub). When you step on Dokido, in regular stance, you can keep your left foot on the ground as a pivoting foot, just like when you ride on a bicycle, and put your right foot on the rear side first, then put your left foot on the front side, and when your both feet are on the board, shift your weight forward and start riding Dokido by dancing on the board!

 
 

1. You can ride Dokido without the necessity of your foot touching the ground by shifting your weight forward and back (left and right) in such a way as dancing(swaying). 

The Floss Dance popularized by Backpack Kid, aka Russell Horning, and the Kunekune Taiso introduced by Hideo Araki, Honorary Professor of Tokushima University, the brain-science-based nervous system training that is already recognized broadly in Japan to prevent weakening that comes with aging or gain more athletic ability for young kids, are good examples of how you dance on Dokido.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AjfPKz2gbJk&amp...

2. With Dokido, you can climb uphill and even start climbing in the middle of an uphill in the same manner.

3. You can carry around Dokido like a wheeled carry-on luggage by holding the rear ringed edge of the board.

Dokido is:

1. A great tool to develop efficient and powerful weight shift in any sports. 

2. For helping prevent the joint pain and weakening that comes with aging.

3. Not only fun and accessible, but it's also a fantastic workout for people of all ages.

 

 

Specification
•Dimensions: 47-1/4” (length) x 10-1/4” (width) x 10” (height)
•Weight: 14 lbs 6 oz
•Max. load capacity: 265 lbs

 

 

 

 

Kaz Kumada - Inventor & Founder 

One day in January 2013, my family and I went to an ice rink nearby Yokohama city in Japan where we lived. I was watching my 8-year-old daughter almost fall while ice skating and noticed that the mechanism of ice skating is so simple but so difficult, especially for a beginner. This sparked my memory of an idea I had in the 1990s about redesigning an eccentric-hub scooter with a new suspension system. I thought “Why don’t I take out the handle and make it simple.” This is how the idea of the skateboard with eccentric-hub came along.

Website: www.octaab.com

Email: octaabllc@gmail.com

Product Specific FAQs:

Can I use Dokido outside in bad weather? Will it warp the board?

While hard coating with PU is done on the deck and is water poof, we don't recommend using Dokido in bad weather for safety reasons. But instead, Dokido performs well indoors and it has bumpers to prevent from scratching floors or walls.

How fast can I go?

You can go as fast as a caster board.

Do you offer accessories or different designs?

There are red dots, grey dots and a simple black logo design to offer.

Do you have a replacement part department?

You can order replacement parts such as the board, bumpers, rear wheel, rear wheel hubs, rear wheel shafts and rear bearings from us for easy assembly.

What safety recommendations do you have?

We recommend wearing protective gears while riding Dokido safely in accordance with local laws.

 

Risks and challenges

We have experience in producing past consumer products. Because of this, we are aware of some of the manufacturing challenges. Good design takes time and experience which we have. We only expect small manufacturing delays if any. There’s always a chance of delays through customs or shipping. We are in constant contact with our manufacturers to bring you the latest updates.
Quality control is another issue we have faced in the past. To combat this, we will ask for periodic sampling and test out new colors with caution. We know what to look for and how to get there. However, we know that Plan A doesn’t always work and we always have a backup plan.
story_txt:
Dokido® is the reimagined design of a board sport that uses a patented(U.S. Patent No. 10,463,948) rear wheel system called Saucerang System® to propel the board forward. Dokido translates to “the way of synchronization,” getting its name from a combination of the Japanese words doki, meaning “synchronization,” and do, the word for “way,” like Judo or Aikido. With its specially-designed singular rear wheel, riders rock back and forth to get moving, offering lots of fun and a workout that tones the legs and core.  The motion of shifting weight forwards (brings eccentric hub at the top position) and backwards (brings the eccentric hub at the down position) between feet forces the patented rear wheel system to turn the wheel one complete revolution forward.  The Dokido board is made out of 8 layers of bamboo with a carbon fiber bottom layer to add extra strength. The board also includes a built-in stopping mechanism using side bumpers that force the wheel to stop when Dokido is tilted to the side. The bumpers also allow for indoor use as it does not scratch floors or walls. "The Red Dots”"Simple Black Logo"Aircraft grade aluminum shafts & hubs, solid hand cast molded polyurethane wheel for extra durability  The traditional skateboard has been a beloved mode of exercise and entertainment for decades, but many beginners find it hard to step on a board and enjoy the ride without losing control. Dokido’s wheel design holds the board in a neutral position that doesn’t move without the rider’s intention. Instead of a freely-rolling board that requires riders to push off from the pavement, Dokido’s one-of-a-kind Saucerang System propels the board forward through a rider's dancing movement. When a rider isn’t actively rocking to move forward, the board keeps still, reducing the risk of injury. Not only is this longboard alternative a fun and easy way for beginners to enjoy the sport, but longtime-boarders will love the new challenge that comes with it. The board can even be propelled uphill.Dokido is great for entertainment, commuting to work, or a solid workout. Great for young kids to adults and everyone can use the same sized board. Dokido is an innovative, eco friendly product. The board has been constructed from expertly designed hands. There are 8 layers of bamboo that are used to make up the board. Bamboo is a strong and sustainable material. The boards also contain many recyclable parts so be sure not to throw them out after heavy use. By using a land paddle, overall riding speed increases and make it easier to manage long distance rides. And, of course, you can ride Dokido by pushing or carving like a traditional longboard too. (In these cases, the rider’s up and down motion will be the added driving force.) ​                      Saucerang System® Wheel Hub (Prototype)Dokido makes the biggest difference in the uniqueness and ease of how you ride the board. When you ride a skateboard or a caster board, stepping on the board is usually the hardest part especially for beginners. Dokido solves this problem with Saucerang System. Saucerang System is on the rear wheel which can hold the board stable in the neutral position contributes both in ease of learning and minimizing the risk of injury. PrototypesThe board is stabilized in the neutral position (down position/ Saucerang System® logo showing up on the rear wheel hub). When you step on Dokido, in regular stance, you can keep your left foot on the ground as a pivoting foot, just like when you ride on a bicycle, and put your right foot on the rear side first, then put your left foot on the front side, and when your both feet are on the board, shift your weight forward and start riding Dokido by dancing on the board!

 
 
1. You can ride Dokido without the necessity of your foot touching the ground by shifting your weight forward and back (left and right) in such a way as dancing(swaying). The Floss Dance popularized by Backpack Kid, aka Russell Horning, and the Kunekune Taiso introduced by Hideo Araki, Honorary Professor of Tokushima University, the brain-science-based nervous system training that is already recognized broadly in Japan to prevent weakening that comes with aging or gain more athletic ability for young kids, are good examples of how you dance on Dokido.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AjfPKz2gbJk&amp...2. With Dokido, you can climb uphill and even start climbing in the middle of an uphill in the same manner.3. You can carry around Dokido like a wheeled carry-on luggage by holding the rear ringed edge of the board.Dokido is:1. A great tool to develop efficient and powerful weight shift in any sports. 2. For helping prevent the joint pain and weakening that comes with aging.3. Not only fun and accessible, but it's also a fantastic workout for people of all ages.  Specification•Dimensions: 47-1/4” (length) x 10-1/4” (width) x 10” (height)•Weight: 14 lbs 6 oz•Max. load capacity: 265 lbs    Kaz Kumada - Inventor & Founder One day in January 2013, my family and I went to an ice rink nearby Yokohama city in Japan where we lived. I was watching my 8-year-old daughter almost fall while ice skating and noticed that the mechanism of ice skating is so simple but so difficult, especially for a beginner. This sparked my memory of an idea I had in the 1990s about redesigning an eccentric-hub scooter with a new suspension system. I thought “Why don’t I take out the handle and make it simple.” This is how the idea of the skateboard with eccentric-hub came along.Website: www.octaab.comEmail: octaabllc@gmail.comProduct Specific FAQs:Can I use Dokido outside in bad weather? Will it warp the board?While hard coating with PU is done on the deck and is water poof, we don't recommend using Dokido in bad weather for safety reasons. But instead, Dokido performs well indoors and it has bumpers to prevent from scratching floors or walls.How fast can I go?You can go as fast as a caster board.Do you offer accessories or different designs?There are red dots, grey dots and a simple black logo design to offer.Do you have a replacement part department?You can order replacement parts such as the board, bumpers, rear wheel, rear wheel hubs, rear wheel shafts and rear bearings from us for easy assembly.What safety recommendations do you have?We recommend wearing protective gears while riding Dokido safely in accordance with local laws. Risks and challengesWe have experience in producing past consumer products. Because of this, we are aware of some of the manufacturing challenges. Good design takes time and experience which we have. We only expect small manufacturing delays if any. There’s always a chance of delays through customs or shipping. We are in constant contact with our manufacturers to bring you the latest updates.Quality control is another issue we have faced in the past. To combat this, we will ask for periodic sampling and test out new colors with caution. We know what to look for and how to get there. However, we know that Plan A doesn’t always work and we always have a backup plan.

story:
our passion.

belle vie is passionate about living life luxuriously.  We believe that with the right knowledge we can develop the world’s best and most exclusive beauty treatments with clinically proven results, using only the very best natural ingredients in a sustainable manner.

Our founders spent their careers caring for patients and families at one of the world’s leading cancer hospitals, where the need for better scientific solutions to surgical scars led to the development of some of our most effective skin care products.   That tradition of healing and the scientific approach to skin care form the foundation of what we do.

Today, our researchers scour the globe to locate rare and beautiful components to use in our unique treatments, delivering clinically superior results.  At belle vie, we bring you our very best so you can be your very best.

 

our other passion.

belle vie believes in good corporate citizenship.  That’s why a portion of each purchase goes to support organizations that stand up against violence against women.  We support world class organizations with our money, our time and our healing crèmes.  Not only is belle vie working hard to help you be your very best, it is working hard to help mistreated women around the globe be their very best.

 

We invite you to join us as we launch our latest innovation in personal care - a waterless shampoo that provides the best hair care without the need for a shower and blow dry.  With the launch of this product, we will be able to further deliver the very best in health & beauty solutions to our fabulous clients, and we genuinely hope that you will become one of our clients, too.

 

needs.

The development work is done.  All that is required now is the packaging and shipping of our waterless shampoo to our salons, spas and discerning clientele who want only the very best.  The funding needs break down as follows:

  • $5,120 aluminum jars, including the printing and labeling for purchase and regulatory requirements.  Aluminum jars provide the best storage performance, and are recyclable.
  • $3,100 product manufacturing, performed in the US under our strict quality standards.
  • $985 packaging and labeling, including regulatory requirements and product information.
  • $1,150 for initial marketing, raising product awareness and incidental expenses related to the product launch.

 

wants.

We want you to join us at belle vie as we bring this exciting new product to market!  And we want to send you a few precious goodies as a thank you and as an invitation to "live luxuriously."

If for any reason we do not reach our goal, we will use the funds to further promote our existing line of products until we have the funds to launch our waterless shampoo.  Of course, a portion of those funds will go to support those world-class organizations that we support who stand up against violence against women

 

be a belle.

You don't have to give money to be a part of our family.  Join the belle nation simply by liking us on Facebook, following us on Instagram, and engaging with us when and where you can.  You can even bring your friends!

And when our website officially launches in Spring 2017, be part of our belle rewards program.

live luxuriously.

story:
Make no mistake, there are roughly up to 100,000,000 people around the globe infected with Borrelia Burgdorferi - the bacterial infection commonly known as Lyme disease.  Despite the rapid increase of cases, funding for Lyme disease research remains irresponsibly low.

To date there are no accurate tests for Lyme Disease - Current testing methods as many as 70% of patients test negative for Lyme and these tests are expensive and recommended by Dr's all over the world.

Lyme literate doctors and patients who have confirmed their need for an accurate diagnostic and what a difference it would make to them and those around them affected by this deadly disease.

A young lady contacted me very recently and said the following "I've had many miscarriages, I've been diagnosed with Fibromyalgia, Chronic Fatigue Syndrome, ME, I slept right through my teen years, I feel like I've always got flu, I've got a heart problem, I get headaches, I can't eat, I don't get out of bed.  My mum remembers a bulls eye rash when I was little, she's been with me to the doctors about this.  My medication consists of vitamins for joint pain and antidepressants - yet I feel worse"

Does this sound normal to you? 

The availability of an affordable, point of care test would revolutionize everything for these patients, they could get a diagnosis that they need and try to get treatment.

Some comments re what an accurate test would mean:-

"An accurate and affordable test would transform the experience of the hundreds of people who visit our support group with Lyme symptoms with either negative UK tests or a refusal to test. An accurate affordable test would have the power to transform the whole landscape of Lyme. More people would be treated earlier and avoid serious disease".

"It would mean validation. The most crushing realization of having Lyme disease is that no one believes you. People leave you and you are left questioning yourself. It is the saddest and most unnecessary result of a Lyme diagnosis. Justification of the disease would validate thousands of people and give them confidence and hope. It would give family members a chance to feel proud of caring for a sick loved one rather than feeling ashamed and embarrassed thinking it's hypochondria. Validation of Lyme disease by accurate diagnostics would also take it to the next level of funding further research and hopefully a cure."

"An accurate, stable, reliable test is critical."

"It would be a complete game changer and mean that people could get answers to why they are suffering so much without spending a fortune and still being left in doubt with testing accuracy. It would reduce the stress that comes with not knowing what you are dealing with and the trauma of being mis-diagnosed. "

Let's test for Lyme is a crowd funding campaign that will raise funds to enable me to finish our urinary diagnostic test for Lyme Disease - a beautiful lady has suggested we campaign again and then the Lyme community can donate and feel part of the solution.

We're a small team committed to making a difference to the Lyme community. We need to finish the tests and validate our findings via clinical trials and quality & regulatory approval in Europe and the USA.

If we can raise funds and commercialize the tests, we can achieve the following things;

Provide patients and clinicians with a direct detection method for borrelia,

Provide a solution to test for Lyme disease earlier before the disease becomes chronic,

Ensure the tests are cost effective and available to all globally.

Provide data to generate further understanding of this disease and how it is possibly linked to other neuroimmunological diseases.

Provide funding for patients via a charity to pay for their Lyme Disease diagnostics and treatments.

Create further awareness, educational and research programmes for clinicians and patients on a global basis.

There are currently in excess of 25,000 fundraising campaigns for patients with Lyme disease to help them pay for their treatment, as Senator Bernie Sanders has commented, "No 'one in America should have to choose between their medicine and their food, yet millions are having to make that choice everyday". This is inexcusable and nobody on a global basis should have to make this choice.

Every single dollar donated can make a difference.  Help us to Help the Lyme Community. All donations help

What We Need & What You Get

Diagnostic development is very expensive, but there are few teams developing a test that can actually make a difference.  Any donation would be greatly received and will get us one step closer to releasing these much needed tests. We're not tied to a university or college, we don't owe any money, it's just us..... that's how we like it!

I can't share the exact science, but it is a method that our team have used successfully before. What is important here is that there are not many other research projects looking specifically at developing a diagnostic for Lyme disease. 

We are  a specialist team that have the knowledge, determination and skills to get it to the commercial market, where it can be used - there is limited risk as we have the best chance of releasing this to the market this way subject to quality and regulatory approval, which is out of our control.  As someone very wise suggested to me, even failures are ways of moving forward. We have invested heavily in this project and have the commitment and drive to make this work.

The Impact

As many of the Lyme disease community knows, Lyme disease is a tick borne illness caused by the bacterium Borrelia burgdorferi.

Lyme Disease is the fastest growing infectious bacterial disease in the USA.  It is twice as common as breast cancer and 6 times as common as Aids

Current Estimates of cases in the US equate to 1m new cases per year with costs the US  healthcare systems between 712m and 1.3b USD per year.  These costs do not include out of pocket expenses which are reported as being in excess of $53,000 per patient and often most families will have more than one family member affected by this deadly disease.  These costs also do not include the additional medical examinations, physician appointments and pharmaceuticals that are dispensed to patients with Lyme disease when they are misdiagnosed with other chronic illnesses such as CFS, Parkinson's AZD, and multiple sclerosis for example, causing further complications as the Lyme disease is missed, the disease becomes chronic and further damage is done.

Current Estimates of cases in Europe are rapidly reaching six figures, with 1.5 million cases being reported in Germany.

By 2020 due to climate change, 28 million people will have been exposed to deer ticks, placing them at a major risk of contracting Lyme disease.

Richard Horowitz, a well respected Lyme medical doctor has reported that the Chinese CDC has indicated that there are 83 million cases of Lyme disease in China.

In Australia, the Griffin University national center for neuroimmunology and emerging disease has indicated that there are at least 460,000 cases of Lyme disease.

The impact of this disease is astounding, currently the recommended two tiered testing is not effective.

" Our development of a urinary Lyme diagnostic test in several formats will facilitate early antibiotic therapy and significantly decrease complications and costs from the Lyme disease infection on a world wide basis"

 Risks & Challenges

All scientific projects are risky, but we feel it depends upon how you view risk, it is less risky if we have an opportunity to get these tests to the market, make a difference to the medical and Lyme community, raise further awareness and importantly raise funds so that we can further directly help Lyme patients.  As a Lyme disease sufferer, how would you feel if you could ring or write to a charity and say, "here's my medical expenses" and the voice at the end of the phone says "don't worry, we'll pay those for you"  That's our intention - if we can get the tests to market, we'll have the funds to be able to do that.

  Other Ways You Can Help

Please just share this campaign, any donation is greatly received and will help us get one step closer to helping where help is needed.

Thank you for taking the time to read this campaign.

Together we can make a difference.

story:
Role of melatonin

 

Melatonin (sleep hormone) is produced by the brain in the absence of light (during the night) to indicate to the body that this the time to sleep. When there is intense light (eg. The sun), our brain stops producing melatonin and sends serotonin into the body, which makes us feel energized.

 

 

 

 

How light affects our brain

 

Come Autumn and Winter, when there is little natural light, our brain tends to continue producing Melatonin, a sleep inducing hormone, even daytime. Result : we feel tired and our mood is somber.

 

 

 

A patented optical technology

 

Luminette® uses a patented innovative optical technology: placed above eyesight, its beam of light is angled top-down, just as happens naturally under blue skies and allows user to keep their vision free. Luminette Glasses emits blue-enriched white light wavelengths peaked at 470 nm. This wavelength is the most effective at simulating sunlight and will trigger the body’s beneficial effects in response to the simulated sunlight.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Because we know you have no time to lose, especially in the morning, we designed Luminette Glasses.

Wear it while you brush your teeth, eat breakfast, or work on your computer. And thanks to its long-lasting battery, enjoy it outside your home: at work or even on airplanes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

And in many other marketing media

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a young and dynamic team, driven by a passion for improvement and a desire to create the best product ever. We worked hard to create Luminette Glasses 3 and we are really proud to present it to you now.


We aim to help people feel better thanks to light therapy. Our team is small but we believe that everyone has something special to bring, which makes our team very unique but also close.

 

 

 

Luminette came out in 2006 after 4 years of research at the University of Liege (Belgium). It is the result of collaboration between two fields of research : sleep medicine and optical physics.

 

 

A team of inventors and scientific advisors

 

The inventors took a simple observation as their starting point : light therapy boxes are effective but inconvenient. They are static and soon end up in the attic.
They therefore tried to develop a light therapy device that can be used on-the-move, allowing users to carry out their normal activities without losing a second of light. The device had to be just as effective but also more convenient !
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Luminette is designed and made in Belgium. Makes us proud!

Luminette is assembled in Belgium by a company specialized in the manufacture of medical devices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Optimize your Luminette experience with the application

 

1. Input your profile based on your sleep/wake patterns - this is your « circadian » profile.
2. Select your reason for using Luminette (Melt "Winter Blues", fight depression and adjust sleep patterns).
3. MyLuminette App will bring up your personalized Luminette® schedule - recommendation on when, and for how long you should wear your Luminette®.
4. Keep track of your light therapy history.

 

 

 

 

We are manufacturer of light therapy devices since 2006. We have sold more than 80,000 light therapy glasses worldwide and the efficacy of our products have been validated by 6 clinical studies. It is therefore quite certain that Luminette Glasses 3 will be released in September.

 

 

 

How do I contact campaign team?

You can contact us by email at info@lucimed.com and also by phone +32 (0) 4 369 48 36 (Belgium) / 1-800-390-5913 (USA & Canada).

 

Where does our product ship?

We ship from the USA for all orders coming from North America and we ship from Belgium for all orders coming from other countries.

 

How do I get more information about Luminette?

You can find the information on our website www.myluminette.com

 

 

If you have any questions, whether it is about us, our product or our project, do not hesitate to contact us, we'd be pleased to hear from you

The sun), our brain stops producing melatonin and sends serotonin into the body, which makes us feel energized.    How light affects our brain Come Autumn and Winter, when there is little natural light, our brain tends to continue producing Melatonin, a sleep inducing hormone, even daytime. Result : we feel tired and our mood is somber.   A patented optical technology Luminette® uses a patented innovative optical technology: placed above eyesight, its beam of light is angled top-down, just as happens naturally under blue skies and allows user to keep their vision free. Luminette Glasses emits blue-enriched white light wavelengths peaked at 470 nm. This wavelength is the most effective at simulating sunlight and will trigger the body’s beneficial effects in response to the simulated sunlight.           Because we know you have no time to lose, especially in the morning, we designed Luminette Glasses.Wear it while you brush your teeth, eat breakfast, or work on your computer. And thanks to its long-lasting battery, enjoy it outside your home: at work or even on airplanes.      And in many other marketing media        We are a young and dynamic team, driven by a passion for improvement and a desire to create the best product ever. We worked hard to create Luminette Glasses 3 and we are really proud to present it to you now.We aim to help people feel better thanks to light therapy. Our team is small but we believe that everyone has something special to bring, which makes our team very unique but also close.   Luminette came out in 2006 after 4 years of research at the University of Liege (Belgium). It is the result of collaboration between two fields of research : sleep medicine and optical physics.  A team of inventors and scientific advisors The inventors took a simple observation as their starting point : light therapy boxes are effective but inconvenient. They are static and soon end up in the attic.They therefore tried to develop a light therapy device that can be used on-the-move, allowing users to carry out their normal activities without losing a second of light. The device had to be just as effective but also more convenient !           Luminette is designed and made in Belgium. Makes us proud!Luminette is assembled in Belgium by a company specialized in the manufacture of medical devices.       Optimize your Luminette experience with the application 1. Input your profile based on your sleep/wake patterns - this is your « circadian » profile.2. Select your reason for using Luminette (Melt "Winter Blues", fight depression and adjust sleep patterns).3. MyLuminette App will bring up your personalized Luminette® schedule - recommendation on when, and for how long you should wear your Luminette®.4. Keep track of your light therapy history.    We are manufacturer of light therapy devices since 2006. We have sold more than 80,000 light therapy glasses worldwide and the efficacy of our products have been validated by 6 clinical studies. It is therefore quite certain that Luminette Glasses 3 will be released in September.   How do I contact campaign team?You can contact us by email at info@lucimed.com and also by phone +32 (0) 4 369 48 36 (Belgium) / 1-800-390-5913 (USA & Canada). Where does our product ship?We ship from the USA for all orders coming from North America and we ship from Belgium for all orders coming from other countries. How do I get more information about Luminette?You can find the information on our website www.myluminette.com  If you have any questions, whether it is about us, our product or our project, do not hesitate to contact us, we'd be pleased to hear from you

story:
Swissbody is the first EMS suit made with the full innovative power of Switzerland.

The Swissbody uses Electrical Muscle Stimulation technology to achieve the maximum effect with minimal effort. When controlled by its advanced AI, your whole workout process is more streamlined. 

We have been working on it for a while now. Something that will overcome all the stress faults of the current EMS suits. We all want to develop our regimen during exercises. That is why we buy EMS suits in the first place. 

However, a few problems always seem to pop up. Just when we have gotten the settings right, one malfunction or the other cuts into your workout. We wanted to stop tip-toeing around the suit. We wanted to use it to its full capacity, but it never seemed to survive.

That's why we started working on something that will give us what we want:

✅Burn up to 700 Calories in a 20min workout.
✅Firm, Shape and Tone your body.
✅Suitable for all ages and body types.
✅Increase Strength and Endurance.
✅Improve Posture.
✅See results with only 2 trainings of 20 minutes per week.
✅Reduce Cellulite and increase circulation.
✅Substantially Reduce Back Pain.
 


 

Swissbody claims the highest quality standards. To match those standards, we are working with the University of Applied Sciences, Northwest Switzerland. We have also ensured financial support from the agency for innovation from the Swiss Government (Bund). 

Nevertheless, we need your support to take the next step in our development, namely production.

 

 

Our Story

My name is Michael Lussambo, I'm a movement and health specialist, a former track and bobsleigh athlete, and a college graduate. I also served in the Swiss military as an officer. I'm 33 years old and I live in Baar in the canton of Zug, Switzerland. 

I'm the founder of 'MikeFit - Health is wealth' a personal training studio in Baar/ZG and 'SWISSBODY - TRAIN MEASURE ANALYZE'. 

At the MikeFit Fitness centre in Baar, Switzerland, we worked with EMS suits a lot. That meant we had to dump a lot too and the discipline I learned from my service couldn't accept that level of waste. With the complaints of my clients on my mind, we set out to do something about it.

 

 

We started by observing the advantages and disadvantages of various EMS suits. While collecting this data, we also started looking for the best solutions to the problems we were beginning to find out now that we were in observation mode. 

We documented plenty of weak points in the practical use of the suits on a daily basis. These weak points inspired us to work on a solution and develop a suit that is not lacking in responsiveness and robustness, whilst promising longevity and washability, with at least a 5-year warranty. 

One of the most common challenges with the existing suits are the electronic contacts which quickly lose their power, resulting in an inability to train the whole body evenly and efficiently after only a short period of time. 

We believe that it is time for a suit that can support the process of muscle gain and more intensive training, not only passively, but actively.

 

Smart Textiles

These requirements require the use of smart textiles. With these, we can create a suit which is suitable for more intensive training units and even more muscle gain. The suit supports the training units with 18 separately controllable pads placed on the most relevant muscles. With Electronic Muscle Stimulation (EMS), every muscle with a pad will be trained to its own limit. 

 

Additionally, the suit analyses the bioelectrical impedance (BIA) and makes electromyography (EMG). With this information, a training unit can be intensified to maximum effectiveness and full potential can be reached.

 

Based on these findings, we initiated a research project in cooperation with the University of Applied Sciences and Arts Northwestern Switzerland, to develop a suit that meets our expectations and the standards expected by our clients at Mikefit.

 

✅Faster Calorie Burn: With our new systems, you reach the aerobic threshold earlier and lost weight within a short period.. 

✅Time-Saving: When you can achieve more in a workout in less time, then you have more time for family and relaxation. 

✅Comfortable And Light: We achieved this by using an innovative nanomaterial and structure. 

✅AI-Based Individually Optimised Training: Our training programmes are usually adapted to each body differently. With the suits, we used a highly developed Artificial Intelligence. 

✅Durable Despite Stress: We wanted a suit that is not continuously losing its electrode contacts whether during use or laundry. 

✅Achieving Higher Intensity Training: The suit being built for stress means that you can increase muscle strength and bone density without worrying about delicate electronic components. 

 

 

What You Get

1) You become our backer
You have the chance to be our backer and take part in a project from the very moment production starts. 

 

2) You own a suit - one of the first
Your support will ensure the completion of the last development part of our product at the University of Applied Sciences, Northwest Switzerland. This will also ensure that the following products will start with one of the first EMS suits just for you.

 

3) You become part of our vision 
However, you're not just buying an EMS suit in Swiss quality. By supporting our project you are also supporting our vision. Our long term vision is not just creating an EMS suit, we want to take your training on a never seen efficiency level. 

 

4) We optimise just for you
With our success, we will finance more research to include more sensors in Swissbody 2 like GPS, accelerometers, and a gyroscope in order to give you even better live feedback during your training!

 

 

 

Aims Of Our Crowdfunding

  • To finance the final product development in order to ensure the production of our Swissbody 1. 
  • By supporting our Swissbody 1 you will help us achieve the next relevant step in Production and AI development.

story:
Boulder Trainer Next Level Update

Today Boulder Trainer has more users than I expected. I already upgraded the server in 2017 and hired a freelance developer to help me to update the web interface and the iPhone app. But there are so much more potential improvements, which would make Boulder Trainer a better app and help to build a real community of passionate climbers and boulderer. ​

No monthly payments

The app is not for free, but with a single purchase, the user gets a lifetime access to the app updates and free access to the web interface. Maintaining all this tech, can't be financed with the current pay-once-get-all-access price model. Like many other app providers, there is actually a monthly subscription plan required to provide the best user experience.

But with a completely new developed app and web app it would be possible to move everything to Firebase. 

Firebase is much cheaper than a single fast server and it provides faster access to everyone due to a clever CDN network capability. And most important: it is a scalable solution without the hassle maintaining a complex server.

Roadmap

Estimated Expenses

FAQ

Why don't you just upgrade to a bigger server?

The traffic volume has come to a point, where it's not efficient anymore to rent just a better (and more expensive) server. Those servers, cost much more per year, as the app sales generate profit. And monthly subscription plan is not the best solution for a niche app. Also a bigger server does not solve the problem, that users from all over the world have to access a server in Germany.


Why don't you rent a server in a different country?

Moving one server to another country does not solve the problem. People from all over the world need to have fast access to BT Online and not just a few from one country.


How long will it take to update BT-Online?

Switching to a cloud-based solution does not only require to update BT-Online (web app). It also means that the iPhone app and the Android app have to be updated. The estimated time-frame is five months for all.

Starting in April, I will give the screen Design to the developer as a guideline to follow. 

 

Risks and Challenges

Although the apps and web interface are already available there is still a long way to go for the next level update.

The timeframe is very tight. Up to three months additional time may be needed to develop additional features we may get suggest during this time. Should any issues arise, we'll keep you updated every step of the way.

The beta testing will be done using Test Flight by Apple for beta access to the app before the release. Apple has set a limit to 10,000 users for three months. So it is not guaranteed that everyone gets the beta version access. But only in case, we reach this high limit.

story:
Short Summary

When my Dad got sick, I started looking for a way to help him and to ease his pain. It took me 3 years to develop this product to the point where I am sure that I could now help my dad

The Handheld is primarily a pain relief device though it does feel good too. It uses sound of specific frequencies matched to a specific area of the body.

There are 2 general program that can be used anywhere on the body. There are also 9 programs for use on specific areas of the body and it talks to you and tells you where to put it.

Pain Relief Uses we have seen or are working on;

scraps, bruises, burns, stings, bites, arthritis, tumour reduction, anxiety, depression, tennis elbow, acute fasciitis, knee pain, ankle pain, torn ligament in elbow, neck pain, flu, fatigue, broken bones… and more each day.

What We Need & What You Get

I need funding for the next run of devices to continue the Pain Relief work that we are doing.

We are almost out of stock of the first runs devices and I am looking to fund the next production of the devices with pre-sales for the next round of devices.

I am also offering the upgrade for the existing 160,000 speakers that are already in the market place.

10% of all funds received will go to fund the Sonicbalance Holistic Centre so that I can keep offering FREE sessions to everyone who needs them.

The Impact

I have tested The Handheld Pain Relief Device on 100+ people with pain and trauma with good results. The pain seems to be removed by layers, and most times, it does not come back.

I IMAGINE A WORLD WITHOUT PAIN!

We operate by the motto "If it doesn't work instantly, it doesn't work at all!". When we come across pain that we can't relieve, we go back to the drawing board until we figure out why and then we make giant leaps in our technology and capabilities.

Risks & Challenges

The products will start to be delivered soon after you donate.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know anyone that is suffering from pain, please let them know about my options for them.

story:
Who's The Man Behind The Curtain?

I am an Alligator Wresting, Bull Running, Volcano Climbing, Entrepreneur that sees a major opportunity to improve our health with the launch of Black Label Nutrition. I am a former Marine that served two tours to Afghanistan, was awarded the Bronze Star for heroism and Purple Heart for a small bullet wound, and was later named Marine of the Year for my leadership. If that doesn't get you excited, I got out of the military and earned my MBA in Finance from California's number 2 business school and graduated with honors, am training to climb Everest, and was once a national champion in TaeKwonDo. So, who is the man behind the curtain? I'm just some guy that loves life, wants to experience it all, and leave this world in a better place than when I came into it. 

Why Do I Need Your Help?

I am going up against an army of 800 pound gorillas in the nutrition industry. These industry titans have made it nearly impossible for newcomers, like me, to be successful and give consumers quality supplements. Did you know there have been several class action lawsuits against many of the largest supplement companies for not actually having any protein in their protein supplements?! My jaw hit the floor when I read that the first time. But they continue to peddle their dirt and make billions by taking advantage of you for not being a freaking chemist and testing their product. With your help, we can launch Black Label Nutrition and start making an impact in the industry! Giving consumers high quality, great tasting, protein that they can toss in their carryon or gym bag and enjoy whenever or wherever they want is only the first step. 

What Am I Doing With The Money?

We are ready to start manufacturing! We have the product, we have the packaging, we just need your help to get the factory line moving! In manufacturing you have something called Minimum Order Quantities (MOQ's), the more I can make in a single batch, the cheaper I can sell it to you! Your help now, means you'll get the best nutrition possible, for cheaper! It's a win, win. 

Risks & Challenges

Let's be honest, there is the possibility that one of the big multi-billion dollar companies will try to mimic my product and push us out of business. How do I beat that risk? Easy. I will continuously deliver the highest quality product and customer service to our clients so it stays impossible to truly mimic our great company. They can have cool packaging like us, they may even decide to stop being cheap and invest into better quality ingredients, but they will never be us. I've fought in war and went back for seconds.. I'm not worried about some old guys in suits. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Reach out and share your ideas! If you have a thought or opinion, I want to hear it. Let's all work together to make this something incredible! 

Another Great Thing About Black Label Nutrition!!

  • A monthly subscription to our supplements comes with a complimentary personal trainer and dietitian! Yeah, I'm Serious. Get fitness routines and diets that fit your goals and lifestyle. Our personal trainers specialize in what we call "hotel room fitness." You don't need to spend 3 hours a day in the gym to maintain a level of fitness.

story:
Overview

TOFI by OneTwoFit is the first seatless foldable exercise bike, in order to protect your buttocks and grow your glutes while bicycling.

  • Avoid sore hips and help shape glutes.
  • Make full use of leg muscles
  • 3 levels of angles adjustment
  • 8 levels of resistance adjustment
  • Foldable and easy to store

 

*Shipping fee is in HKD 

 

No longer have to worry about flat pain in the bottocks!

TOFI forces the trainer to stand during riding, alleviating soreness and other problems caused by sedentary work. In addition, it can help you to tighten your hips line and grow your glutes.

 

Inspired by the Tour de France race. When the standing type, your thighs can be fully extended. At this time, you would get the better exercise in the same amount of time!

 

1st, Running Mode, for warming up and relax muscles after training.

 

2nd, Riding Mode, suitable for Cardio.

 

3rd, Plank+Yoga Bicycles Mode, for high intensity core workout.

 

Level 1-2: Low resistance, like running and riding

Level 3-5: Medium resistance, like running up and down the stairs

Level 6-8: High resistance, like climbing slope or mountain

 

Just need 3 steps to fold it after using. Only 10s, figure it out!

 

We spend most of the time sitting during working hours. When arrive at home, we are so tired and sit on sofa. Phhooofff!!!

The long hours and sedentary nature of office job are sucking the butt out of you, easily leading to flat buttocks. You need to do something!

TOFI allows you to avoid the butt damage and grown glutes at the same time during workout.

 

 

 

We are able to ship to the US, CA, the UK, DE, ES, FR, IT now! VAT and GST not included in perk pre-order price and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc) on delivery. Shipping costs vary by country; please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in Dec. 2019*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

 

OneTwoFit focuses on household fitness equipment, and our philosophy focuses more on family rather than home. 

In order to achieve this goal successfully, we are committed to increasing our connections and interactions with our users and constantly updating our products and services according to users’ need.

Founded in 2011, OneTwoFit’s products have been sold to America, Europe and Asia. In 2013 the amount of sales reached 15 million USD and 55 million USD in 2018.
story_txt:
OverviewTOFI by OneTwoFit is the first seatless foldable exercise bike, in order to protect your buttocks and grow your glutes while bicycling.
Avoid sore hips and help shape glutes.
Make full use of leg muscles
3 levels of angles adjustment
8 levels of resistance adjustment
Foldable and easy to store
 *Shipping fee is in HKD  No longer have to worry about flat pain in the bottocks!TOFI forces the trainer to stand during riding, alleviating soreness and other problems caused by sedentary work. In addition, it can help you to tighten your hips line and grow your glutes. Inspired by the Tour de France race. When the standing type, your thighs can be fully extended. At this time, you would get the better exercise in the same amount of time! 1st, Running Mode, for warming up and relax muscles after training. 2nd, Riding Mode, suitable for Cardio. 3rd, Plank+Yoga Bicycles Mode, for high intensity core workout. Level 1-2: Low resistance, like running and ridingLevel 3-5: Medium resistance, like running up and down the stairsLevel 6-8: High resistance, like climbing slope or mountain Just need 3 steps to fold it after using. Only 10s, figure it out! We spend most of the time sitting during working hours. When arrive at home, we are so tired and sit on sofa. Phhooofff!!!The long hours and sedentary nature of office job are sucking the butt out of you, easily leading to flat buttocks. You need to do something!TOFI allows you to avoid the butt damage and grown glutes at the same time during workout. 

  We are able to ship to the US, CA, the UK, DE, ES, FR, IT now! VAT and GST not included in perk pre-order price and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc) on delivery. Shipping costs vary by country; please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you. We plan to ship starting in Dec. 2019*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.   OneTwoFit focuses on household fitness equipment, and our philosophy focuses more on family rather than home. In order to achieve this goal successfully, we are committed to increasing our connections and interactions with our users and constantly updating our products and services according to users’ need.Founded in 2011, OneTwoFit’s products have been sold to America, Europe and Asia. In 2013 the amount of sales reached 15 million USD and 55 million USD in 2018.

story:
Hsonic is an innovative electric toothbrush that features a patented H-shaped bristle and flexible wand. It can simultaneously clean 6 sides of your teeth and easily brushes any hard-to-reach area, bringing thoughtful care for the whole family.

​

Hsonic’s special H-shaped brush head can simultaneously brush the front, back and bottom of upper and lower teeth. Every glide you made brings 6 dimensions’ cleaning, making sure you don’t miss any unseen sides. Benefit from this innovative design, Hsonic delivers 6 times more cleaning capabilities than a regular toothbrush, and it’s suitable for all ages and different shapes of the oral cavity.

Hsonic makes toothbrushing 6 times more effective and most importantly --it's much more cleaner than traditional electric tooth brush.

The soft and flexible bristle of Hsonic self-adjusts to fit in any teeth alignment as well as teeth size and oral cavity, making sure that every area of your teeth is deeply cleaned while delivering the most comfortable gum massages for gum care.

Compared to the traditional electric toothbrush, Hsonic impresses with its flexible silicone wand, which can be bent in any angle to clean all the hard-to-reach areas. With Hsonic, you can easily brush your molars. This advanced wand also acts as a buffer to reduce the impact on gum, delivering thoughtful care for your oral health.

Powerful Motor

Hsonic is built with a powerful motor, which can pump out 28,000 times of vibration per minute. Strong enough to remove 90% more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush, to bring a deep clean in 6 sides of your teeth.

    Deep Clean Mode & Gum Care Mode

    Hsonic provides 2 modes for different requirements: Deep Clean and Gum Care. Gum Care mode is designed for people with sensitive gum. By reducing the amplitude of the vibration, Hsonic can protect your gum without compromise on cleansing.

    Hsonic provides considerate care for your oral health, from teeth to gum and tongue. Thus, Hsonic features a special tongue massager for cleaning and massage. Beyond that, Hsonic is the best choice for people with sensitive gum as its soft silicone bristle can protect their gum from being hurt while cleaning.

    Simply put Hsonic electric toothbrush on its waterproof charging mount, it will be automatically powered up. With the built-in ultra-large battery, Hsonic can cover your 30 days needs for teeth-brushing after a single charge. Even you are a frequent traveler, low battery dilemma will never be a problem for you.

    The whole body  of Hsonic was designed with IPX7 waterproof, which means washing can be convenient and carefree for Hsonic. When you are done with teeth-brushing, just shower it under the tap and never worried about water ingression.

    Hsonic was built for long-term use. Thanks to its antibacterial silicone bristle, the brush head can be used for 6 months without or becoming unsanitary. Also, we provide 2 sizes of the brush head in 3 different colors for replacement, which can meet your family’s various requirements in terms of age and preference.

     

    Unbox Hsonic

    We've spent over 3 years developing Hsonic 6 dimensional toothbrush. The original design has been tested and adjusted hundreds of times and finally come to the current stage. Our pricing is depend on everything we spent on the R&D and of course the mass production. Hsonic is the world's first H-shaped electric toothbrush. We hope this product can improve your dental health to a whole new level.

    We choose to debut Hsonic in Indiegogo because Hsonic is a brand new product and Indiegogo embrace new innovation and the community is open-minded and supportive. We hope Hsonic, the product we've spent more than 3 years on will have a brilliant debut and most importantly bring you a better dental health. We have finished our test run and have prepared mass production for 1k Hsonic toothbrush. Once the campaign hits the goal we'll immediately place more orders to our factory. If you support Hsonic on Indiegogo, we will deliver you the order before Christmas.

    Tooling Completed

    Test Run Finished

story:
What makes this toothbrush so special?

We are introducing a lightweight and waterproof electric toothbrush stuffed with cool features. A toothbrush that is both intelligent and beautifully designed. To shoot the campaign we've used a fully working prototype. 

Features:

Two high-frequency vibration modes

 

The powerful motor provides high-frequency vibrations. There are two modes: normal mode with 33.000 vibrations per minute and turbo mode with 35.000 vibrations. The vibrating brush thoroughly cleans your teeth and gums in these modes.

 

Time notifications

 

The vibrations pause for a moment after 30 seconds to remind you to switch to another quarter section of your teeth. After four sections of 30 seconds, you have reached the duration of 2 minutes and the vibrations stop. This helps you to adhere to the dentist-recommended brushing time of two minutes.

 

Comfortable grip

The aluminum body is pleasant to hold due to the cylinder shape with a diameter of 2,5cm/1in.

 

Lightweight

With a total weight (including a brush head) of 152g/0,3lb, it feels like a feather in your hand, and provides optimal comfort while brushing. 

 

Compatible with all USB-C charging cables

To charge the battery, simply screw off the bottom and plug in the included USB-C cable. You can use the charging cable of your smartphone. Save space when travelling, because you don't need to bring an extra USB-C cable. 

 

Compatible with brush heads of other brands

 

The Electric Toothbrush will be delivered with two extra brush heads. To create flexibilty, you can attach brush heads of other major brands (such as Philips Sonicare) onto our toothbrush. Wherever you are in the world, you'll be able to find new brush heads that fit.  

 

Upright design

The flat bottom allows the toothbrush to stand upright, taking up little space in your bathroom or kitchen. 

 

Auto-stop after two minutes

 

The vibrations stop after 2 minutes, as this is the most common time to brush your teeth. If you would like to to brush longer, simply push the button again. 

 

Remembers last chosen mode for the next time

 

The toothbrush remembers the vibration mode that you used last time. The next time it will start in the same vibration mode. To switch to the other mode, push the button once.

IPX7 waterproof

 

The toothbrush can be used while taking a shower or a bath, without water doing any damage to it. The IPX7 water resistance rating enables safe cleaning of the toothbrush with water. 

 

Colors

The toothbrush is available in two colors: white and antracite. Choose your favorites.

 

What's in your package?

The content of the package:

  1. 1x Toothbrush 
  2. 2x Brush head
  3. USB-C Charging cable

 

About us

I am Adri Otsen, I live in Amsterdam and in my work for DesignNest.com, I support designers in creating attention for their work. DesignNest.com has knowledge and experience in optimizing, tooling, production, packaging and marketing.  We love to cooperate with ambitious designers to launch and develop their career. We give designers a platform to grow and to get their ideas and designs to the market. DesignNest is located in The Netherlands, China and the United States.

 

Project Status

We need your support to go from a working prototype to mass production. The most important part is tooling. Once the tooling is ready, we can produce enough toothbrushes to supply all backers. 

 

Perks:

As a backer of this campaign, you'll recieve updates during the process of funding, production and fulfilment. And you have the limited opportunity to obtain the Electric Toothbrush with a great discount. 

DesignNest.com guarantees delivery when the funding goal is reached.

 

Through designing, developing, prototyping, and testing our product, we’ve put a ton of time into this project. After undergoing such a long road, we’re extremely excited to be in our last step before production. We are certain you’ll enjoy all the value that the ToothBrush can deliver. Thanks for backing us!

P.s. If you have friends, family and colleagues who are happy to have a new and beautiful electric toothbrush, grab your discounts now or share this page with them today.

 

Kind regards, 

Adri Otsen

DesignNest.com Amsterdam

story:
Short Form

More than two-thirds of all cardiac arrests occur in the home. Usually, if there is a second person there, it is a person of approximately the same age as the victim. When you run a study where the age distribution approximates that of the victims, you get radically different results than most studies: About one in six can perform ten minutes of chest compressions with their hands on a CPR manikin - and a CPR manikin is typically about 40 to 80% as stiff as the average adult's chest. More than sixty percent can perform chest compressions with their heel. The principal factor influencing survival from a cardiac arrest is the immediate and continuous performance of CPR from the time of the arrest until the ambulance crew is hands on at the victim.

I'm a business executive who fixed broken companies. In my retirement I got my Paramedic licenses in two states, rode the ambulances, and worked night shifts in the Emergency Department at the local Level One Trauma Center. I was outraged by what I learned. 

We've trained more than 10,000 people in Chatham County, Georgia. We're about to take this program throughout North America. 

What's in it for you? You have a 10% chance of seeing - in your lifetime - at least one cardiac arrest. And when that happens, the victim's future hinges on your ability to recognize what's happening, do something about it, and keep on doing that until the ambulance crew takes over.

The people with whom you spend most of your time also have that approximately ten percent chance of seeing someone arrest...and the one they see arrest might be you.

What to do? Get all the people you spend time with trained in Bystander CPR, AED use, choking emergencies, and stroke recognition. Our class videos are at www.slicc.org - just click on "For past trainees" in the left column. Those videos - particularly the Adult CPR, the Stroke, and the AED videos - will do two things: First, they will teach you a practical way to save that family member or friend you might see arrest or have a stroke, and second, it will demonstrate why we need to upgrade the videos to something more professional.

We are a 501(c)(3) public charity, totally staffed by volunteers.

If we can roll this program out in North America, we can save perhaps 20% of the victims who currently die. That's 70,000 lives saved each year!

What We Need & What You Get

  • You get immediate access to the existing class videos.
  • We get to professionally re-make the videos to conform to the AHA recommendations that will be released in October of 2015.
  • None of the money we raise will go to SLICC's personnel. Period. It will go to professional video producers who have already agreed to perform the work for less than half their normal rate.
  • If we don't reach the entire goal, we'll only re-do some of the video segments. Adult CPR is first. Stroke is second.

The Impact

I've worked on 53 cardiac arrest resuscitations in my brief career in emergency medicine. I cannot begin to explain how I feel when I get someone back from death. When you see the large drop in Cardiac Arrest fatalities over the next five years, you can get the same golden feeling because your contributions made it possible!

Risks & Challenges

Heel compressions were an approved alternative in the 2005 AHA guidelines. It would be ideal if the AHA would put heel compressions into its Bystander Videos, and the interest appears to be there. A paper will be submitted to a peer-reviewed professional journal shortly, documenting the benefits of Heel Compressions, and this is a key step in getting heel compressions into the AHA teaching materials. In the meantime, with someone dying from a cariac arrest every 88 seconds, we can't afford to wait. We need to go forward and are contacting other community service organizations to solicit their help in taking our program throughout North America.  (You can view our presentation to the AHA Resuscitation Science Symposium in 2012 at www.slicc.org/ReSS_2012_359.pdf )

Other Ways You Can Help

Instead of - or in addition to contributing to - this program, you can help by getting your friends familiar with this campaign. Indiegogo has some really neat "share" tools.

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of 10 medical students who will be traveling to rural Ethiopia in order to train local healthcare professionals in Ultrasound Technology. In a country where close to 80% of the population have no access to healthcare, this accurate, safe, and low-maintenance diagnostic tool will sustainably improve patient healthcare.

More efficient treatment = More patients treated! 


What We Need & Why

Our team is raising money to donate two ultrasound devices, provide food and supplies for Ethiopian children, and to teach ultrasound in Soddo Christian Hospital.  We hope that by donating 2 machines, the curriculum we teach will have broader effects and benefit more patients. 

Our school is only able to cover about 20% of our total budget, so your contribution will be a tremendous help! 


The Impact

Thanks to our school's strong ultrasound curriculum, and donors like you, we will be able to teach future and current doctors how to incorporate ultrasound into their practice. 

Ultrasound is a safe tool and does not use any radiation. It is also an accurate and portable tool that has a broad range of applications and can be used for diagnostic imaging of for various different body systems (i.e.: your heart, or musculoskeletal system).

In addition to teaching an Ultrasound curriculum, we will translate this curriculum into the Ethiopian native language, Amharic, so that the students can gain a better understanding of the material and share it with other healthcare professionals in the area after we leave. 


Risks & Challenges

One of the main challenges we may face are issues with cultural sensitivity. Ethiopia has been a time-capsule of tradition -- the customs it holds have been there for centuries. But we are hopeful that we can adjust and learn to become sensitive to the natives' cultural norms through guidance from our sponsoring hospital, Soddo Christian Hospital, as well as one of our own team members who was born and raised in Ethiopia. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from donating, you can also help our team by SHARING our page with your friends and family. We truly believe in our cause and the impact we will make in the Ethiopian community. For more details on our team and our projects please visit our website: www.ethiopiaultrasoundteam.com. Thank you for all your support! 

And that's all there is to it :)

story:
Greetings Everyone,

  My name is Levi Pearson III, MD, MBA. I am a board certified Anesthesiologist specializing in Interventional Pain Management and owner of Metropolitan Pain, P.A. I have 20 years’ experience of watching the evolution of medicine. In many ways medicine has become both wiser and weaker. We have made great strides in technology, and yet accessibility, convenience, and prosperity for both patients and physicians may be lacking. Access to care with resultant improved health outcomes, as well as physician and patient satisfaction have not kept pace with these advances. I have heard the grievances of patients and physicians regarding the need for a better way, and I am on a mission to assist in developing a solution.

  A means was needed to assist me in merging my clinical medicine experience with the business acumen needed to bring life to this venture. To this purpose I have recently completed a cum laude executive MBA from the Rochester Institute of Technology. At RIT I experienced an education enriched by classmates who were all currently business executives who shared with me their valuable knowledge of the intense focus needed to move a product from vision to successful implementation. It’s time to make medicine all that it can be for both patients and doctors, using all available technology to assure that no one is not connected to the best of care. I am seeking to broaden my connection with people such as yourself with like passions.

  Whether its needing for mom to have independent regular visits to monitor her health, visual check of a non-life threatening injury or early post op minor wound check that may or may not need in office care, a prescription or follow-up when you just cannot find the time or income for the full trip and visit, or simply the desire to avoid a crowded waiting area, Vuewell health may be just what the doctor ordered. In fact many doctors may see the benefit of developing or building their practices with a set and steady flow of new revenue using the Vuewell platform, and all the while offering an efficient and convenient way of maintaining improved contact, compliance, and overall healthcare for their patients.  

I am currently continuing to develop what I hope to be a telemedicine platform that will be second to none. I am asking for your help and support in an Indigogo crowdfunding effort to raise the capital necessary to complete the development of my advanced platform product and enter the market. My hope is to greatly improve and possibly even save the lives of millions of patients present and future who require more efficient, convenient, and cost effective healthcare access. Vuewell Health will pursue ongoing evolution and development of a new, robust, and uniquely designed telemedicine platform that will seek to become the gold standard for physicians and patients to connect. In summary creating a “virtual portal for optimal care”.

 

Thanks for taking the time to share in building a platform to transform the way that healthcare is delivered and lives improved.

All the best,

Levi

Pearson III, MD, MBA. I am a board certified Anesthesiologist specializing in
Interventional Pain Management and owner of Metropolitan Pain, P.A. I have 20
years’ experience of watching the evolution of medicine. In many ways medicine
has become both wiser and weaker. We have made great strides in technology, and
yet accessibility, convenience, and prosperity for both patients and physicians
may be lacking. Access to care with resultant improved health outcomes, as well
as physician and patient satisfaction have not kept pace with these advances. I
have heard the grievances of patients and physicians regarding the need for a
better way, and I am on a mission to assist in developing a solution.
  A means was
needed to assist me in merging my clinical medicine experience with the
business acumen needed to bring life to this venture. To this purpose I have
recently completed a cum laude executive MBA from the Rochester Institute of
Technology. At RIT I experienced an education enriched by classmates who were
all currently business executives who shared with me their valuable knowledge
of the intense focus needed to move a product from vision to successful implementation.
It’s time to make medicine all that it can be for both patients and doctors,

story:
The Project

For you, having immediate access to clean water isn't a big deal, right? For the children and volunteers at the Verbo Feeding Center, it is a big deal. 

The Verbo Church in Puerto Cabezas, Nicaragua has a passion and a vision to care for the poor in the nearby community of Caminante. Caminante is home to approximately 2000 people that are displaced families from the interior jungle areas of the North Atlantic Autonomous Region. 

Most of these families left the impoverished jungle areas and headed to the city of Puerto Cabezas in search of jobs and hope. What they found was a city with 80% unemployment, and without many skills, they found it extremely difficult to make a living. Not able to purchase land or build suitable housing, these families live as squatters on the edge of town in pieced together wood and tin “homes”. The only income many of these families have is to sift through the local garbage for recyclables and left over food items. 

The Verbo Church partnered with Christian Fellow Church (CFC) in Ashburn, VA, Stop Hunger Now, and Orphan network to build a feeding center in Caminante.  The feeding center was built in 2012.


Some Facts: 

  • Caminante is home to nearly 1200 at- risk children of whom nearly half live in extreme poverty.

  • About 300 children in Nicaragua die each year from diarrhea caused by unsafe water and poor sanitation.



Project Details:

The project focuses on the overall master plan to supply and distribute water to the Verbo Feeding Center.

  •  Remove the existing pump and flush out the existing well using the existing an air compressor that has the ability to reach 90 psi.
  •  Reinstall the well pump, using new electrical wire, rope, check valve and piping.
  •  Provide a new well Cap. This cap will give the well a better seal to avoid debris from falling into the well.
  •  Provide a new well plug and pad.  The well plug and pad will be only at the surface and be made of concrete.
  •  Provide new electrical wiring from the breaker panel to the pump.
  •  Provide a new tank base.  The tank base will be located near the existing base, however this base will be approximately 10 to 12 feet high.  The tank base will be made out of concrete.
  • To give added pressure within the distribution system, we will add a new booster pump and bladder tank. 
  • The distribution system will be connected to the dual filter system.
  • The distribution system will be made from 1-inch PVC and will connect to the kitchen sinks, the children’s wash sink, laundry tub and include two yard hydrants.  The placement of the hydrants will be as directed by the Owner.

What We Need & What You Get

With your help from the funds we raise, we can complete this water distribution project.  We need minimum $1,500 to be able to implement and complete it. We will use the funds to purchase materials for the systems, which will include PVC pipes, pipe connections (joints, elbows, etc.), valves, storage tanks, solar panels, batteries, etc, to be purchased in Nicaragua.  For every donation of a certain amount made, a perk will be available to express our gratitude for your donation!

The Impact

Your donations will help the families and children of the Verbo Feeding Center gain direct access to a basic need and improve their standard of living.

  • Your donation will benefit the women and children who do not have to carry buckets of water back and forth, every single day after this is completed.

  • Your donation impacts not only the community, but also the students in EfID who are involved in the project and gain practical engineering experience.

  • You will also receive perks for your donations!

  • Each project implemented by EfID thus far has been successful and we hope to continue this record!


EfID students and the community work together to install part of the water distribution system of a previous project for the Sabana Grande community (Phase 1, August 2013).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily, we ask that you help us out by sharing this campaign with your friends, neighbors, family members, coworkers, school mates, etc.

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Indiegogo has some great share tools that can be utilized to get the word out!

About EfID

Engineers for International Development (EfID) is a student organization at George Mason University that focuses on using the technical skills we learned in school and applying them to communities in need around the world. EfID has been active for the last three years and has already successfully implemented international projects in Peru, Honduras, and Nicaragua. We have been involved in local projects in the U.S. as well.  You can read more about us here: https://sites.google.com/site/eidmason/.
