story:
Relax!

How would you like to look and feel better, be more successful and increase your creativity? It’s time to join the community of people who know how to relax!


The Personal Relaxation Pod
Learn how to relax fast!


The Personal Relaxation Pod combines guided audio, color LED light therapy and aromatherapy which draw your attention to positive present experiences while protecting you from all stressful surroundings. In just minutes, you’ll start to feel calmer and with regular use, you can improve your life in only three minutes a day.

Success, creativity, health and happiness

Some of the most successful people today including Rupert Murdoch, Oprah Winfrey, Arianna Huffington and Bill Ford know how to relax. Relaxing regularly can increase your chances of success.

This is because relaxation improves factors related to success including helping your concentration, focus and attention. You can learn faster and remember things better. You can have better, closer relationships and become more likeable because of increased empathy, compassion and patience. You can be more productive, have stronger willpower and be able to make decisions more quickly even under high-stress situations. Regular relaxation can also improve test results.


Contrary to popular belief, true inspiration usually happens during moments of relaxation and not while hammering away at a solution to a problem. Just think of Newton sitting contemplatively under an apple tree when he came across gravity, Archimedes stepping into his bath and declaring “Eureka” or Paul McCartney who dreamed of the melody to Yesterday while he was waking up. Relaxation leads to creativity by boosting brain function, increasing brain size which makes us smarter, improving problem solving skills and giving greater insight.

People who relax regularly are healthier and look better! Their immune system is stronger, they get sick less often and when they do get sick, their symptoms aren’t as strong. Relaxing also slows down the aging process, keeps you thinner and improves skin.

Other health benefits from relaxing include lower blood pressure, a healthier heart, slower aging of the brain, lower heart attack risks, higher resilience and improved sleep quality.

People who know how to relax are happier. That’s because relaxing regularly helps you worry less, can make your moods more stable, brings about more positive feelings and increases self-esteem.


Your own personal space
whenever and wherever you need it

This comfortable, stylish device was designed to be worn anywhere including:

  • in the office when you need an extra boost of concentration

  • at home when you just need some peace

  • whenever you need some calming relief

  • during long airplane travel

  • during your commute to work on public transportation


Besides the 3 minute relaxation exercises, there is also the power nap option that helps you sleep for 15 minutes and then gently brings you back to an alert waking state as the LED lights simulate a sunrise, exercises to help you fall asleep at night and concentration improvement.

Click here for more information on the different types of relaxation exercises.


The science of meditation, aromatherapy and color light therapy

Although meditation is an age old practice, it has recently entered mainstream and been taken up in its secular form in order to help in a wide range of health areas including anxiety disorder, stress, depression and ADHD. Several recent studies have shown both the short term and long term benefits of taking up mindfulness meditation. The benefits are so positive that the Mayo Clinic released an article on using meditation to relieve stress quickly.

Color light therapy has been used for some time now to affect behavior and health including Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD), jet lag, PMS, sleep disorders as well as calming violent outbreaks.

Aromatherapy, which is the use of essential oils to affect behavior or help other health problems, has also been tested in a long series of clinical studies. It is shown to help in a large range of areas including decreased anxiety, lower blood pressure, lower stress levels, improved brain activity and memory and even improved results in Alzheimer’s patients.


What's in the kit

The mask
The soft cloth mask can be worn in the office, during flights and even to bed. The velcro strap means that the mask can fit any head size comfortably. You can easily wash the mask by opening it and removing the electronic component.

Color therapy LED lights

The color LED lights are programmed to work exactly with the guided relaxation exercises. This means that they will work differently depending on the type of exercise. During an exercise aimed at helping you calm down and take you out of a stressful moment, the colors will be active at the beginning but will fade during the exercise. Then, a sunrise effect will help bring you back to the present in an improved mood. If the exercise is a longer one to help you fall asleep, instead, the lights will fade and will not come back on at the end of the exercise in order to allow you to move into deeper sleep without having to take the mask off.

Guided relaxation exercises

The length of the exercises will depend on what you need. You can just put on the mask, choose the result you want to achieve and a voice will guide you as the lights work to protect you from outside stress triggers. Exercises for instant relaxation are designed to be 3 to 5 minutes long whereas those for sleep aid will last much longer. 

Integrated headphones
The headphones in the mask are flat and comfortable so that they don’t interfere with your sensations whether you’re at the office and calming down or in bed trying to fall asleep.

The App

The app, which can also be used as a standalone, will be organized according to what you need so that using it is easy and intuitive. It will include sections on instant relaxation, improved concentration, power napping and sleep aid. It will work on both iOS and Android devices.

Aromatherapy

The aromatherapy strip will sit just inside of the mask above the nose which means that a very scant drop will be enough for several uses. The essential oils will be mixed in order to induce the mood you’re most in need of at that moment: happy, relax, concentration and energy. These mixtures will come from one of the highest quality suppliers in the US.

Powering the Personal Relaxation Pod
The Pod will last for 7-10 hours before it needs to be recharged. Both the chip and the rechargeable battery will sit within the mask in a way that is nearly undetectable and which will not have any negative impact on your comfort. The mask is USB rechargeable and comes with an attachable wall plug so that you can charge it anywhere.


The Perks


Where we are and where we're going

We have agreements with an electronics company for the manufacturing of the chip.

The mask has undergone several upgrades during its short life.

We’ll be using one of the best suppliers in the US for essential oils.

Now we're ready to take the next steps: get the electronic component and mask manufactured and create a range of guided relaxation exercises with matching sounds and colors so that you can relax quickly and easily.

story:
Dearest members of my friends and family,

I hope this letter finds all in the best of health & spirits.

As a Palestinian in the diaspora, many of you know that I’ve always been eager to find ways to give back to our people and advance our cause in some of the best ways I knew how. One of the nearest and dearest issues to my heart has been to address the many challenges faced by the displacement of our Palestinian refugees specifically those directly impacted by occupation and the instability of our region. I decided to join Al-Awda The Palestine Right to Return Coalition organization over eight years ago with that focus in mind—I wanted to help raise awareness in our communities about the human and legal rights of Palestinian refugees, while organizing efforts that offer humanitarian aid and empower them with projects that nurture their autonomy.

I’ve had the honor of organizing numerous relief efforts with my colleagues at         Al-Awda and with several humanitarian organizations across the US. Together we managed to raise thousands of dollars that helped alleviate some of the suffering and hardships of our refugees in Gaza, Tanaf camp, Al-Waleed camp, Yarmouk camp & the Palestinian refugee community in Lebanon. This year I have new two new projects that I will be personally working on and fundraising for: Aida Refugee Camp near Beit Lahem and the Gaza Refugee Camp in Jarash. I’m seeking your help to achieve my goal of raising $40k.

I chose to fund raise for these two specific camps because not only are they in dire need of support to execute their valuable programs, but also because of their highly appraised reputation and commitment to transparency. Lajee center in Aida, for example, is known to be one of the most active and transparent organizations in the West Bank; Last year they received a 9.4 out of 10 by the European Union for clarity in their financial reports. As a result, the EU funded the camp with a three-year program to work with 12 other refugee camps in the West Bank. I personally visited the Lajee center in 2010 & 2011 and was very impressed with their efforts and resourcefulness in combating the different challenges they’ve been facing—especially after Israel built the wall around the camp, which is home to over 6000 refugees, and where more than half of them are children under the age of 18.

I also chose the Gaza Refugee Camp this year after I learned about it from our Imam who has been generously supporting several of their projects for the past 3 years. The camp has an estimated 30,000 Gazan refugees who have no ID number in the country and have harder time obtaining jobs, therefore its very expensive for them to complete their education. In turn, I got connected with the Co-founder at “Hopes for Women in Education” who has been working tirelessly with her team to manage several vital projects in the Gaza Refugee camp, that hopefully your generous donations will help sustain.

Here are the projects your donations will be sponsoring: -

Aida Refugee Camp:

1- Lajee Center’s Music Project:

  •  Music 2015-2.docx
  • http://lajee.org/content/first-performance-lajee-center%E2%80%99s-music-group. 
  • http://lajee.org/content/lajee-center%E2%80%99s-music-project

2- Lajee Center’s Rooftop Gardens.

  • https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4NtlbHhCKYMdTIteFdvWUhjZ00/view?usp=sharing_eid
  • Lajee Center Rooftop Garden Project
  •  http://lajee.org/content/lajee’s-‘rooftop-gardens’-bloom-aida-camp

Gaza Camp’s project:

1.  Hopes for women in Education

  • https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4NtlbHhCKYMSzZtVVNUNk9XZE0/view?usp=sharing_eid
  • Hopes for Women in Education

2.  Sitti Soap project

  •    https://youtu.be/hGE--TWthu4

I will be going in July to visit both refugee camps, and will personally make sure that 97 cents of every dollar you spent goes directly to help the project that you choose to support. The remaining 3% will be used for expenses such as wiring funds and preparing the reports that would verify how your donations were spent. Your donations are guaranteed tax deductible and you will be issued a receipt for the donated amount. And of course, I will update you with reports and photos on the progress of these efforts as they happen.

The good news is, I’ve already received one donation of $10,000 towards my goal of $40,000—With your generous support, we can help refugee children and families receive some of the relief and support they desperately need by way of someone you personally know and hopefully trust.

Please don’t hesitate to help in anyway-- every dollar counts. Thanks so much in advance, your support will go a long way.

Sincerely,

Amani Barakat

the West Bank; Last year they received a 9.4 out of 10 by the European Union
for clarity in their financial reports. As a result, the EU funded the camp with
a three-year program to work with 12 other refugee camps in the West Bank. I
personally visited the Lajee center in 2010 & 2011 and was very impressed
with their efforts and resourcefulness in combating the different challenges
they’ve been facing—especially after Israel built the wall around the camp,
which is home to over 6000 refugees, and where more than half of them are
children under the age of 18.
I also chose the
Gaza Refugee Camp this year after I learned about it from our Imam who has been
generously supporting several of their projects for the past 3 years. The camp
has an estimated 30,000 Gazan refugees who have no ID number in the country and
have harder time obtaining jobs, therefore its very expensive for them to
complete their education. In turn, I got connected with the Co-founder
at “Hopes for Women in Education” who has been working tirelessly with her team
to manage several vital projects in the Gaza Refugee camp, that hopefully your
generous donations will help sustain.
Here are the
projects your donations will be sponsoring: -
Aida Refugee Camp:
1- Lajee
Center’s Music Project: 

 Music 2015-2.docx


http://lajee.org/content/first-performance-lajee-center%E2%80%99s-music-group. 

http://lajee.org/content/lajee-center%E2%80%99s-music-project

2- Lajee
Center’s Rooftop Gardens.



https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4NtlbHhCKYMdTIteFdvWUhjZ00/view?usp=sharing_eid


Lajee Center Rooftop Garden Project


 http://lajee.org/content/lajee’s-‘rooftop-gardens’-bloom-aida-camp


Gaza Camp’s project:


1. 
Hopes
for women in Education



https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4NtlbHhCKYMSzZtVVNUNk9XZE0/view?usp=sharing_eid


Hopes for Women in
Education


2. 
Sitti
Soap project


   https://youtu.be/hGE--TWthu4

I will be going in
July to visit both refugee camps, and will
personally make sure that 97 cents of every dollar you spent goes directly to help the project that you choose to support. The remaining 3%
will be used for expenses such as wiring funds and preparing the reports that
would verify how your donations were spent. Your donations are guaranteed tax
deductible and you will be issued a receipt for the donated amount. And of
course, I will update you with reports and photos on the progress of these
efforts as they happen.
The good news is, I’ve
already received one donation of $10,000 towards my goal of $40,000—With your
generous support, we can help refugee children and families receive some of the
relief and support they desperately need by way of someone you personally know
and hopefully trust. 
Please don’t
hesitate to help in anyway-- every dollar counts. Thanks so much in advance,
your support will go a long way. 
Sincerely, 
Amani Barakat

story:
For 15 years I have sold Water Filtration products world wide.  I have my own product line for home - travel - sports - emergency filtration in all sizes and price ranges.  My products are NSF nationally certified which means I sell to all 50 states and world wide.  I want you to help me provide water filters to poor people.  Those most in need of clean water are those who cannot afford a simple water filter that will provide their family with clean water for years to come.

My water filters are "GRAVITY" filtration systems ... in other words ... they work ANYWHERE with NO ELECTRIC - NO HOSES - NO HOOKUPS ... just pour the water in and hours later you have gallons of clean water ... from 5 to 50 gallons per day depending on the system.   They come in both HDPE (BPA FREE) food grade plastic (economy housing) and Stainless Steel (highest quality housing).  I even have a Pre-Filter for severely polluted water to use in conjunction with the entire product line.  My filter elements are replaceable and cleanable for years of use.  These have been used by emergency agencies world wide.

My products include small personal filters (1 liter for travel) to large 20 gallon filtration and storage systems.  You can view all these products at my sales web page http://www.jmccanneyscience.com/SecWebOrderPg.htm  (be sure to return here to support the Clean Water for the Poor campaign). 

We have the ability to construct very large units up to hundreds of gallons for remote communities or for emergency situations.   

HOW CAN YOU HELP ??? contribute to this campaign in any amount that you can.  You will have the satisfaction of knowing someone somewhere is going to be healthy.  I will provide a record of the use of funds and filter recipients at your request to all who donate.  You can also designate where you would like your donations to go just let me know. 

THAT'S ALL ... PLEASE HELP ME provide Clean Water for Poor People

any donation will help ... none is too small ... donations of $1000 or more you get a free 1 liter personal travel sports water filter ($117.00 value)

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • To help promote you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
BBdone is the result of last technologies applied to babies's world. BBdone is a baby bottle maker machine that has been created to provide parents with a useful tool to feed babies when they are tired or have few time. BBdone has proved to be a good tool to be use when you need to prepared bottles for more than one baby or need to provide feeding quickly. This small electrical appliance included all the recommendations regarding the bottle feeding for babies, the exact temperature of water, the exact amount of powder milk and the hygienic functioning. We have also developed a product that meet all the certifications in this kind of appliance and that integrates in any place because it has small dimensions. We offer also a good solution to places where preparing bottles is necessary because breastfeeding is not possible and where there are many babies like hospitals or kindergardens. We recommend to follow the guides for breastfeeding but we are aware about those situations where this is not possible for several reasons.



To prepare a baby bottle with BBdone machine, you only have to put the powder milk in the right deposit, then fulfil the water deposit and finally pressing a button the machine begins to work, the water temperature reach the maximum recommended for babies and the machine maintain the water in this temperature and the BBdone dispenses the accurate amount of milk recommended by paediatrics for formula. BBdone prepare the perfect baby bottle automatically,  in less than 30 seconds by just pressing a button.











Our financial goal has been set in $25.000 not by chance. We need this amount to buy the molds to start manufacturing of BBdone. This is the most expensive part of our project at this moment and with this amount, we will be able to produce the machine and take it to the market.

This is the last part of our project. It is been four years since we began to think in BBdone. The project is well advanced. We have waited until now to launch this product to the market because we have been continuously improving the features and technical aspects of the machine to make a perfect one. We want to offer a product with guarantee because is a product targeted to babies. During this 4 years we have provide the project with our own resources and we have invest more than $340.000 and now that we are in the final part if would be a shame to throw all the hard work and money we have spent on those 4 years.

However, we also want to return some benefits of our campaign to the society. For this, we have decided that if we reach our goal, 5% of the amount collected that exceeds our needs, will be donated to SOS Children in the US because we are aware that they make a great job with children and they are helping lot of families to integrate and be happier. Therefore, with your contribution you will also be contributing with this organisation.

We have planned all our production to be deliver to our supporters in the dates you can see in the timeline. However, we have to assume that it is possible to suffer some delay in the dates stablished because of our providers and industry. This is the only risk we have to take into account at this moment.

Our challenge is to continue improving our product and providing new versions with new technologies in future phases of development if we reach now our goal.

How much time do you need to prepare a bottle with BBdone?

Preparing a baby bottle with BBdone takes you less than 30 seconds.

Can you program the machine?

Of course, You have a memory botton where the exact dose of powder milk and temperature of your bottle is memorized so next time you need to prepare a bottle you only have to press the memory button and ok button.

Do I have to cool the bottle?

No, BBdone prepares the bottle at perfect temperature so you only need to take it and feed your baby.

Can I prepare more than one bottle at a time?

The water deposit has a total capacity of 2 litres, so you can make come bottles with all that water.

Can I use any kind of powder milk?

Yes, the machine is prepared to work with any brand of powder milk so you can use any of those in the market and the machine will use the correct dose.

Can I use any kind of baby bottle?

Yes, because you can regulate the tray and you can put it in different levels according to the dimension of the bottle.

Is BBdone hygienic?

BBdone has been made with the water deposit and powder milk deposit independent so that the bottle is prepared free of any bacteria. The components of BBdone have been produced free of bisphenol (BPA free). BBdone is a product totally secured for babies. The powder milk is has a transparent lid that makes the milk remains tightly closed to prevent moisture that can compact milk powder.

How can I wash the machine?

BBdone, is prepared to be washed without any difficulty. All the components of the machine can be wash in the dishwasher and the machine is made of components easily to clean up.

Can I have the machine in more than one colour?

You have the possibility of having the machine in white and grey or in white and orange. You can choose the colour of the tray and nozzle.

How can I use BBdone?

To use BBdone you only need to follow three steps:

-  Open the water deposit and fulfil.

-  Open the powder deposit and fulfil.

-  Select the dose and Press the OK button.

Can I use BBdone during the night?

You can use BBdone during the night because the mahine incudes a LED light to illuminate your bottle while preparing and you don´t have to worry about spreading the milk.

Who created BBdone?

BBdone is the result of more than 4 years of research and investment of a team integrated by 7 members. All of us are specialized in different areas and we have provided the technical, innovative and business vision to produce this machine. We are also parents and mothers and we are very aware about the problems and needs of babies and families.

Who do I contact if I have more questions?

Send us an email to crowdfunding@bbdone.com

Who do I contact if I am interesting in investing in the product?

In that case send us an email to efren@bbdone.com

I am a member of the press who do I contact to speak with you?

If you want to diffuse our campaign or our product you can use the information in this campaign and also you can go to www.crowdbbdone.com

If you want to make an interview and any other questions write and email to crowdfunding@bbdone.com

For some people that cannot collaborate with money they can help to diffuse our product:

- Ask family and friends to diffuse this campaign
- Remember them to use the sharing tools of Indiegogo.

story:
The Challenge

Many people seeking relief from psychological and emotional challenges do not achieve the improvements they expect from counseling or realize the full benefits of therapy. It has been reported that as many as 41% of patients in the U.S. quit psychotherapy prematurely.

Even upon completing a therapy program, current therapeutic practice does not provide clients much tangible evidence of the issues they have uncovered and the progress they have made. Post-therapy, most people have few or no physical, visible reminders of the path of discovery they have taken, the growth they have achieved, and the positive changes they have initiated in their cognitive beliefs, behaviors and coping skills.

They require help to continue developing self-questioning and inner reflection, and to prevent relapse into old thinking and behaviors.

The Solution

Therapy professionals need support tools and processes to help generate more favorable therapeutic outcomes and diminish abandonment and relapse rates. A visual reminder of these successes and milestones can help prevent reversion to old habits and thought patterns.

Tangible tools are a powerful addition to the abstract ideas and principles emphasized in many therapeutic modalities: they more thoroughly engage the client’s focus and foster a positive client-therapist relationship by serving as an ongoing reminder of their progress and the core issues being addressed. This promotes the desire for continued therapy and reinforces newly acquired cognitive beliefs, behaviors, and skills after formal therapy has ended.

The Product

Life’s Onion® is a handheld, onion-shaped device with 12 peels; when the peels are opened they become petals and the device transforms into a flower. People record their goals and achievements on the actual peels, converting them to flower petals as progress is made.

Life’s Onion® is born of the idea that therapy entails "peeling away the layers" of issues and problems in the client’s life.It helps people in self-help and in therapy engage in their achievements by turning what is usually an intangible process into palpable action, literally "peeling away the layers" of their personal Life’s Onion®.

One Life’s Onion® user stated, “It will be a daily reminder of my journey through treatment, self-reflection, growth, and continued success in life.” It is not often that people have a visible reminder of their growth and achievements outside of the therapeutic environment, and this was clearly the creator’s goal.

story:
Hi, thanks for checking out my campaign!!!!

  My name is Graeme Cary. I am a 34 small business' owner in Brisbane, Queensland on the East coast of Australia.

  I am raising money to help fund Parkinson's research.  After meeting my partner 7 years ago, and her Grandmother, whom is suffering from Parkinson's, and then my father was diagnosed with Parkinson's and Alzheimer approximately 12 months ago, it has made me all to aware of just how catastrophic these diseases can be to someones life.

  So I decided I needed to try and help in whatever way I can, not only to make their lives more comfortable, but all those who I had never met that are suffering as well.

  After much  turmoil at my ignorance to these diseases, prior to them affecting my life.  As well as a feeling of helplessness , as I am not I scientist able to contribute towards preventative treatments, or a famous person with a platform to alert the population to the plight of those suffering and their families and loved ones. Somebody suggested raising money through a crowd funding project to help those who are in a position to help.... so here i am! 

  This is my first small campaign to try and raise $5000 dollars toward Parkinson's Research and awareness.  All of the proceeds, whether we reach our goal or not, will be shared between the Michael J Fox Foundation and Parkinson's Australia after we pay for any marketing costs. 

  Whether or not not you know someone or are related to someone with Parkinson's, you will be able to help impact the lives of those are suffering now and perhaps be a small part of stopping the suffering of people in the future.

  It doesn't matter how much you give whether its $0.20 to $20 or more, your contribution is a step closer to speeding up the challenging path to finding a cure.

  With a lot of research done their is still a long way to go - your contribution will go to help;

  • translating genetic research in to real treatments
  • backing a Parkinson's vaccine
  • tracking bio-markers for earlier detection in potential future patients allowing better treatments
  • treating Parkinson's cognitive impairment
  • dismantling business and government hurdles in drug developments
  •  raising the profile of Parkinson's in the wider community
  • lobbying all Australian governments for better and more access to services
  • more treatment options and support for people with Parkinson's, their families and carers.

Any and all help will have an impact!!!

  I am aware that $5000 dollars is only a small amount in the grand scheme of things, but this is the start of my ongoing pledge to raise funds toward a goal of finding a cure for Parkinson's and to the stop the suffering of countless numbers of people affected by this horrible disease across Australia and the world.

  I realize that not everyone is in a position to help financially, but that doesn't mean that you cant help our cause by sharing this on facebook or other social media.

  Equally if you wish to donate more than what I am trying to raise or you want to donate direct please find the links below for both the Michael J Fox Parkinsons research foundation and Parkinson's Australia!!

  Thankyou for taking the time to look at my campaign!!!!

https://www.michaeljfox.org

http://www.parkinsons.org.au/donate/donate.htm

story:
The Low Down

The pFIT is an exercise device that can be anchored to most standard chairs.  The patented motion of the pFIT allows for a controlled, dynamic sitting experience providing benefits to the pelvic floor, lower back and hips.  The pFIT develops strength, mobility and improved function to those suffering with urinary incontinence, lower back pain and abdominal weakness.

The pFIT responds to any subtle shift in your weight and requires no batteries or electricity.  The patented design allows the pFIT platform to tilt, slide and rotate all at the same time with just the right amount allowing the user to effectively challenge their muscles of the hips, pelvis and spine. 

Our team is seeking help in bringing life to this project so that we can provide a practical and improved solution to those suffering with urinary incontinence and lower back pain.  Sitting is a fact of life in today’s society.  Regardless of the progress made with stand up desks and other interventions, people will still spend part of their day sitting.

We are exercise people and we know that experiencing life to the fullest involves movement.  With the average person spending 50-70% of their time sitting-we have created a way to make that time physically beneficial. 

The pFIT can be used while feeding the baby, working on the computer, eating, etc. without interfering with or distracting from any of those activities.  Don’t want to keep moving?  Just allow the pFIT platform to move in one direction and fix it in place by just shifting your weight.

Movement is life.  The better we move, the more comfortably we move, the more confidently we move-the more we enjoy all that life has to offer.  


The Vision

Our goal of $25,000 will allow us to:

  • Finalize design for mass production.  In order to provide an affordable solution to as many people as possible, we must have the most cost effective design and materials.
  • Create the product mold.  This is an expensive endeavor but ultimately allows for producing enough pFITS in the shortest amount of time to meet the demands of our customers
  • Validate and verify for intended use.  After the first articles are produced, they need to be stress tested and safety tested to meet our demanding standards of product quality
  • Source production
The Game Changer
The “evils” of sitting have been exposed in major media outlets for the past two years following a series of studies that tied mortality to the accumulated hours of sitting over a lifetime.  We get that.  But that is sedentary sitting.  The pFIT is dynamic sitting. 

Let’s face it-chairs will never go away.  A nursing mother is not going to stand up to breast feed her baby.  Nobody enjoys a cup of coffee and their favorite novel standing in the living room. 

The motion of the pFIT challenges the muscles of the pelvic floor and can be combined with traditional Kegals to progress the functional benefits of those kinds of exercises. The more superficial abdominals work to control the position of the torso over the pelvis as the lower back gently explores helpful ranges of motion.

Along with all of this, circulation is stimulated which aids with oxygen flowing to the brain and water is helped to make its way from your digestive track to help hydrate all the tissues in the body.  And of course the motion and control on the pFIT requires energy so there is some calorie burning too.

We have the team in place that can make this product a huge success globally.  Our existing product, the Core-Tex™ is a maturing business currently available in more than 15 countries and is being used by NFL, MLB, NBA, Premier League and Division I college teams.  Some of the finest health clubs in the world use the Core-Tex™ and in 2013 the Metro-the UK’s largest newspaper called the Core-Tex™ “One of the Top 10 Fitness Trends for 2013”.


Is this Slam Dunk?

Unfortunately no.  But all business success requires preparation, determination, timing and a little luck.  We already have the intellectual property  protection in place from the Core-Tex.  The markets we are entering are in the billions of dollars.  And our team consists of experts in business, manufacturing and biomechanics-the 3 most important areas for this product.

Risks?  As with any business venture there is the possibility of unforeseen problems.  Potential problems that we could face would be:

  1. Costs exceed the amount we receive from supporters during the campaign
  2. Projected materials do not perform as expected and other materials will need to be sourced.
  3. The addition of the pFIT raises the height of the seat too much for some people so they can not touch the floor with their feet. 

If costs exceed the funds raised, we can look to other investors for the necessary cash flow.  We will use all of the support and positive feedback from our Indiegogo family to pitch outsiders. 

Materials can easily be replaced but testing them will take time and potentially affect our timeline for production. 

If the increase in seat height is too much, the pFIT can be used with a foot stool that either the customer already owns or that bundle in with the sale. 

Other Ways You Can Support the pFIT

Even if you cannot help us financially but still want to support our mission, here are a few ideas:  

  • Share on social media (using the Indiegogo “share tools” helps us track traffic)
  • Forward the link to friends or family that you know would benefit from pFIT and ask them to share!
  • Do you know anyone in the media that loves this space and seeing products that help people?  Share with them so they can help get the word out. 
  • Are you a blogger?  We can help you with great content as you formulate your blog
  • We would also love to get the pFIT in front of health care workers, ergonomic professionals and those that provide furniture and equipment for those markets. 

What the Experts Say

Dr. Elizabeth Leeds offers some extremely valuable education for patients and explains why the pFIT can be incredibly beneficial for pelvic floor and lower back rehabilitation.  A must watch!

story:
Short Summary

 GreenTREE Yoga is an established charity nonprofit with the mission of bringing the benefits of yoga to underserved populations and the people who work with them (greentreeyoga.org). Our program focus is trauma-sensitive yoga, so we work in Title One schools, with veterans, and in shelters.  We also do professional development for social workers, nurses, health care professionals, and teachers. 

We have developed a trauma-sensitive yoga program that allows us to share yoga with veterans at the Salt Lake Veterans Administration (VA).  We provide two weekly classes for women only and two classes for both men and women.

GreenTREE is in the third year of a five year contract for trauma-sensitive yoga at the VA.  We've expanded to FIVE classes a week!  We also provide professional development for clinicians on how to use simple yoga for trauma and vicarious trauma – for self-care and with their clients. Teaching veterans how to feel safe in their bodies and how to manage their stress (and to share these ideas with others) is one of the most rewarding things I do.

Yoga offers a body-based intervention for trauma survivors, using both the mind and body to promote healing.  Trauma-sensitive, body-based yoga helps people with PTDS to feel their bodies, to learn to befriend their bodies, and to self-regulate. This all supports neuronal rewiring of the brain so that people may regain a positive approach to life and to find enjoyment in their days.

All of your contributions would go directly toward providing free DVDs/CDs to veterans, to provide more free community trauma-sensitive yoga classes to veterans, and to fund an 'Art and Yoga' program at the Women Veterans’ Retreat at The National Ability Center in Park City in July, 2015. 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise $1,500 for our veterans’ program: (1)for our popular CD/DVDs “Yoga for Caregivers’ to donate to veterans taking our yoga classes  (2) for journals and art materials for our journaling classes we offer after our yoga classes ; 3) Materials for our Art and Yoga Program offered at VA retreats for women with military sexual trauma;  and, 4) free, community-based, trauma-sensitive yoga classes for veterans - we will work with Team Red White and Blue.

The Art and Yoga program is our successful program in which we help children address trauma by combining the benefits of yoga and artistic expression. They do the yoga and art with their mothers and receive free materials and yoga games to support using yoga breaks to self-regulate at home.

We will apply ALL of the funds we receive toward the program implementation. 

Perks:  See product details at greentreeyoga.org. 
Receive a special letter of thanks to your Veteran in recognition of service.

$20.00: Shanti the Monkey Poster (11 x 17 inch color print)

$30.00:  LittleTREE Yoga CD/DVD for ages 3-8.  It's a great way to introduce yoga to kids or to do yoga with your family.  It also is used in schools and shelters OR the Yoga for Caregivers DVD/CD. 

$50.00  LittleTREE Yoga CD/DVD and a Shanti the Monkey coloring book

$100.00  LittleTREE Yoga CD/DVD, a Shanti the Monkey coloring book, and the book Yoga Makes Me Feel ...

$500.00:  Shanti the Monkey micropile cushion (12x18"); Shanti the Monkey coloring book; and the book, Yoga Makes Me Feel…

Please enjoy FREE yoga breaks on our website -- greentreeyoga.org.  Go to the FREE link - there are office yoga breaks (2 and 5 minutes) and free yoga breaks for kids.

The Impact

GreenTREE Yoga has established strong working relationship with the Salt Lake VA over the past 3 years.

Research* has shown that a body-based, somatic approach to healing trauma is an important first step. A trauma-sensitive yoga practice can help people learn to befriend their bodies and to feel safe. Only after feeling the body and learning to feel safe in the body can one learn to regulate core arousal systems, to relax, through simple breathing techniques.  If a person can’t feel his body, if the limbic system is in overdrive (Daniel Siegel calls it “limbic lava”), then he is not able to benefit from talking, a higher level cognitive function.  A highly stressed person is not open to processing language, to what therapists have to say.  First, you have to get a person calm, then one can access the functions in the prefrontal cortex.  Trauma-sensitive yoga provides tools for each of these three steps:  first feeling the body, then feeling safe in the body, and then regulating core arousal systems.

  The last piece of the healing puzzle is that this process of body-based healing helps people to rewire the brain, to use the brain’s strong abilities to undergo neuroplasticity so that people may find joy in their lives again. 

*Bessel van der Kolk,MD; Pat Odgen, PhD, Peter Levine, PhD, Stephen Porges, PhD. 

Risks & Challenges

GreenTREE Yoga programs have value for several key reasons.

1. Community Support

GreenTREE Yoga has many community partners, including ABLE-Differently, The Children’s Center, InBody Outreach, RISE, Utah PTA, and the Utah State Office of Education.

We have long standing partnerships with The Children's Center (a nonprofit school that serves children with emotional challenges) and InBody Outreach, a yoga volunteer nonprofit.

We have worked with veterans for several years and done many professional development trainings for the professionals who work with veterans.

2.  Professional Development

  In addition, GreenTREE does professional development trainings for teachers, social workers, and nurses for continuing education credits.  We also present at many annual conferences on the topics of yoga and trauma, yoga and compassion fatigue, and yoga in the schools. Our programs are presented nationally and internationally. A list is provided on our website, greentreeyoga.org.

3.  Commitment to the Cause

GreenTREE Yoga has continually demonstrated its commitment to helping people of all ages and abilities to improve the quality of their lives through using yoga to learn to self-regulate, to heal, and to maintain health.  In addition to years of successful programing, we continue to develop more support materials.  We have developed trauma training kits, school kits and curricula, books, dvds, cds, and other support materials.  Our new projects include yoga for the special needs child.  


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are supportive of our cause, there are other ways that you can show your support.

Please let your friends know about this fundraising campaign. 

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you so much for taking the time to learn about our programs.

There are FREE yoga breaks on our website -- greentree yoga.org   FREE link.  Enjoy!

story:
Holyhead Care Centre is a Coventry based 24 bedded care home for people of all ages suffering with mental health illnesses such as Schizophrenia and Bi-Polar.

We are looking to raise as much money as possible to help transform our old and dated dining area into a 60's American Diner.

The key to Mental health is to keep be people occupied both physically and mentally and that is why we have chosen an American Diner because it is very visually pleasing with lots to look at and lots to talk about such as memories from the past.

In the past we have created a cinema and a sports bar for our service users which have been very successful. But this time we require as much help as we can get.

Thank you for taking the time to read this and thank you for your support

Jordan Mallier

Care Home Manager

story:
This is a very unsettling story. But you can help turn things around. 
Please read on.
 

Short Summary

Meet Dakkie. She's 17, living in an unimaginably poor family. Thanks to companies restructuring both parents lost their jobs, and couldn't provide her with the needed growth hormones in her early childhood. She's now barely 5ft tall... because she couldn't afford to grow. 

During a surgery she contracted a nasty bacteria that massacred her kidneys. 

She was on dialysis for years until a conscious doctor arranged for kidney transplantation surgery. Her mother (lady to the left in the pic) donated the kidney. 

But she now faces losing the donated kidney because her family can't afford regular treatment for the next 3 years. 

What she needs?

Dakkie needs about $200/mo for the next 3 years for treatment. That's it. No big sums, no long lists of complex medical procedures. The money goes to daily administering the needed medication to save this girl's last chance to live. 

The Impact

Dakkie is a teenage girl living in an impoverished family. 

She is 5ft. tall because of poverty. 

She spent her childhood in dialysis rooms because of poverty.

She faces a life threatening situation, again, because of poverty. 

No teenager should have her life stolen from her because of poverty... especially when it's so easy to get the minimum sum she needs to at least live. 

Risks & Challenges

If you've read so far, you do have a heart that wants to help. The risk now is that you'd just say "nah, forget about this, I'd like to support a different cause that's more dramatic". 

The challenge is to stop for a second here and consider this: There's no greater drama than deciding the fate of a 17 year old with a single click of a mouse. 

Imagine, with a $20 donation, you help Dakkie push through two days. With a $200, she can get through a month worth of medication. With $2400, you purchase an entire year of life for this teen. Together, with only $8000, we secure her survival. 

The $8000 will buy LIFE for this teenager. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Helping Dakkie is very easy. She doesn't need a heap of money. Take part in the joy of living Dakkie will have, buy a month of life for her, or a year, or how much you are willing to give, but please, do give.

Also, share this with your friends, family, colleagues etc. The more people know, the more Dakkie's chance to live are better. 

Let's save this teen. It doesn't take much for us to do so.

story:
Hi I'm Jessica. When I became a mom, I felt like I was floating on an inner tube on the ocean. Every once in a while a friend would float by and we'd hold hands for a moment - and then the waves would take me away again.

The isolation was surprising, considering I'd been teaching prenatal yoga for many years.

But for a new mom, sometimes our whole day is about getting baby to take a nap. And we're not even successful at that. 

And my yoga practice just didn't seem to fit. I didn't have an hour of serene time, I couldn't afford childcare to go to class, and Sun Salutes were not helping me find my core again - in fact they seemed to be making it worse.

I created Ma Yoga not only to help pregnant women and new moms stay strong, calm and out of pain throughout their journey, but to provide communities in their neighborhoods where they could bring baby back to class.

In our Prenatal and Mom Yoga, we give specific guidance in exactly what our bodies need at every point in the journey to motherhood an beyond - on and off the mat.

So far, Ma Yoga teachers have helped over 5,000 women in Southern California have an empowering transition to motherhood.

But we know that many women who do not have easy access to classes, or can't afford to go to them. 

With your support, we are giving birth to a space where yoga teachers, birth practitioners and mom experts can provide classes and talks for pregnant women and new moms everywhere.

The Ma Yoga Living Room will be an online platform where open-hearted and wise professionals can share their gifts with more mamas going through this vulnerable chapter in our lives. We will be able to teach more women to access their innate power, wisdom, and nurturing energy.

Please stand with us in our mission by giving us whatever feels right for you. Just by contributing you (and your website if you have none) will be listed on our Ma Yoga Friends page - and at different donation levels there are different "perks".

Don't forget to select your perk on the right side bar by clicking on it - we are offering some great ones, and if you select The Ma Yoga I CAN Core Strengthening Program for Post-Baby Bellies (and Diastisis Recti), you'll be part of an intimate group getting personal support from me as I share each video in the 2-month program.

P.us you'll get my Morning "Ma" Meditation and the Low Back Relief practice as well.

We are so grateful for your support - thank you!

Our mission: to provide guidance, inspiration and support for pregnant women and new moms in their own living rooms.

We will also offer online prenatal and postpartum teacher trainings for yoga teachers, so they can create their own mama circles in their own neighborhoods, and join us online. Our list of offerings will start with:

         

The Ma Yoga Certified teachers below have chosen to start "mama circles" in their own neighborhoods. With this funding they will be able to inspire a lot more women with their teachings!





 

 

Many new moms don't have access to guidance on how to recover emotionally from their births; how to get get strong again; and how to make healthy lifestyle choices for themselves and their families.

           


Many Ob/Gyns are recommending prenatal yoga not only for the physical exercise and calming meditation but because studies show it can even have a positive affect on birth outcomes.  

      

Thank you for helping us provide these beneficial practices to anyone who wants them!

                                   


The funds we raise will go toward producing introductory meditation and yoga programs, to make sure people are practicing safely and effectively at home. 

These programs - listed as "perks" on the right sidebar - include Quickie Morning Meditation, Low Back Pain Relief, and Core Strengthening. You don't have to be a mom to enjoy them! We will also create foundational prenatal yoga videos. 

Funds that come in above $20,000 will allow us to upgrade our teachers' recording equipment, so they can post quality classes in the Ma Yoga Living Room.

If we reach our stretch goal of $30,000, we will improve our website, making it easy for mamas to search our videos depending how much time they have, and whether baby is inside or out, on the mat with them or doing their own thing.


You can choose to receive quick and effective yoga, meditation and wellness practices as we produce them - and the higher your donation level, the more you get.

Please contribute at whatever level feels right to you and select your perk above. Even $5 gets you (and your website) listed as a Ma Yoga Friend!

You name and website listed on our Friends page, plus 10 (Easy, Nourishing) Recipes I Wouldn't Want to be a (Busy) Mom Without. and The Yoga of Pregnancy Do's and Don'ts.

Above plus: Learn a quick meditation to do in the morning - including a breath practice - to get you connected, focused and ready for your day.

Above plus: Learn how little shifts in how you sit, stand, and sleep can help your back feel better. And short, simple exercises to get instant relief.

Above plus: Whether you have a soft belly, pelvic instability or diastasis recti, this course will lead you through gentle daily exercises that tone your abs and restore stability - for vanity and sanity!

Above plus: Get better sleep, more energy, and a stronger immune system with these 5,000 year old wellness principles from Ayurveda. Simple food and daily rhythm principles that are like having a Users Manual for your body!

Above plus: Once the Ma Yoga Living Room is up and running, enjoy a VIP year where you get access to all the classes our teachers are offering.

Above plus: Have an ache or pain? Wish you could lose weight or change your eating habits? Dreaming of finding time for that project? Our Lifestyle Coaching program will help you move forward faster in manifesting your intentions.

Above plus: Do you have an eco-friendly, organic, convenient way to make mom's life easier? Please contact us at jessica@mayoga.com for our Corporate Sponsor package.

Above plus: Do you have an eco-friendly, organic, and/or convenient way to make mom's life easier? Please contact us at jessica@mayoga.com for our Corporate Sponsor package.

Above plus: Support the mission of our non-profit arm to provide yoga and guidance to teenage mothers.



We can't become ourselves, by ourselves.

If you've ever taken a yoga class that shifted you from fear to power...

if you've ever received words of wisdom that helped you move forward when you'd been stuck...

if your life was ever shifted by someone generously extending care to you...

then please help us bring the Ma Yoga Living Room into the world! 

                       

Thank you for your support and we can't wait to see you in the Living Room!
story_txt:
Hi I'm Jessica. When I became a mom, I felt like I was floating on an inner tube on the ocean. Every once in a while a friend would float by and we'd hold hands for a moment - and then the waves would take me away again.The isolation was surprising, considering I'd been teaching prenatal yoga for many years.But for a new mom, sometimes our whole day is about getting baby to take a nap. And we're not even successful at that. 
And my yoga practice just didn't seem to fit. I didn't have an hour of serene time, I couldn't afford childcare to go to class, and Sun Salutes were not helping me find my core again - in fact they seemed to be making it worse.I created Ma Yoga not only to help pregnant women and new moms stay strong, calm and out of pain throughout their journey, but to provide communities in their neighborhoods where they could bring baby back to class.In our Prenatal and Mom Yoga, we give specific guidance in exactly what our bodies need at every point in the journey to motherhood an beyond - on and off the mat.So far, Ma Yoga teachers have helped over 5,000 women in Southern California have an empowering transition to motherhood.But we know that many women who do not have easy access to classes, or can't afford to go to them. With your support, we are giving birth to a space where yoga teachers, birth practitioners and mom experts can provide classes and talks for pregnant women and new moms everywhere.The Ma Yoga Living Room will be an online platform where open-hearted and wise professionals can share their gifts with more mamas going through this vulnerable chapter in our lives. story:
The Dream

Our dream is to give every athlete, team, and league a way to easily share their sporting lives and raise the funds they need to make their dreams come true.

The Problem?

It takes a lot of money to play sports.  Amateur sports are having trouble funding school and recreational sports alike.  

The amount people can participate in sports is directly correlated to how much money they have and the amount of access they have to sports equipment, communities, etc. Countless causes have been founded to address this problem, but charity is not enough. 

Sports are one of the biggest revenue generating industries in the world. Individual athletes, amateur teams & leagues, semi-pro teams & leagues and professional sports outside of the U.S., are left out of the billion dollar business plan and are missing huge amounts of opportunity.  Currently, most athletes, teams and leagues don't have a centralized network and effective, interactive approach to reaching their community.   Individual athletes, amateur and semi-pro teams & leagues, and professional sports outside the U.S. are largely left out of the billion-dollar industry and are missing out on huge opportunities. Currently athletes, teams, and leagues lack a centralized network to reach their communities. They don't have one place to reach their fans, monetize their media, and raise funds. Amateur sports needs a better way to sustain itself.

The NCAA, MLB, NFL, NASCAR, NBA, and other televised sports leagues have been able to aggregate their markets. If individuals, teams, and leagues around the world could easily share their sports moments with their fans, family, and friends, then their value and money-making potential would expand exponentially. Millions of dollars are generated on YouTube using amateur and professional-athlete footage, but the athletes and amateur teams receive none of it. The NCAA, publications, professional leagues, and websites are generating billions off of these "small-time" athletes and local teams. It's time that this silent majority had the right tools to harness the revenue they generate.

So many athletes are left undiscovered because of lack of exposure and a simple inability to get noticed. Many athletes are good enough to play NCAA sports and are popular enough in their community to earn money through the sport they love; they just don't have the tools needed to raise funds, and most scholarships don't cover the full cost of tuition. You need exposure to get recruited, and scholarships do not provide enough funding on their own to keep you playing.

Our Solution

We want to change the world of sports by giving every individual, team and league  a platform to display and share all of their sports accomplishments... and make money doing it. #FundYourSports

Using the power of technology, we want to provide everyone in the sports world with the same money-making tools that professional organizations have.

 1. A huge community of sports fans:  We bring together world wide athletes, teams, leagues onto one platform for all of their fans to follow and discover. 

 2. Share your sports media: We provide the features within this platform for athletes, teams and leagues to display their stats, events, photos, videos, news, and communicate with their community of fans.

 3. Generate your own revenue:  We want to give you the tools to create subscriptions and distribute their own merchandise, tickets, game streams, sponsorship and ad placement. 

 4. Get your share of what we make: Because you're generating the content, we are offering to share the revenue your website makes for us on our platform! What if you received a piece of the money you generate for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any app or site you're currently using? 

How can you, your team or league make money on MySportsShare.com?

Right now you can:

- Revenue-share 50% of any advertising dollars on any individual, team or league page that is licensed and branded. 

- Receive donations from anyone with an easy two-click donation process.

- Offer banner ads on your team or league page to sell to local or nationwide sponsor.
In the future you will be able to:

- Use subscription-based video services to post videos of games, practices, and lessons that will only be available to your subscribers.

- Sell tickets to your games. 

- Get a % of the tickets you sell to your teams' games.

- Create custom team and league shops to sell goods to your fans.

- Create custom individual shops to sell your brand and likeness to your fans.

- Offer ads within videos.

What We Have:

MySportsShare.com is a way to start a website, track & share your sports activities and raise money to help fund your sports.  It also gives athletes, teams, and leagues a platform to display their photos, videos, news, stats and sports history. 

Do you want to share your sports career with your friends, family, and fans? Do you want to have a better chance of getting recruited? 

An individual athlete can currently go on the site and add information, from the schools they attend to their favorite teams and sports highlights. You can add all of the sports you play in the MySports area and start sharing highlights and stats with fans, coaches, and recruiters. Find and communicate with any individual, team, or league on the site. Capture your whole sports career and then share it with everybody on Facebook and Twitter. This is the perfect tool to record your sports life as it happens and possibly get yourself recruited. You can keep a free page that isn't public, branded, or revenue generating, but which can be seen by anyone in our network as well as our affiliates. You can also buy a branded page that is public, includes revenue shares, receives donations, and can easily be shared with coaches or scouts without them having to log in to the website.

Not generating any money from your current website?  Do you have a fan base that is more interactive and larger than your sponsors think? 

We provide you with a place to start a team website that not only lets you share and manage your team and schedule but also helps you raise funds!

Your website will keep your players and fans up to date while helping you easily manage the administrative aspects of coaching.  Our team management features include: roster management, lineup creation, payment collection, event calendar for games and practices, box scores for all games, location listings, stat management, blog and news space, video and photo uploading for social media sharing. Coaches and league admins can create a free website to test the management software. Once they decide they like it, they can contact us to buy a licensed website that makes their page public and will be branded to reflect their team colors and logo.  It makes your site revenue-sharing for ads and allows public donations to make it easy for you to raise funds.   

Do you harness the money making power of your league on the internet the way the pros do? Does your league have one place to keep everyone up to date easily? 

The league management features include: manage all teams rosters, manage all team and league admins, collect payments for players or full teams, event calendar for games and other events, box scores for all games, location listings, manage stats, create a blog, add news, communicate with players fans and coaches, upload photos and videos and share them with Facebook and Twitter.  For leagues, administrators can create a league and get a free website to test the management software. Once they decide they like it, they can contact us to buy a licensed website that makes their page public, all their teams pages public, they will all be branded to reflect their league colors logo, and allows the league to easily begin raising funds publicly through our revenue sharing and donation platform.

Why are We Crowdfunding?

So that we can:

- add video/streaming and subscription features: $10,000

- add individual, team and league features plus better User Interface and Design: $5,000  

- add more team sports and supporting stats:  $2,000

- add more individual sports and supporting stats:  $2,000

- custom team and league shop: $2,000

- create the full mobile application for the website:  $13,000

- create mobile applications for scorekeeping, streaming games, finding teammates and more: $4,000 x 3= $12, 000

- create a widget to add to any existing websites that a team or league may have that connects them to their MySportsShare licensed page: $3,000

- add custom ticket purchasing: $2,000


The total amount we are looking to raise from the public is $50,000. Let's do this together, for our friends, our families, our communities, and ourselves!


From The Founder

Sports are central to building relationships in your community, learning life lessons, and creating good exercise and health habits.  They also make lasting memories, not only for the athletes but for those watching them as well. 

Born overseas to a military family, I've lived in Spain, Alaska, North Carolina, and now New York. Sports were always the way that I made friends, identified myself, identified with others, and hoped to create a career. I went to UNC-Chapel Hill and majored in Exercise and Sports Science, and afterward set out to become an entrepreneur.  

My friends, family, and community were my biggest supporters growing up, but being in a military family that moved so frequently, it was nearly impossible for any of them to keep up with me. It was the part of my youth that I most remember, but also the part that I most wish could have been better documented. I had aspirations of getting recruited and playing pro, but being on military bases or in small towns my whole life limited my ability to get necessary exposure. I was not recruited heavily and no one helped me get recruited, and like most athletes I left college with tremendous debt. I moved to New York in 2006 to help my friend start a business. The business was extremely successful, and we sold our assets in 2012.  

MySportsShare is a passion project, backed by my closest friends and the money I made from selling my previous business. The idea started as a way to make sure that anyone who plays sports can share each moment with their family and friends, anywhere and anytime. We've also added it to our mission to make sure they can raise the funds that are so desperately needed to play sports. We've gotten this far, and now we need your help. That's why we're here.

story:
Let’s talk frankly. Gas and bloating blows!

95% of us have experienced it at one point or another....

60% of us suffer from it 2 or more times per week....

Yep, there’s no better way to describe it. IT BLOWS!


I know this from personal, painful experience. From the time I was a young child growing up in Puerto Rico, I suffered from painful gas and bloating almost daily. I'm talking debilitating pain and trapped gas that would stay with me for hours.

Today, in my work as a nutrition coach, I see this problem happen to clients over and over.

The Birth Of D-Gest

After years of learning about herbalism, detox and plant-based nutrition, I discovered that herbs (some of the most popular ones used in your favorite meals today) can help relieve these awful symptoms in a safe and highly effective way.

So I set out to create an herbal mix based on what I’ve learned from years studying Chinese Medicine and Ayurveda and used myself as a “guinea pig” to test its efficiency.

The result was so successful that I started to offer my little remedy to my friends and later my coaching clients, all with high levels of success.

No more gas and bloat!



The Team

I wanted the world to have access to this amazing formula, so I set out to find an experienced team that could help me bring this dream a reality.

I teamed up with Roy Krebs and Ben Hebert (from Natural Stacks), who are revolutionizing the supplement industry with high-quality, organic ingredients and an iron-clad, full-transparency policy and an impressive commitment to excellence and quality.


They believed in my product, got really excited about the idea, and we partnered together to create D-Gest Naturals, a new supplement company that will eventually include a full line of supplement products for digestive health.

Our first product will be an organic, herbal remedy to relieve gas and bloating. Check out our FAQ's for more details about D-Gest!

______________________________________________________________________________

Frequently Asked Questions

What Is D-Gest?

D-Gest is a supplement product to relieve gas and bloating, sold in an eco-friendly, discreet packaging and using an all-vegetarian, highly effective formula based on ancient Ayurveda recipes.

What Does D-Gest Do?

Simply put, D-Gest helps you eliminate discomfort, pain and embarrassment by reducing gas and improving digestion.

Where Will It Be Sold?

The product will sell via online retailers and eventually at health food stores and pharmacies across the country.

Why Create This Product Now?

With 60% of people complaining of gas and bloating 2 or more times per week, it seems obvious that the existing over-the-counter (OTC) remedies for digestive discomfort are not very effective.

So How is D-Gest Better Than What’s Already In The Market?

D-Gest is a vegetarian herbal formula that is safe and healthy for you.

The active ingredients in D-Gest are herbs used for hundreds of years in the treatment of gas and bloating and are well studied and well known to provide relief in minutes.

  • No more remembering to take it before a meal
  • You don't have to wait 45 minutes for it to work as you do with other typical Over-The-Counter solutions!
  • Enough with the walking around with a large bottle that screams at everyone who sees it that you are a gassy and bloated!

It also comes in cool, discreet packaging – think the Virgin America of digestive supplements, the Apple of gas relief.

Who Is The Team Behind D-Gest?

Nutrition coach Jovanka Ciares. I've teamed up with Roy Krebs and Ben Hebert, the successful team behind Natural Stacks, to revolutionize the digestive aid and digestive supplement industry.

Why Are We Here?

D-Gest is currently in the early stages of creation. We need your help and contribution to get it off the ground and running smoothly.

How Will You Use The Money?

We've been working on D-Gest for well over a year. We funded as much as we could we our own pockets and now need the help of our community to take it to the next level. We need just over $31,000 to cover:

What’s In It For Me?

Your contribution will of course have some awesome perks that you can check out on our campaign page!

When Will D-Gest Hit The Market?

We expect to have the product ready for sale and available to YOU by 4th Quarter 2015.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about D-Gest! Share this campaign page by using the Indiegogo share tools!

____________________________________________________________________________

We believe that clean, natural remedies should be available to everyone in the world. And that you can eliminate the pain and embarrassment from gas and bloating without having to resort to products with artificial ingredients or chemicals.

That is our promise to you. Please contribute and share with your friends! We truly appreciate it.

MANY THANKS! MIL GRACIAS!

And a special THANKS to Breyon Bradford  for his help with our video!

Love and Light,

Jovanka, Ben, Roy and the D-Gest Naturals team
story_txt:
Let’s talk frankly. Gas and bloating blows! 
95% of us have experienced it at one point or another....60% of us suffer from it 2 or more times per week....Yep, there’s no better way to describe it. IT BLOWS!
I know this from personal, painful experience. From the time I was a young child growing up in Puerto Rico, I suffered from painful gas and bloating almost daily. I'm talking debilitating pain and trapped gas that would stay with me for hours.
Today, in my work as a nutrition coach, I see this problem
happen to clients over and over.
The Birth Of D-Gest
After years of learning about herbalism, detox and
plant-based nutrition, I discovered that herbs (some of the most popular ones
used in your favorite meals today) can help relieve these awful symptoms in a
safe and highly effective way.So I set out to create an herbal mix based on
what I’ve learned from years studying Chinese Medicine and Ayurveda and used
myself as a “guinea pig” to test its efficiency.
The result was so successful that I started to offer my
little remedy to my friends and later my coaching clients, all with high
levels of success. 
No more gas and bloat!

The Team
I wanted the world to have access to this amazing formula, so
I set out to find an experienced team that could help me bring this dream a
reality.
I teamed up with Roy Krebs and Ben Hebert (from
Natural Stacks), who are revolutionizing the supplement industry with high-quality, organic ingredients and an iron-clad, full-transparency policy and an
impressive commitment to excellence and quality.
They believed in my product, got really excited about the
idea, and we partnered together to create D-Gest Naturals, a new supplement
company that will eventually include a full line of supplement products for
digestive health.Our first product will be an organic, herbal remedy to relieve gas and bloating. Check out our FAQ's for more details about D-Gest!______________________________________________________________________________Frequently Asked Questions

will sell via online retailers and eventually at health food stores and pharmacies
across the country.

With 60% of people complaining of gas and bloating 2 or more
times per week, it seems obvious that the existing over-the-counter (OTC)

story:
Heavenly Essentials Partners

Colleen- Grace- Shannon

We are here in front of you today asking for your financial help in growing our Heavenly Essential business.

In our smaller agriculture community it is hard to find healthy choices without driving over 100 mile in any direction. Heavenly Essentials LLC is working very hard to provide options for a better way of life. With the funds we will be able to reach a larger customer base with our marketing budget. Telling even more people about our products and services.

We need funds to expand our inventory of natural organic supplements, nuts, seeds, olive oils, coconut oils, essential oils, and therapeutic items. When we increase our marketing budget, we will include a larger sign on our outside wall so we can be found easily.

 Because of our strong convictions about the need for healthy alternative resources in our community we have formulated our natural handcrafted products using organic coconut oil and essential oils.

These can take the place of products you may be using that have unhealthy side effects.

We need your help so we can provide these non-toxic creams and soaks for your overall well being. We would appreciate any and all contributions to our project so please pick a perk.

============================================================

Handcrafted Alternative Choices for your Wellness...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Our Request...

We are requesting funds to expand inventory, increase our marketing budget and purchase a new outdoor sign.

  1. We are projecting $8000 for our project, this will give our company the funds to increase our natural organic product line, alone with getting the word to our region with radio ads. 
  2. Our perks will be anything from our own products to essential oil samples to the services we offer inside Heavenly Essentials.
  3. We expect to succeed with our projected goal, but if some unforeseen reason we will still proceed forward with our product line and marketing
We are thanking everyone who has contributed and hope more people get involved in our project.  Have a great day!

story:
Introducing 

A new massage tool and method created by Juan Reque. After more then 20 years of experience as a "hands- on" physical therapist he has come up with a new way of preventing injuries and relieving chronic muscle, tendon and joint pains. 

Some of his many notable professional achievements include working as a sports medicine trainer for the ATP (professional tennis circuit) medical services, being part of the Spanish national tennis Davis Cup team, and over 5 years working as a full time trainer and therapist for professional tennis player Maria Sharapova. 

Now it is his time to take it to the next level and make a difference, to create something unique that can help the fitness and sports medicine community. 

Massage has been here forever, all kind of hands-on manipulations ranging from deep tissue, cross friction, shiatsu, Rolfing, ART, acupressure… 

He found out that all these techniques use pushing and compressing. But what about the negative effect of the adhesions between skin and muscles/fascias? What about the decrease of lymphatic and blood flow that occurs in the area of a chronic injury? What about the incorrect functionality and movement when the different skin and muscle layers cannot move freely? This is when he started pulling instead of pushing. The idea was pretty simple. 


Thimblex is already a reality. For over one year he has designed, created and patented the blue and green thimbles. More important he has proven that they work great in some specific injuries like:

- Knee arthritis. 

- Achilles tendinosis.  

- Knee tendinosis. 

-Tennis elbow. 

- Muscle strains. 

Here is some feedback from his recent patients:

- First I wanted to tell you my ankle and foot feel amazing. I have not felt this good in years. I clearly have a lot of soft tissue problems that you are working on. Wow. Amazing work - thank you. T.M. San Diego.

- I did some research and found Juan and after 3 sessions with him I was able to regain the range and motion I lost since my early twenties. The pain has also subsided and I am back on the court again thanks to Juan!! J.K. San Diego.

- I have finally seen the end of my problem. I don´t believe in miracles, so I don´t think this is a casual thing. These are the reasons why I believe Juan has come up with a solution. D.L. San Diego.

Introducing 

This is how far Juan could bring it. Now he needs and extra push so he can make Thimblex a household name in the fitness, athletic and sports medicine community.

Juan estimates he needs 5000 $ to do research, marketing and development. This is what he would use the funding for: 

  1. Research on how the Thimblex techniques can affect muscles, joints range of motion and- in general- recovery.  This is a really challenging point. It is difficult to prove that any method/therapy works. He already has the feedbacks of his clients. But he really wants to come up with something tangible, something that proves that it really works on the body. His idea is to buy two measuring devices he could use for the testing. 
  2. Marketing campaign and trade shows. He would use the funds to improve his web page and start a marketing campaign. He is planning to attend some trade show in fall 2015.
  3. Workshops and seminars. His plan is to start organizing workshops and seminars. He needs to buy a projector, treatment tables, diverse material and start advertising. 
To get you excited we have prepared a package of unique perks. They go from buying the Thimblex Kit at a discounted price, learning how to use them in workshops and seminars to receiving a treatment from Juan Reque. 
Even if you can't contribute much, a dollar goes a long way! Spread this campaign around to your friends, your coworkers, your classmates… Use the Indiegogo shear tools! Write reviews. We are sure you know somebody who would absolutely love this product. 
THANK YOU!
GRACIAS!
