story:
The World's First Wind Power Plant - Carousel

Greetings to people of whole world.

I live in Poland and im 24 years old, because of the lack of regular, good paid job I live thanks to casual jobs but the income is misery. Because I'm very poor and sometiemes do not have money for energy bills so every year after winter energy provider is cutting me power in my house. Untill i do not settle the bills, we are cut from the world, internet, messages, but the oven is not working and it's dark everywhere.

It is very stresfull, thats why my dream is to change it, so That no man in the world has to know that feeling. Therefore, and present you my Invention.

Pros and cons of today's wind power plants:

Advantages:

- Do not pollutes the environment,
- does not need fuel or water,
- uses inexhausible source of power That is wind
- wind energy is a renevable, it will never end, opposite to coal or gas
- It is clean energy. No harmfull gases are freed to the atmosphere,
- Wind is free so theres no risk of prices going up,

- Possibility of using small wind turbines and production of power in terrain where there is no current network.

Disadvantages:

- High cost of Investition in comparision with power gained, 
- inequality in deliviery of electric energy and high fluctuations in given time

- Wind can change. You can not predict exactly the power of wind,

- Wind farms use much space, uninhabitant areas are needed, far from cities,

- There are not equal conditions That build wind power plants in every place in the country. In many places wind is too weak,

- Big clusters of power turbins are dangerous for birds.

- Opponents of wind energy say That, turbins are source of noise. Indeed work in close neighborhood of windmill can be annoying but always wind farms are builded in reasonable distances from houses, so the noise is not harmfull for people.


    In That situation

    I want to open a company which will produce wind power plants in shape of carousel. That power station will not be dependent from any weather conditions dry as: wind, sun light or water, because power will be generated by wind That will be produced by itself That power station . That wind will always blow in the same direction, thats is - to the shoulders of electric turbines. It will not be like in nature, once from left, once from right and some times there's no wind at all or too weak / strong. In That case everything will be regulated by a computer.

    Mainly it will be produced for dry recipients like: Households, small companies, housing associations and also will be used in places with no power. Because of the big companies That hold energy for themselves and enforce thier prices to people its time to change it, energy should be very cheap for everyone. Time to change people drama because they do not have money to pay thier bills. Our priority right now as humanity should be free of energy and internet for everyone because everyone has right to free information and heat in the house.

    Please do not listen to Scholars, engineers, politicians, and biussnessmans That tell you its impossible because they have thier own Reasons That everything is so expensive.

    Its time to change it

    Everyone of us atleast once in life the wind felt on face while having fun on a carousel, just think, its so simple. Not using a dry an energy with today's technology is a sin.

    Together with my brother and father in builded a small model of this idea so That everyone can see how its supposed to work, keep in mind That this is from the cheapest materials and power turbines were not even used in it, because of costs. That's why we want to ask people from around the world for help.

    In current situation we dont have the funds to deploy the idea to life, gaining 250,000 euros but with your help will let us use the best technology and hopefull will cause production series That will help everyone. Big companies will be forced to lower energy prices.

    Supporting our Invention Will Contribute everyone.

    Very important advantage of our power generator Is That it doesnt need any permissions beause it dont have to be installed on ground Permanently, its moveable and it can stand in any place.

    For example power station That will give 10 kW will wigh around 300kg, and will take around 5 square meters of space.

    Area of ​​100 meters can have 20 of dry and power generators.

    I'd like to inform that i have a letter of application, the Patent Office.

    Drawnings with explanation:


    1- 10 KV electric turbine 
    frame 2- 
    3- electric motor with the propeller about 1,200 watts 
    4- direction of the rotors and a set to get 50 rpm 
    The turbine 10kV to give the 100% needed 50 rpm 
    then get 10kV minus 3X 1200 watt motors = 3.6 kV 
    10kV minus 3.6 = 6.4 kV earnings      

     
     
     


    Very Important !!

    Whole device of our Wind Power Plant - Carousel

    will have two additional elements needed for proper working but i can not revel them right now.

    They will be revealed later.

    At the same time, keep in mind That it's not Perpetuum Mobile.

    Rewards.

    Today, when we do not have anything, it's difficult to promise rewards.

    Regarding the possible rewards for people who will support my project is all these people will be covered by the discount rate being from 1% to 15% when purchasing the finished product.

    It will be possible when the company will operate and sell the product.

    Movie:

    Movie shows a model of device, you can see That if electric engine is working, it's powering the carousel and the remaining turbins are moving thanks to the power of just one electric engine. Please pay attention at the shots filmed in closed space where outside wind doens't blow wind only produced by small weak engine. I note that in current situation and do not have the funds that realize a good prototype so and show you what i have.

    Thank you very much for reading, Dominik Rodziewicz

Regarding the possible rewards for people who will support my project is all these people will be covered by the discount rate being from 1% to 15% when purchasing the finished product.
It will be possible when the company will operate and sell the product.

story:
What is ergonomics?  Ergonomics is the science that studies how to optimize the relationship between humans and their work environment.  For example:  Office workers with computers, outdoor workers with tools and equipment.  Our bodies have to interact with our work environments to carry out our daily work processes.

 

It's almost close to impossible to keep good posture while working everyday and we all can agree to that. 

 

In order to be the most efficient and productive there has to be some way to improve our productivity as humans with any equipment!

 

Be a part of the new wave of the future!

 

So now we have the totally new and innovative, world's best, and most comfortable lower back and upper body support garments you will ever wear to be most productive without suffering from pain while working everyday. Our patented design Ergonomic Vests work great!  Just try ONE and you will love it!  It's new and hot!  So flexible its even fun to wear!

Back braces and most support devices on the market can be a bit challenging to wear and use!  Our vests aren't!

 

(Save money on chiropractors, doctor visits, medications, especially insurance payouts for employers).

 

We are a new startup company with only very limited resources.  We started our company based on the idea that we could possibly come up with a solution to help people who suffer from back pain and upper body pain while working everyday.  Its an important project to us.  Our goal is to help people improve their work environment ergonomically which will in turn help improve their health and fitness to be more productive at work and live better and healthier lives without aching pain (s).

 

We have done studies/interviews about health and fitness with people who work in office environments, people who drive trucks, factory workers and outdoor workers as well.  What we found is that working at a computer everyday, driving,  working in factories, and construction/outdoor workers in their everyday work activities, bending over, twisting and turning the upper body in a work day, they complained about pain mostly in the lower back.  However, they also complained about chronic pain that occurred in other areas of the upper body. 

Good posture while working everyday, ergonomically?

 

What we have done is after testing 5 prototypes and making improvements from the 1st prototype  and making more improvements  from the 2nd prototype to the 5th, we have come up with a solution to solve those problems.  As you can see in the demonstration photos below our ergonomic sleeveless and short sleeve vests covers different areas  of the upper body and FITS SO PERFECTLY for compression to those areas.   And no pressure on the abdomen, unlike most support devices.  (No More Bulky, Uncomfortable Back Braces and Other Support Devices).  Our designs are patented and they work great!

This is an example of the areas our vests alleviate pain from the upper anatomy.  Back pain occurs when the spine and muscles fail to work correctly and fall out of alignment.

Our ergonomic vests provide support for lower back pain relief and the other upper body areas to provide proper blood circulation in the areas our vests covers as seen above with our Sleeveless and Short Sleeve (the upper arms) vests. 

Features

One piece, chest and waist attachments, attachments are adjustable for compression, compression alleviates pain in areas vest covers, provides support to compensate for bad posture, abdominal area not covered/NO PRESSURE TO ABDOMEN.  Most comfortable support device you will ever wear.  New innovative design

 

They are flexible and adjustable with the chest and waist attachments (be creative).  They can be used to support the lower back only or upper body only if you choose to, just  to say how flexible they are.

(Our vests are very comfortable to wear), and the abdominal area isn't covered so there is no discomfort to that area while wearing and (especially while sitting).   They are much more comfortable than wearing bulky, uncomfortable back braces and other support devices.    The vest can be worn at work or at home (you can even sleep in them).  We want to help people live a better and healthier lifestyle! 

 

How the posture corrector ergonomic vests works:

 

Tthe vest has hook and loop attachments in chest area and waist has velcro attachment, attachments are adjustable for compression, vest doesn't have to be too tight to work if you prefer. You can use upper or lower attachments at anytime if u choose to. Vest provides compression to prevents or alleviates pain in areas vest covers, provides support to compensate for bad posture, abdominal area not covered/NO PRESSURE TO ABDOMEN unlike most support devices on the market. To be worn underneath clothing.

 

The workers involved in our study who tested our vests knows that they work great!  Now we want to bring our vests to market to share with the whole world!

Our goal is to provide the 100's of millions of people who suffer from lower back pain or chronic pain around the world with our vests  and not only for people working but anyone who can benefit from wearing our vests, including athletes, hospital patients, anyone who suffer from pain in the areas our vests cover!

What is ergonomics?  Ergonomics is the science that studies how to optimize the relationship between humans and their work environment.  For example:  Office workers with computers, outdoor workers with tools and equipment.  Our bodies have to interact with our work environments to carry out our daily work processes.
 
It's almost close to impossible to keep good posture while working everyday and we all can agree to that. 
 
In order to be the most efficient and productive there has to be some way to improve our productivity as humans with any equipment!
 
Be a part of the new wave of the future!
 
So now we have the totally new and innovative, world's best, and most comfortable lower back and upper body support garments you will ever wear to be most productive without suffering from pain while working everyday. Our patented design Ergonomic Vests work great!  Just try ONE and you will love it!  It's new and hot!  So flexible its even fun to wear!
Back braces and most support devices on the market can be a bit challenging to wear and use!  Our vests aren't!
 
(Save money on chiropractors, doctor visits, medications, especially insurance payouts for employers).
 
We are a new startup company with only very limited resources.  We started our company based on the idea that we could possibly come up with a solution to help people who suffer from back pain and upper body pain while working everyday.  Its an important project to us.  Our goal is to help people improve their work environment ergonomically which will in turn help improve their health and fitness to be more productive at work and live better and healthier lives without aching pain (s).
 
We have done studies/interviews about health and fitness with people who work in office environments, people who drive trucks, factory workers and outdoor workers as well.  What we found is that working at a computer everyday, driving,  working in factories, and construction/outdoor workers in their everyday work activities, bending over, twisting and turning the upper body in a work day, they complained about pain mostly in the lower back.  However, they also complained about chronic pain that occurred in other areas of the upper body. 
Good posture while working everyday, ergonomically?
 
What we have done is after testing 5 prototypes and making improvements from the 1st prototype  and making more improvements  from the 2nd prototype to the 5th, we have come up with a solution to solve those problems.  As you can see in the demonstration photos below our ergonomic sleeveless and short sleeve vests covers different areas  of the upper body and FITS SO PERFECTLY for compression to those areas.   And no pressure on the abdomen, unlike most support devices.  (No More Bulky, Uncomfortable Back Braces and Other Support Devices).  Our designs are patented and they work great!


This is an example of the areas our vests alleviate pain from the upper anatomy.  Back pain occurs when the spine and muscles fail to work correctly and fall out of alignment.

Our ergonomic vests provide support for lower back pain relief and the other upper body areas to provide proper blood circulation in the areas our vests covers as seen above with our Sleeveless and Short Sleeve (the upper arms) vests. 
Features
One piece, chest and waist attachments, attachments are adjustable for compression, compression alleviates pain in areas vest covers, provides support to compensate for bad posture, abdominal area not covered/NO PRESSURE TO ABDOMEN.  Most comfortable support device you will ever wear.  New innovative design
 
They are flexible and adjustable with the chest and waist attachments (be creative).  They can be used to support the lower back only or upper body only if you choose to, just  to say how flexible they are.
(Our vests are very comfortable to wear), and the abdominal area isn't covered so there is no discomfort to that area while wearing and (especially while sitting).   They are much more comfortable than wearing bulky, uncomfortable back braces and other support devices.    The vest can be worn at work or at home (you can even sleep in them).  We want to help people live a better and healthier lifestyle! 
 
How the posture corrector ergonomic vests works:
 
Tthe vest has hook and loop attachments in chest area and waist has velcro attachment, attachments are adjustable for compression, vest doesn't have to be too tight to work if you prefer. You can use upper or lower attachments at anytime if u choose to. Vest provides compression to prevents or alleviates pain in areas vest covers, provides support to compensate for bad posture, abdominal area not covered/NO PRESSURE TO ABDOMEN unlike most support devices on the market. To be worn underneath clothing.

 
The workers involved in our study who tested our vests knows that they work great!  Now we want to bring our vests to market to share with the whole world!
Our goal is to provide the 100's of millions of people who suffer from lower back pain or chronic pain around the world with our vests  and not only for people working but anyone who can benefit from wearing our vests, including athletes, hospital patients, anyone who suffer from pain in the areas our vests cover!

story:
On behalf of Rally4Hunger, a non-profit and charitable organization, We are honored and blessed to have the opportunity to return to Sony Sugar Complex and team up with the organization True Happiness is Giving. The mission of R4H is to create a fun tennis competition for our youth to tally total rally points to convert into food to reach out to help the community food needs. We are excited to give the children a tennis experience that will enable them to give back to their community.

The director of THIG, Roselyn Opel, has established an organization that is run by women volunteers seeking to help the less fortunate by involving and empowering boys/girls through sports. True Happiness is Giving has offered to help volunteer to assist during the tennis event as well has help with delivering the food to the necessary locations after the event.


From a recent Press Release, Roselyn Opel, the director of THIG, states “So you Begin…I began…Just Begin…One, One, One.” After teaching tennis to the children at Sony Sugar complex in June of 2015, Stacey Smith was invited back to organize a Rally4Hunger event with the players at Sony Sugar Complex.  Says Peter Awino, headmaster at Sony Sugar Complex School,“We welcome Rally4Hunger at Sony under our guidance because I have a lot of confidence in her and her tennis program.

This past May/June we teamed up with Tennis4Africa under the direction of Steve Verkouter.  We delivered over 300 racquets, 300 balls, and 11 racquets to 12 different schools;in addition to having four Rally4Hunger events at select schools in the Nairobi slums as well as in Migori County. We raised over 1000 lbs. and delivered all of the food directly back to the students participating in the event. Rally4Hunger is open to giving back to the participants from Sony Sugar Complex but would also love to help deliver food packages to the nearby communities.

Our projected goal for this event is 2000 lbs. of food. We hope to raise most of the funds through this site.  We also welcome credit card processing or electronic wiring means to Business First Bank for those donors who would prefer that method. Email Rally4Hunger@gmail.com to contact the Director, Stacey Smith for these options.  We plan to have approximately 150- 200 participants (75-100 teams). After the first round of fifteen minutes, the total points will be added up to see if we are close to reaching our goal of 20 balls rallied in a row per team. We will welcome a second round if necessary to reach the Rally Goal. Rally4Hunger will be converting the points into food items that will be donated to Migori County after the event. With the Rally4Hunger donations given from the worldwide supporters, we hope to be able help provide over 1500 meals. Our CROWDING-FUNDING GOAL is $3000 in food donations for this event and we need your support.

Lastly and most importantly, we truly appreciate the generosity and support of Sony Sugar Complex during our last visit with Tennis4Africa's founder and Director, Steve Verkouter from Belgium. We would not have had this opportunity to continue the tour without Sony's willingness to assist with accommodations and meals during our stay. Thank you Peter Awino, Headmaster of Sony Sugar, for believing in us. We are Blessed to again have the open invitation to stay at Sony during the Rally4Hunger NOVEMBER 18th -22nd and to be able to continue to provide this community outreach opportunity for the children though tennis. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Sincerely,

Stacey Troy Smith

Director and Founder

Rally4Hunger; rally4hunger@gmail.com


President of Tennis4Africa;

staceytennis4africa@gmail.com

story:
Friends Don’t Let Friends Breathe Oil Fumes on Aircraft: GIVE TEN, GET TEN

Calling everyone who flies: join our GIVE TEN, GET TEN campaign to make air travel healthier. GIVE $10 (or 10 of any currency) to a university research team to develop a blood test for airline crews and passengers (read on...). GET 10 of your Facebook friends (or any friends, or even people you don't like!) to do the same... 

Ever smelled dirty socks during an airline flight? A dirty socks smell coming from the aircraft air supply vents is likely to be engine oil fumes in the ventilation air. You read that right: the air that comes through the cabin and flight deck vents is first compressed in the engines, and it isn’t filtered before you breathe it. Many crew unions around the world receive regular reports from members who report dirty socks or musty fumes in the cabin supply air, followed by problems with memory, balance, and speech, for example. Nobody thinks it will happen to them, until it does.

Every day, just in the US alone, there is an official report of toxic oil fumes contaminating the air you breathe on regular commercial flights.  Let alone the many more reports documented around the globe. Aviation engine oils contain neurotoxic additives, so breathing the fumes can cause lasting damage to your brain. Also, flight safety can be compromised when crews are impaired inflight. You will meet some affected crewmembers in our video.  

As things stand, few people  can  access the aircraft maintenance records to PROVE that oil contaminated the cabin air. And there is no blood test specific to these fumes, so airlines often say that “nothing was wrong” and that crews and passengers are just imagining their disabling symptoms. Fortunately, a dedicated research team at the University of Washington is developing a blood test specific to the aviation engine oil. You can help by donating to this campaign. 

If you breathed oil fumes on YOUR flight today, how would you prove it? If you’re a crewmember, would the airline doctor listen and support you, or pressure to you to return to work sick? Would your doctor tell you that you’re over 50 now, so maybe that explains your memory problems? Can you afford to not work and not get paid for a while? These are the stories that previously-healthy crewmembers share, and passengers breathe the same air...

Everyone who flies needs this blood test, so we all need to GIVE 10 of any currency and GET 10 friends to do the same. If you are exposed to oil fumes onboard, then you need to be able to prove it, and all of us need the industry to feel more motivated to clean up the cabin air.


A single person’s TEN DOLLARS won’t fund anything, but our GOAL is to bring ENOUGH people onboard that ENOUGH ten dollar donations are received, that the research will be a success, for the good of crews everywhere. So please, GIVE TEN, GET TEN, and encourage your flying partners, family, friends, people you don’t even like, your dog, your barista, the guy who fixes your car, anyone and everyone, to do the same… 

Don’t leave the page until you have given $10 and sent the link to ten people!  The GIVE TEN, GET TEN! campaign is overseen by Clean Up Cabin Air, run by volunteer flight attendants and their supporters. You can make an anonymous donation, or you can put your name to it - either way works.

Join us. Change the way the industry handles the air you breathe on regular commercial flights. Donate now! Currently, 95% of your donation goes directly to the researchers, and 5% to Indiegogo, per their rules. We are in the final stages of securing non-profit status so that contributions (made in the US, at least) will be tax-deductible. EVERY dollar, euro, pound, peso and yen, every bit – however small - helps. Larger contributions are also encouraged! :) Go ahead, watch our video and add your voice to the people who want clean cabin air now. And thank you.

More information:

1)  60 Minutes Australia video – oil fumes story aired in 2013. Many more videos posted here.

2)  Practical advice if you breathe oil fumes on aircraft: Cabin crew union offers practical advice for you and your doctor if you breathe oil fumes onboard.

3)  Additional information on the research project: Status of current research and proposed work, CVs of research team members, in addition to an abbreviated less-technical overview

4)  Global Cabin Air Quality Executive: Global coalition of airline worker unions dedicated to networking, education, and research. If your union is not yet a member, sign up!

5)  Aerotoxic.org: Non-profit organization dedicated to raising awareness about the health and safety impact of breathing oil fumes on aircraft, supporting those affected, and pushing for change. Website includes an impressive list of relevant media articles and videos.

story:
My name is Ben Brooks and my dad is a professional golfer and was diagnosed with cancer early last year, and ever since then he has been loosing weight as a fast rate.

Seeing that's happen was horrible when I felt like there was nothing I could do, until I had the idea of making a weight gain drink for him to regain the weight he has lost.

Ever since then I have been working endlessly to make it the perfect mix to fit the strict diet he has and it tastes nice.

I have now complete the mixture and am now in need of funding to take my idea any further to enable me to be able to help suffering from the condition.  I have also been currently work with the NowFood centre at Chester university to do my nutritional values and product development.

I am looking for funding over £15,000

This will enable me too get

Packaging designed


Food hygiene license


location

ingredients


mixers


storage


packaging


heat sealer


Our product is all natural and contains no artificial colors or flavors. As well as being high in protein and carbohydrates and contains low amounts of sugar.

If I don't reach my full goal for funding I will use the money to get packaging designed, make and the ingredient purchased.
My product will enable people to regain and maintain the weight and muscle tone they have lost from having cancer. To be able to help the people who need most would be the greatest thing we could ever do, as the only other product is full of additives and sugar which is not people need.

Their are millions of people who could use this product right now and it would give them a better standard of life and feel better.

The biggest issue with the product is:

Trading standards-

 This is the biggest problem as anything I claim on my packaging you have to prove.

 So showing them that my product actually helps people gain weight is hard but, my dad is going to be the case study for the company as he has been using the product since the mix was made.

 The hospital weighs him every time he goes so it is on record that he is now gaining weight day.

Please Share this as any help at all would be amazing as all I want to do is help the people who need it the most.

story:
Mine is the story of following a dream. It’s a story of stretching the boundaries, and of re-writing the rules. My name is Larry Sidney, and I am an Israeli National Team athlete in both skeleton and curling.


My goals in the sport of skeleton are two-fold. First, I want to prove that age cannot place limits on us. I am 43 years old, and with much hard work and dedication, qualifying for the World Championships this year is possible. Last season I placed 7th in the U.S. Western Regionals race, ahead of men in their 20s. Dreams don’t end with childhood unless we let them.

My second goal is more complex. It’s about the Israeli people and the Jews, living in harmony with the rest of the world. It’s about having the respect of the people of other countries and other religions. As an Israeli National Team athlete, I take seriously the role of ambassador to the world. I hope to use the opportunity to compete for Israel internationally as a means to building positive relationships. With tensions simmering in the Middle East and anti-Semitism in Europe, we must take the initiative in reaching out as friends.

I will be competing in skeleton races throughout Europe and North America this season. If I can place in the top 60 this year it will qualify Israel for a spot in the World Championships this year, as well as a spot in the World Cup next year. Athletes in the next Olympic Games will ultimately be chosen from the World Cup. The season will cost me over $40,000, so I am looking for your help. Let us dream together!

All donations go directly to Bobsled Skeleton Israel (BSI), a 501c(3) registered non-profit in the US, the official Sports Federation representing Israeli Skeleton and Bobsled athletes for over 10 years. David Greaves is the President of BSI and a founding member of the Israeli Bobsled Team. For more information about BSI please contact Tamar Simon, CMO, at tamar.simon@gmail.com or 917-670-6824.

As an Israeli National Team athlete, I take seriously the role of ambassador to the world. I hope to use the opportunity to compete for Israel internationally as a means to building positive relationships. With tensions simmering in the Middle East and anti-Semitism in Europe, we must take the initiative in reaching out as friends.I will be competing in skeleton races throughout Europe and North America this season. If I can place in the top 60 this year it will qualify Israel for a spot in the World Championships this year, as well as a spot in the World Cup next year. Athletes in the next Olympic Games will ultimately be chosen from the World Cup. The season will cost me over $40,000, so I am looking for your help. Let us dream together!All donations go directly to Bobsled Skeleton Israel (BSI), a 501c(3) registered non-profit in the US, the official Sports Federation representing Israeli Skeleton and Bobsled athletes for over 10 years. David Greaves is the President of BSI and a founding member of the Israeli Bobsled Team. For more information about BSI please contact Tamar Simon, CMO, at tamar.simon@gmail.com or 917-670-6824.
campaign_city: Zephyr Cove-Round Hill Village, United States

story:
My name is Paige Zeigler and I'm traveling to Tanzania on July 31st as an ambassador for the non-profit E.P.I.C. (Everyday People Initiating Change) with co-founders Alexi Panos and Tennille Amor, and Love Mob co-founder Preston Smiles. 

I want to make the biggest impact possible in the lives of the people I meet while I'm in Tanzania while I'm there. Will you join me?

It costs just over $15k to build a clean water well and make sure it will be sustainable for the next 20-30 years. I've committed to cover $3k of the well I will help put into action ON MY TRIP. But together, we can double the impact! I'm going to match everything I raise from you - my friends and family! - in this campaign up to another $3k, so we can have twice the impact in changing lives through clean water accessible through sustainable wells in these Tanzania communities.

As a token of my appreciation, anyone who helps support E.P.I.C. in this campaign with a $40 donation will receive a limited edition t-shirt (CLICK THE "GALLERY" TAB ABOVE to see it) the team over at Hello Yellow helped me design, along with print copies of the CREATIV Magazine issues featuring Alexi Panos and Preston Smiles, so we can remember and creatively commemorate this year's clean water project together.

All money donated is going to EPIC! How? Team CREATIV (Blake, Brad, Alex, Ana, Emily, & Jessica!) is generously supporting me in my time away during my African adventure and is also donating the magazines, and another company has donated the t-shirts that I get to share with all of you.

When I return from Africa, I'll be in touch with each of you to get your requested t-shirt size (ladies & mens adult, & kids sizes available in white and navy) and mailing address. I'm also taking my GoPro with me so I can share pictures and video with all of you when I return!

Please donate & share! I appreciate you.
#iamacreativ #livebigbeepic #lovesvoice

To learn more about E.P.I.C. or CREATIV:
E.P.I.C. - http://www.epicthemovement.org/
CREATIV - http://www.creativ.com, or http://shop.creativ.com

story:
Ghost Security is an internationally based nonprofit counter terrorism organization that specializes in combating terrorism on the digital front lines of today utilizing the internet and social media as a weapon for change. Our operations consist of collecting real time threat intelligence, reporting of potential terror attacks against governments and citizens, slowing the online recruitment of terrorist groups and silencing the spread of propaganda and hate.

To date our operations have met with resounding success. We have terminated over 75,000 Islamic State social media accounts that were used for recruitment purposes and transmission of threats against life and property. Our team has also detected numerous dangerous terror plots and responded accordingly. Additionally we have located and shut down over 100 Islamic State websites that were used heavily to circulate propaganda and plan attacks against civilized nations but with the help of people just like you we can achieve so much more.

Our small dedicated nonprofit team works 16 hours a day, 7 days a week in order to protect the lives of innocent people who have been displaced from their homes, persecuted for their religious beliefs and brutally murdered for exercising the right to free speech. In order to continue and expand our fight for the people we are in need of funding for additional computers, servers and monthly maintenance costs.

We believe in the people and their right to freedom without fear of judgment or persecution and we ask that you believe in us. Together with your help we can save the lives of many and impact profound change. Support us and together we can change the world.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Josiah James. I am a certified personal trainer and a former professional athlete. Basketball was my passion my entire life, but all good things must come to an end. I started LifeStyle Health & Fitness to reach people who may be intimidated by the gym but wanted to get healthy. I use my experience as a trainer and athlete to develop enjoyable training regimens that are accessible for every age and skill level. To date, I have helped my clients reach a broad range of  goals, including weight loss, toning, and rehabilitation. I often use the group coaching format to develop a community of supportive people that will hold one another accountable. From there, I have branched out to individual training and meal planning to move my clients closer to their goals.

What We Need & What You Get

I am currently seeking about $50,000 to grow my business. I need to purchase a used company van, well needed fitness equipment and have enough capital to possibly get my own studio space.  The underlying magic with LifeStyle Fitness is its convenience. I drive to meet my clients at a local park or a gym, which has worn my personal vehicle . In addition, I would like to rent a small studio space to invite my clients for group classes which have been a cornerstone for my business. A bulk of the funding would help in covering these overhead cost during the first year.

As I mentioned, my best quality is my willingness and ability to go to our clients. Anytime of day, if a client wants to have a session we meet at a location that is convenient to the client. We charge each client $25 per one on one session. We also offer small group classes. I encourage people to put small groups of friends, family or coworkers together and workout together for that extra motivation that we all need sometimes. Groups of less than 5 people are charged $15 each. Five or more pay only $10 each.

Having a studio or a home for my business will not only generate more income but will also act as a marketing tool. People are nosy. Capitalizing on curious motorists or passersby will help grow my business at a faster pace. 

The Impact

My ultimate goal is help touch and change people lives through exercise and promoting healthy eating habits. It is no secret that regular exercising along with eating healthy will impact life expectancy and physical appearance which also  impacts confidence and promotes positive body image. Group classes are highly encouraged to help with team building and camaraderie. The most gratifying part of my job is when a client tells me how much weight they have lost, how good they feel, or how much more energy they have after a recent session with me.

Here's a portion of a recent email from one of my clients: "Thank you for the great work out today. I wanted to tell you this but I don't like to talk about weight because I've always been overweight most of my life and it bothers me.  I have always been the biggest one in the group so this has not only boosted my esteem and confidence but I'm feeling healthier and have more energy. 
Back in October/November when started this fitness class I was 220. Then when we started the meal plan and exercising the way we are, I'm currently 195. Inches wise I measured myself on January 18th and was 44" today I'm 42". 

This is what makes what I do so gratifying and enjoyable.

Risks & Challenges

My motto has always been: "I hate losing more than I like winning". However, we all lose sometimes. With my passion and hard work I know that I can accomplish my goals. One client at a time, one session at a time. 

I live in Miami where fitness is a huge competitive business. I feel that there are two things that sets me apart from my competition. First, I am a people person. I spent 10 years In Europe playing basketball where I worked with people from all different backgrounds. This is definitely an asset in growing my business. Second, I am not in this business to get rich quick or make a few bucks. I genuinely and truly want to help change people's lives through fitness and nutrition.

Other Ways You Can Help

I want to thank you for any contributions that you can make towards my new business venture. If you cannot afford to contribute financially please tell your friends and family and even spread the word at your place of employment about LifeStyle Health & Fitness. I offer a class every Friday evening at 7pm at the Little Haiti cultural complex. It's open to the public at just $10. Feel free to email me at lifestylehealthfit@gmail.com and visit and like our page on Facebook and Instagram.

story:
1. Fall detection / 2. Heart rate / 3. Body temperature / 4. Inactivity detection /      5. Sleep analysis / 6. Incoming call warning sign / 7. Level of criticality of events / 8. Time and date / 9. Smart alarm clock / 10. Microphone / 11. Speaker /                 12. Medical service / 13. Wireless connection / 14. GPS / 15. Attendance 24 hours per day and 7 days per week / 16. Bluetooth / 17. Medicine control / 18. Galvanic Skin Response / 19. Customization / 20. Pedometer / 21. Compatibility with Android, IPhone and Windows phone.

About Argus

Argus is a concept designed to solve the issue of monitoring the elderly at distance. A smartband associated to a service of emergency call would allow the monitoring of vital signs of the elder, as heart rate and body temperature and it will help with automatic detection of falls. Other daily activities will also be monitored, as sleep activity and medicines use.

The system will allow relatives and friends close to the elder monitor him in real time through the band positioned in his arm and track his state of health through a profile that could be accessed by an app and website in mobile devices, as cellphones, tablets, computers and etc. Thus they can identify the occurrence of any critical situation that can be detected and attended by the emergency call center. The attendant could access the elder profile immediately and assess the situation in order to speed up the help sending and medical attendance.

Goal of Campaign

The old age is one of the most fragile stage of human life, it's at this stage that the person need more support and attention but with the lack of availability, the biggest barrier is the way people monitor elderly relatives. So, the primary objective is create a product that can provide security and peace of mind to seniors and their families and at the same time can promote the approximation in an interactive, dynamic and reliable way.

The objective of this fund raising is build a prototype in order to look for investors interested in implement and commercialize the product. The amount of money will be used to pay a team of developers for the app and physical prototype.  

Argus is a very preliminar concept that needs to be improved in order to be industrialized and commercialized. The campaign is totally based on your confidence that this idea is promising and can be successful. Any contributor will be seen as an investor and will be encouraging this initiative.

Keep following Argus, soon I will be posting more news.

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Tadzoka and I love healthy, sustainable and environmentally friendly products which give back to the community. Feel good, do good! I am a proponent of local value addition and conscious capitalism. When it comes to food and drink, I am a firm believer in probiotics/active cultures beneficial to our health.

  • Introducing "booch" to Zim Market
  •  I started making my own probiotic foods when I kept on falling ill after antibiotic courses. After spending thousands of dollars on probiotic pills from outside the country, whenever I managed to get them, I realized that I had to take matters into my own hands and make my own cultured products because my go-to pills were not locally available in Zimbabwe.


  • I have loved Kombucha tea for a really long time , but it has not yet been commercialized in Zimbabwe which would benefit greatly from it's properties as well as the business opportunity, however, to  be safe and effective it needs to be produced to international standards.


  • I was gifted a live culture (also known as a scoby "symbiotic colony of bacteria and yeast") last year when I expressed my love for the tea at an Art of Hosting Training. Now, from that gift of life (literally) I have a colony of live cultures and have introduced the tea to friends and family who come and collect my home-made every week. The batches I make are not enough to fulfill the demand, we could do so much more with your help.


  • We would like to scale up production of this health promoting, refreshing drink in a small scale factory with basic bottling equipment, pH testers, heating belts, stainless steel and glass containers. I believe this tea can help so many people as it did me.


  • The local market is untapped and the time right. In these difficult economic times local industry has declined.  Small community-conscious and health promoting businesses which add value to our natural resources are the way to boost Zimbabwe and provide jobs. The kombucha factory (my kitchen)  at the moment employs 2 women, the scale-up will allow me to employ more women from marginalised communities for production.


  •  We make it a point to fuse the teas with traditional indigenous flavors such as baobab, zumbani and moringa which are packed with micro-nutrients. Batch by batch we can change the country's pro-biotic gut health and economy. Please join us.


What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $18 000 to purchase equipment,  pay for council testing and approvals, rent out factory space and hire more people.

  • List of equipment needed:
    5 Brewing vessels
    3 pH testers
    5 stainless steel/glass containers
    3 glass samplers
    1 sugar testing kit/hydrometer
    1 large scale juicer to juice our fruit
    5 bottling siphons
    1 bottle capper to effectively seal bottles tight for selling.
    1 small green house for fresh organic ingredients
  • If I do not reach my entire goal I will use the funds I have to scale at a slower rate and continue with the batch method until i have enough for the small factory.

The Impact


A healthier society, and richer entrepreneurial ecosystem starts with us.

Kombucha is a cost effective health aid, an employment provider encouraging sustainability of local produce from smallholder farmers and a local industry boost! To top it all off, it's delicious!

Kombucha provides effective probiotics at an affordable cost. Antibiotics are over subscribed in our community, but even in cases where they are needed, they can leave the patient's probiotic count low. Gut health is underestimated, and this is an affordable, local alternative to ordering pills online. This is also a healthier alternative to soda.

To flavor our Kombucha we use organic ingredients that are homegrown in our herb garden and produce from our small scale organic farmers whom we support. Our operations provide employment to the community and help to boost our local economy.

In addition, each bottle sold 5% of our profits go to Kutsunga Trust to fund school fees for orphans in Zimbabwe.

Risks & Challenges

Our Kombucha is a raw and unpasteurized product that has a short shelf life.

Our main challenge is that unpasteurized products have a higher risk of going bad, making it harder to maintain the correct temperature and maintaining freshness for our Kombucha. Because Kombucha is sensitive to temperature, the higher the temperature is, the faster the fermentation process will be and of course the lower the temperature is, the slower the fermentation time. It becomes a challenge when the seasons change and the fermenting stage becomes slower, slowing down production. Part of the money raised will be used to purchase heaters and coolers to solve this challenge of seasonal changes.

Another challenge is sourcing high quality  water used to boil the tea. The type of water used determines the consistency of the liquid. That is why it is important to use filtered water rather than the city water that may carry chemicals or contaminants that could affect the brewing. To ensure water is correctly purified, we would like to purchase a small water filtering /purification machine.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our campaign with your community so we can get going.
    Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

Cheers and thank you for your support!

story:
Vitcci Does Not Only Detect The Air Pollution...

 it CLEANS IT !



Vitcci at Home


 

Take Vitcci with you wherever you go



The first Portable Purifier with 4in1 functionality

        Clean it before you breathe it !



Say Goodbye to Allergens, Bacteria, Dust, Pollen, Animals Particles, causing sneezing, chest tightness, stress, fatigue, Asthma and more...




      Add Some Colors to Your Life !



Our Vision

Vitcci focuses on creating smart products using latest technologies to make our lives easier, happier and healthier. We started with the Vitcci Air Purifier and the rest is yet to come. This is just the beginning of a new brand, new evolution!

We strive to make smart devices even smarter!  With intensive research and futuristic vision.

With this new air purifier, we thought about coming up with something different than most nowadays consuming products. As consumers we tend to look for all sorts of products and forget the most important ones that are essential to our well-being. As we know, the air we breathe is one of three elements that go into our body along with foods and drinks, but somehow we neglect and never check whether it is clean or not.  Instead, we take it in as it is wherever we are. With Vitcci purifier, our goal is to maintain a cleaner air around us for a healthier and happier mind and body.

In every step we take, we make sure to come up with ideas that could be implemented in projects and devices that make our environment better, and use our technologies to keep it green!

We are located in Santa Barbara, California and our headquarters office is in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.



Product Specifications

  • Voltage:                          DC~5V
  • Power:                             4W
  • Product Size:                169*86*55 mm
  • Packaging Size:           210*155*55 mm
  • Net Weight:                   195 g
  • Gross Weight:              358 g
  • Maximum Airflow:      6.5 m3/s
  • Anion Concentration: 4,000,000 / m3 
  • UV Lamp:                       Made in Japan
  • Package includes:  Main unit (1), USB cable (1), Car Adapter (1), Skid Pad  (1),
                                              Aroma (1 bottle 5ml)


Product Features

  • Photocatalysis, Ultraviolet Lamp, Anion release
  • Two types of wind speed
  • The concentration reaches 4Million anion per m3
  • High efficient sterilization, degrade harmful elements
  • Designed with aroma box
  • Compact design for portable use AND high efficiency
  • Eliminate airborne allergens, bacteria, viruses, smoke, mold dust
  • Destroys chemical & Biological contaminants in air and surrounding
  • Benefits are but not limited to stress relief, intake more oxygen
  • Prevents sneezing, coughing, chest tightness.
  • Asthma relief
  • Boost of day time energy

New Prototype Printing & Testing. Everything is going as planned !
story_txt:
Vitcci Does Not Only Detect The Air Pollution...
 it CLEANS IT !Vitcci at Home  Take Vitcci with you wherever you go
The first Portable Purifier with 4in1 functionality        Clean it before you breathe it !
Say Goodbye to Allergens, Bacteria, Dust, Pollen, Animals
Particles, causing sneezing, chest tightness, stress, fatigue, Asthma and
more...

      Add Some Colors to Your Life !

Our Vision
Vitcci focuses on creating smart products using latest
technologies to make our lives easier, happier and healthier. We started with
the Vitcci Air Purifier and the rest is yet to come. This is just the beginning
of a new brand, new evolution!
We strive to make smart devices even smarter!  With intensive research and futuristic
vision. 
With this new air purifier, we thought about coming up with
something different than most nowadays consuming products. As consumers we tend
to look for all sorts of products and forget the most important ones that are
essential to our well-being. As we know, the air we breathe is one of three
elements that go into our body along with foods and drinks, but somehow we
neglect and never check whether it is clean or not.  Instead, we take it in as it is wherever we
are. With Vitcci purifier, our goal is to maintain a cleaner air around us for
a healthier and happier mind and body.
In every step we take, we make sure to come up with ideas
that could be implemented in projects and devices that make our environment
better, and use our technologies to keep it green! 
We are located in Santa Barbara, California and our
headquarters office is in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.Product Specifications

story:
SOL-ONE is a multi-purpose smart indoor equipment. SOL-ONE is not just an air cleaner, it is the world’s first Smart Air Care device with 5 functions in 1 beautiful body.

One of the most neglected threats to human health is indoor air pollution. In large cities we experience a continuous increase in outdoor air pollution, and we tend to believe that there are deﬁnitely no toxins in our indoor air. Clean air in our homes and ofﬁces is vital for us and our family and colleagues. However, furniture, household and ofﬁce equipment and everyday activities may emit invisible harmful pollutions in our indoor environment.

Most indoor air puriﬁers don’t ﬁt into any interior, where they are normally used. Their functional appearance simply kills your home’s or ofﬁce’s colors and ﬁne touch, and you have to press old-fashioned switches and buttons to control them. 


We have developed SOL-ONE that is made of premium quality materials, designed to be nice, efﬁcient and controllable with your smartphone.




  • PURIFIES YOUR AIR

Operating silently with advanced filter and low operational costs.

Keeping an indoor environment healthy is one of the primary goals of SOL-ONE and to keep it and its environment pathogen-free there's a built-in air filtering system that doesn't need to be replaced anytime. SOL-ONE uses wet textile layer to filter particles in the air


  • IONIZES YOUR AIR

By emitting 20 millions of negative ions / cubic centimeters makes your air 99% bacteria-free.
 Ionizers produce electrically charged particles that clears volatile chemical compounds (VOCs) out of the air, though not completely eliminating them, instead “sticking” them to other surfaces, like walls and furniture. Proper air ionization has good effects on the respiratory system which leads to an overall better human health.


  • SCENTS YOUR AIR

Offering you a wide variety of interchangeable scents.
Although humans have a relatively damp sense of smelling compared to certain animals, yet some of the most important human feelings are connected to the olfactory sense. There are various beneficial effects to use scenting in SOL-ONE. Just imagine the smell of coffee or the smell of fresh flowers!

  • LIGHTS YOUR MOOD

Giving you the option to harmonize the mood lighting color from 8000 tones.

Light therapy is one of today's most recognized alternative healing methods. Different kind of color tones provide a different boosting experience for different desired mental states. Whenever you feel agitated or stressed use a teal color or should you like to make your atmosphere a bit more romantic try magenta!


  • SMARTPHONE CONTROLLED

With freely downloadable iOS or Android apps. 

Thanks to the SOL remote mobile app, you may change your air purification preferences anytime from your smartphone via Bluetooth. Smart features, such as scheduling and environment-aware operation make SOL-ONE a powerful air purification and scenting system.


The SOL Remote app is already available on App store (v1.6) and Google Play (v1.13), but we plan to upgrade the application in the near-future for a better and smarter experience.



While it is not public knowledge, most people spend 90% of their lifespan indoors. Another less known fact is that indoor air pollution is one of the top five most dangerous health risks known to human beings. Indoor environments are usually 5-10 times more polluted, than outdoor air, even in moderately polluted cities. Indoor air pollution may come from viral, antibacterial, fungal sources, but synthetic materials (i.e. wall paints, furniture, carpet, plastic, heating and electronic appliances etc.) emit dangerous substances as well. 
In contrast to these daunting facts the importance of proper air purification is only just getting more highlighted in households, offices and all other premises where daily routines take place. A detailed list of all significant air filters already exists on EPA’s website.

A properly air managed room has dozens of positive health effects. Some of these effects are attributed to negative ions, but clean air breathed through pollution filtering is also an important factor when it comes to defining what is the right environment for humans and other mammals. 
Some of the health benefits are increased oxygenation of the lungs, increased vital capacity, enhanced celiac activity, reduction of stress, synchronization of the right and the left brain hemispheres, balance of personality, better thinking ability and increased endurance and work capacity. 
Opposite to the positive health benefits, the lack of proper air care cause serotonin hyperfunction syndrome or aka "irritation syndrome", stress, fatigue, spontaneous anger, clumsiness, weakness, anxiety and generally a less fortified immune system.

Smart Air Care (SMAC) refers to a special type of indoor air purification method used in Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) Management, mostly by air conditioner, air quality measurer, ionizer and scenting device producers. The ‘smart’ attributive means controllability by either a smart device or a remote controller and sensory perception that usually decides what type of air care is desired. 

Air care is based on air composition examination or other factors such as economic power management. Air care or air management is considered a complex progress as its main goal is to create a beneficial atmosphere for easy human (and animal) breathing and positive physiological effects (I.e. work performance boost, mood lifting). 

Smart Air Care uses the following air management methods: ionization, purification, scenting, Silver sterilization, natural humidification, air filtering and applies Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) monitoring.


Let's talk about technology stuff. SOL-ONE isn't your everyday air cleaner, it's close to be an engineering chef-d'oeuvre. Start with the basics:
SOL-ONE is 36x25x25 (cm) relatively small device, but it is larger than it looks, because its massive 3,5 kg thick porcelain housing gives it a majestic impression and its water tank weighs an extra 1,2 kg when filled, so it definitely has an impact on its surroundings.

Here comes the interesting part: 
SOL-ONE applies the best quality ionizer currently available, emitting 20 MILLION negative ions per cubic centimeter, which is roughly 1000 times stronger than most ionizers on the market. Thanks to its efficient air cleaning ability, it terminates up to 99% of indoor air bacteria, circulating up to 250 m3 of air every hour. Plus, you may choose from 8000 LED color tones to set your current mood light.

SOL-ONE is made out of 4+1 basic parts. The stand and the cover makes out the housing, inside the housing there's the filter, the fan and the electronics board, which is also the module platform. Below the air filter is a water tank and you can add additional modules to the module platform, that can either ionize or scent your air.


SOL-ONE consumes up to 10 Watts of electricity on its full capacity, which is about as much, as an energy saver light bulb's consumption and it was designed to require only occasional maintenance. Since it has a washable air filter, you only have to wash out the filter and refill the water supply every 7 days. Consider it as one of your flowers, that needs watering. 

SOL-ONE's main filtering feature is that it can and should run 24/7 even at night on a super silent 25 dB (lowest) fan noise. 
Another cool feature is that it can be completely automated. You can set environment-aware air cleaning, as SOL-ONE takes an air sample every few seconds and measures the amount of ventilation strength needed. The worse the air quality, the higher the fans output will be. You can also schedule when to enter sleeping/silent mode and how often you want to scent your room.

When designing SOL-ONE our aim was to create an aesthetically most pleasing shape. Actually, it was only after we designed its shape, that we knew SOL-ONE needs to see daylight. You can compare it to many natural forms, for some people it looks like a vase, others think it's more like a human curve, but for us it's like a fresh raindrop in the air! In one word SOL-ONE is decoration!

As we browsed through countless air purifiers available on the market, we have realized most devices are unattractive and should be hidden away from the eyes. SOL-ONE is different, SOL-ONE is like a beautiful sculpture and more like a warm piece of fine art than just a coldly engineered machine.

SOL-ONE is built to be simple and great, you won't find any panel sticking out on its surface, there aren't any useless buttons or switches that could break its curves and there are definitely no extra remote controls lying around, just you and the purely natural curves.

SOL-ONE comes in four colors: red, black, gold and white, plus there's a true gold housing for the neediest. For most living rooms the best choice is white, while in bedrooms the black may provide the best relaxing experience, but the choice is absolutely yours.  

When you choose to pre-order a SOL-ONE you CANNOT directly choose your preferred color, but DON'T WORRY, we will contact you and sort out all the details after the campaign!


Customize your SOL-ONE by asking for an individual painted design. If you wish, we can make yours look unlike like any other!

Just send us your high resolution image and we will calculate you the best price to get you the desired looks during the standard shipping period (October).


So what do you get for supporting us and contributing to our project? We appreciate all efforts, so we reward everyone by creating a thank you wall on our website, so if you are our supporter, your name will be on our thank you wall!

The SOL-ONE as a reward:

These perks speak for themselves, the sooner you contribute, the lower price it has. 

Every SOL-ONE perk contains:

  • 1 SOL-ONE Smart Air Care device
  • 1 SOL-ONE Ionizer module
  • 1 SOL-ONE Scenting module
  • 1 SOL-ONE Fragrance set - Basic
  • Freely downloadable smartphone app
Get SOL-ONE on the first day and pay only $449 instead of $999! Crazy, right? 

SOL-ONE Family Pack:

We also have a family pack discount throughout the campaign for $999. A family pack contains: 

  • 2 SOL-ONE Smart Air care devices
  • 1 SOL-ONE Ionizer module
  • 1 SOL-ONE Scenting module
  • 1 SOL-ONE Fragrance set - Basic
  • Freely downloadable smartphone app

Fragrance sets:

Fragrance vials can only be used with the SOL Scent module. We provide 4 basic fragrances for every perk, but if you are a perfume lover you can purchase additional fragrance sets. There are two types of fragrance sets available currently. One of them is the "basic" fragrance set of 4 different 16 ml/0,54 OZ vial of fragrances and the other is the "enthusiast" fragrance set with the 4 basic scents and 6 additional ones. That's 10 vials of different perfumes designed by us for your taste.

True Gold:

It's not a joke, if you have all that money to burn then get a SOL-ONE covered in 24 carat gold!

Business pack:

If you would like to retail SOL-ONE, then check out our prices and contact us the arrange a good deal for both of us!

Contribute to get the SOL-ONE on a special Indiegogo discount, please note that these prices are only available to Indiegogo backers!
Transparency and trust are two of the most fundamental rules we share and abide by. We understand it is a difficult choice to pre-order a high definition product without seeing it or touching it. That's why we like to keep our crowdfunding financials publicly available for everyone. You may already know such supreme quality Smart Air Care device isn't inexpensive to produce, but there are many other costs associated with our campaign that you may not be aware of. 
The platform fee is basically Indiegogo's share of our revenue and the financial institute's transaction fee. We also spend a minimal amount of funds on promotion, but other than that we steadfastly focus all funds on bringing SOL-ONE to your home.

 
The idea to build a luxury air purifier and scenting device has been around for quiet a while now. We first came together in 2014 and we have travelled a long way ever since. We have defeated many obstacles on our way and had just as much joy as we had disappointments, but exactly one year ago the prototype of SOL-ONE was finally born. 

Unfortunately, the cost of serial production is way too high to bear it all by ourselves, so we have decided to launch a crowdfunding campaign here on Indiegogo. If we successfully reach our goal - since we already have fully working products - it is safe to say, that we are able to ship every SOL-ONE this October!


We'd like to work with you, if you have a design shop or interested in reselling electronic devices this is your best chance to get SOL-ONE in bulk. Contact us for a better offer, we are open to make deals of any kind! 


We build high-tech and aesthetic home appliances with over a century of combined business and technology experience. Our dream is to make SOL-ONE, The First Smart Air Care device to become the air purifier of many households. Help us reach our goal by pre-ordering a SOL-ONE (or two) and we will promise you the most distinct air purifier you could ever have in your home.

Our aim is to make SOL-ONE the greatest air care device ever built, with continuous enthusiasm we keep march until we do so.

story:
The BENCH BUSTR™ Story

The BENCH BUSTR™ Team is made of three member all into health and fitness, John, Ginny & D!

BENCH BUSTR™ Team Member John from Brooklyn, NY  began weight training as a teen, later becoming a competitive bodybuilder - winning titles from his first show, Dan Lurie's, Mr. Brooklyn to NPC's Atlantic States class winner - three years in a row, as well as the NPC's Amateur Grand Prix class winner.  He has trained and was a personal trainer in all levels of gyms:  Old school lifting gyms, on the sands of California's Venice Beach to the most elite NYC fitness centers.

It was at a local gym the concept of the BENCH BUSTR™ was envisioned, John went to use the bench press machine and saw the previous user walking away.  The previous user had severe acne on his upper back and shoulders, and left behind a sweaty bench. John proceeded to wipe down the bench before his workout and to his ultimate disgust – found blood on the paper towel!  He decided then and there to take matters into his own hands - creating the concept of the BENCH BUSTR™ - to "Share the Gym,  Not the Germs™"!  

It was when John spoke of his concept with now Team Member Ginny, that the BENCH BUSTR™ became a reality.  Team Member Ginny understood the importance of germ protection. She lost a loved one from an infection caught while in the hospital.  Yes, a hospital!  If you can catch a deadly infection in a HOSPITAL, just imagine what you can catch in a GYM!  This is why we are also donating a portion of each pledge to the Committee to Reduce Infection Deaths - RID with each pledge made toward BENCH BUSTR™. So protect yourself while contributing to make hospitals a safer place.


Ginny's belief, backing and support provided the opportunities for patents, prototypes, designs, samples and then the perfect final product today!  Ginny and Team Member D joined forces to bring you the  best and safest solution to keep you safer while working out as well as keeping the price down to make it affordable to everyone.  There has been no expensive outside consultants, photographers, advertisers, web designers, Just this Team!!!

          Please Join Us In Busting The Germs With The BENCH BUSTR™



The BENCH BUSTR™  is your very own personal protective fitness weight bench cover.  Its specially designed impervious backing, as used in the medical field,  is SGS certified.  It is this backing that helps eliminate the chances of coming into contact with someone else's sweat and body fluids left behind on padded gym surfaces. The BENCH BUSTR™ is also durable, has a soft comfortable absorbent terry cloth surface, an adaptable elastic perimeter, is light weight and fits over a majority of padded gym equipment. It just make sense!

We are proud that you and your fitness friends can join us in offering this awesome product, which is not only adaptable, comfortable, breathable and machine washable - its special impermeable backing creates a barrier between you, the equipment and the germs. With gyms being a breeding ground for germs - from bacteria to viruses to fungal infections to skin diseases such as E. Coli, Staph, MRSA, influenza, norovirus, impetigo, ringworm, scabies to name a few - you and your fitness friends and all athletes can help reduce their risk of getting more than just a workout.  Making your workout more hygienic was our goal -- and we have attained that goal with BENCH BUSTR™! 

Patent Pending.

We want everyone to have ultimate worry free protection during their workout, We want to keep you safer from the germs, infections and viruses that are rampant in gyms. 
                           Join The Campaign - Share the Gym, Not the Germs™!  

Where do the raised funds go ?

We have been working on the BENCH BUSTR™ all on our own. The BENCH BUSTR™s that you see are samples that are ready for mass production.  With your support, we will bring the BENCH BUSTR™ to athletes, fitness buffs, gyms and schools worldwide. Your contribution will help fund:

  • Product Manufacturing - We are ready for mass production
  • Manufacturing Shipping & Fee
  • Advertising:  We have put the bulk of our funds into research and development for the perfect BENCH BUSTR™.  By doing so, we have produced the best and safest solution to keep you safer while working out as well as keeping the  price down to make it affordable to everyone.  We now need an advertising budget to be able to get the word out to all.  That's where you come in.  Help us spread the news!
  • A Fitness Revolution! 
  • Plus a donation will be made to RID - The Committee to Reduce Infection Deaths with each pledge made toward the BENCH BUSTR™ campaign.

The Perks

We are ready, organized and committed to making this product a reality. Our manufacturing is now ready for mass production. Now we need your support - check out the perks at the top right of this page. Not only do you get to be a part of the next big thing, you get the perk you picked!  Reward yourself with the benefits of owning your very own BENCH BUSTR™ at introductory fundraiser prices!  Retail prices will be  higher, include sales tax and will not include free shipping


Don't Stop Now, Continue To Get Involved !

We want everyone who backs the BENCH BUSTR™ project to be involved in the
promotion of the product. After you've pledged, actively participate in our social media discussions. Then, after you receive your own BENCH BUSTR™ make sure you take some pictures with it and spread the word by posting your pictures on Instagram and Facebook.

Plus a Donation will be made to RID - The Committee to Reduce Infection Deaths with each pledge made toward the BENCH BUSTR™ campaign.

In The News - Think About What's Left Behind On Gym Equipment Before You Work Out!

  • "Make Sure Exercise is all You Get from Your Workout" NY Times
  • “Research: Typical gym equipment regularly carries germs”  IDEA Fitness
  • “Skin Infections Can Spread Like Wildfire at the Gym ” NY Times
  •  “Experts: Gym equipment is a breeding ground for germs” USA Today
  •  “What's Living on Your Gym’s Weight Bench?”
  •   “Your local gym is positively swimming with bacteria, fungus and other things   that make you sick”   Men’s Fitness
  •  "Coming into contact with sweat left behind on a machine could lead to a staph infection, usually manifesting in the form of pimples or boils. If not treated properly, it can invade the bloodstream”Advanced Dermatology, PC


Patent Pending.

F.A.Q.s

Is the BENCH BUSTR™ machine washable and dryable?
Yes! The BENCH BUSTR™is machine washable and dryable. Wash your BENCH BUSTR™ in the washing machine in cold or warm water. Use a bleach-free laundry detergent - bleach can damage any fabric. After washing, tumble-dry on a low - medium heat setting or hang up to dry. Do not iron or dry clean.

How is the BENCH BUSTR™ adaptable?
The BENCH BUSTR™ has an elastic perimeter that stretches and adapts to a majority of gym equipment, even certain stationary bikes. It’s large enough to adapt but it’s lightweight and compact to carry.  See pictures in Gallery!

Won't just a towel keep me as safe from germs and viruses?

A towel is made to absorb.  So, when you use a towel on gym equipment it not only absorbs your sweat, it is absorbing anything that is on the bench, such as germs, sweat and viruses, thus still possibly coming in contact with your body.  BENCH BUSTR™ has a specially designed backing.  This backing acts as a shield and keeps the germs, bacteria, etc. from coming in contact with your body, greatly decreasing the risk and worry of catching any harmful, sickness causing germs.

Why can't I just clean off the equipment before using it?
First of all, that takes unnecessary time away from your workout.  BENCH BUSTR™ slips over the exercise equipment pads in seconds.  Secondly, unless you are extremely thorough (taking up more of your time at each machine) you will probably not disinfect every inch of the pad.  The BENCH BUSTR™ covers the pad completely on most machines (see photos), therefore giving you a safer, healthier workout.  Plus, chemical cleaner can be full or toxins.

Who should own a BENCH BUSTR™?

Anyone and everyone who uses workout equipment - men, women and children of all ages. Whether it is at a gym, at home. at school or while traveling, a BENCH BUSTR™ will help keep you safer from catching infections, viruses and skin rashes left behind on gym equipment.  If your child is athletic and uses gym equipment at school, this is a perfect way to help protect him/her from the multitude of germs found in school gyms. Coaches can obtain BENCH BUSTR™s for their teams to use to keep them healthier.  At such a minimal cost, the benefits of keeping yourself, your children, loved ones and a friend safer is incomparable!


Is the BENCH BUSTR™ available in any colors?
Sorry, not yet.  We are hoping eventually to offer color choices.  Each BENCH BUSTR™ is silkscreen printed with the BENCH BUSTR™ logo.

What’s left?
All we need now is your support. The BENCH BUSTR™ is ready for the fitness world. You can help it get there sooner by joining in the campaign and getting the word out on your social media outlets.  Have a great worry free workout!

So Ask Yourself:

WHAT'S CRAWLING ON MY GYM EQUIPMENT???


                           This Is Why We Need The BENCH BUSTR™. 

                      Select Your Perk To Get Your BENCH BUSTR™!!!


Patent Pending.
BENCH BUSTR™ -  "Share the Gym,  Not the Germs™"!
Your very own personal protective fitness weight bench cover.

The BENCH BUSTR™  Story
The BENCH BUSTR™ Team is made of three member all into health and fitness, John, Ginny & D!BENCH BUSTR™ Team Member John from Brooklyn, NY  began weight training as a teen, later becoming a competitive bodybuilder - winning titles from his first show, Dan Lurie's, Mr. Brooklyn to NPC's Atlantic States class winner - three years in a row, as well as the NPC's Amateur Grand Prix class winner.  He has trained and was a personal trainer in all levels of gyms:  Old school lifting gyms, on the sands of California's Venice Beach to the most elite NYC fitness centers. It was at a local gym the concept of the BENCH BUSTR™ was envisioned, John went to use the bench press machine and saw the previous user walking away.  The previous user had severe acne on his upper back and shoulders, and left behind a sweaty bench. John proceeded to wipe down the bench before his workout and to his ultimate disgust – found blood on the paper towel!  He decided then and there to take matters into his own hands - creating the     concept of the BENCH BUSTR™ - to "Share the Gym,  Not the Germs™"!   It was when John spoke of his concept with now Team Member Ginny, that the BENCH BUSTR™ became a reality.  Team Member Ginny understood the importance of germ protection. She lost a 
loved one from an infection caught while in the hospital.  Yes, a 
hospital!  If you can catch a deadly infection in a HOSPITAL, just 
imagine what you can catch in a GYM!  This is why
we are also donating a portion of each pledge to the Committee to 
Reduce Infection Deaths - RID with each pledge made toward BENCH BUSTR™. So protect yourself while contributing to
 make hospitals a safer place. 
Ginny's belief, backing and support provided the opportunities for patents, 
prototypes, designs, samples and then the perfect final product today!  
Ginny and Team Member D joined forces to bring you the  best and safest
 solution to keep you safer 
while working out as well as keeping the price down to make it 
affordable to everyone.  There has been no expensive outside 
consultants, photographers, advertisers, web designers, Just this 
Team!!!           Please Join Us In Busting The Germs With The BENCH BUSTR™
The BENCH BUSTR™  is your very own personal protective fitness
weight bench cover.  Its specially designed impervious backing, as used in the medical field,  is SGS certified.  It is this backing that helps
eliminate the chances of coming into contact with someone else's sweat and body
fluids left behind on padded gym surfaces. The     BENCH BUSTR™ is also durable, has a
soft comfortable absorbent terry cloth surface, an adaptable elastic perimeter,
is light weight and fits over a majority of padded gym equipment. It just make sense!

We are proud that you and your fitness friends can join us in offering this awesome product,
which is not only adaptable, comfortable, breathable and machine washable - its special impermeable backing creates a barrier between you, the equipment and the germs. With gyms being a
breeding ground for germs - from bacteria to viruses to fungal infections to skin
diseases such as E.
Coli, Staph, MRSA, influenza, norovirus, impetigo, ringworm, scabies to name a
few - you and your fitness friends and all athletes can help reduce their risk of getting more than
just a workout.  Making your workout
more hygienic was our goal -- and we have attained that goal with BENCH BUSTR™!
