story:
After years of being told to take off our shoes at the door of my parent’s house, I finally asked my father why we weren’t ever allowed to wear shoes in his home. Politely he said, “because of how dirty they are!” I thought to myself, shoes couldn’t possibly be that bad!  This simple discussion sparked a curiosity in me. Wanting to know exactly what germs were residing on the bottom of my shoes, I started doing research. I was shocked by what I discovered! To my dismay it turns out there are hundreds of thousands of bacteria hanging out on our shoe soles and some of them are pretty dangerous! 

Dr. Jack Bragg from the University of Missouri, shares in our video above about a study that was conducted at the University of Arizona which concluded that some of the bacterial strains found on footwear were E Coli, staphylococcus, Klebsiella pneumoniae and Serratia. 

In another study conducted by microbiologist Charles P. Gerba, Pseudomonas, known as the SUPER BUG, was also found on the soles of shoes, but that’s not all, findings also concluded that the harmful bacteria Stap was present as well. And that's just our shoes, imagine the nasty things our pets step in while playing in the yard and the germs that are brought in that way!

I told my father about my findings and we started bouncing ideas back and forth trying to come up with a way to disinfect shoes and inhibit the growth of these tiny creatures. 

That’s where Germ-Matted came about.

Germ-matted is completely biodegradable. It is bacteria free, free from fungal spores, anti-microbial and durable.  

A Germ-matted mat is a multi-layered woven mat made of natural fibers with inherent disinfecting properties such as coir, coconut husk and processed woven cork. It contains a proprietary blend of all natural and powerful active ingredients that are known to kill and inhibit the growth of bacteria and germs. This floor covering, made of pet appropriate fibers impregnated, coated or otherwise exposed to a mixture of these active ingredients is specifically designed to trap and kill contaminants. 

Each Germ Matted door mat is treated with (SmartShield) a long lasting odorless, colorless and non-toxic antimicrobial which prevents the growth of bacteria, mold, mildew, fungi and algae. The Smart Shield formula will last on each mat up to 30 days. After 30 days a small bottle of Smart Shield may be purchased at a small fee which can be reapplied to the mat fibers in order to re-saturate the mat for it's full effectiveness  

(SmartShield) acts by creating an environment which is not hospitable to micro-organisms resulting in their inability to survive and thrive on (and in) the Germ Matted. 

When bacteria land on a surface of the Germ Matted they begin forming a self-duplicating environment called a bio-film. When a bio-film attempt to grow on a surface treated with (SmartShield) it is quickly destroyed on the surface.

(SmartShield) also prevents odors and staining caused by bacteria and mold.

Features and Benefits

Non-Toxic

Non-Flammable

Does not rely on poisons or heavy metals  

Works in a dry state

Long lasting

Prevents odors

• SmartShield™ the only antimicrobial technology that perform without diffusion or migrating off the applied surface.

• SmartShield™ continuously protects the applied surface between cleanings.

• Bound technology – unlike conventional disinfectants, poisons, phenols or heavy metals, our technology performs while bound to the applied surface (substrate).

• Residual Efficacy – Unlike other antimicrobials, our product’s efficacy remains for a long period of time.

• Porous and Non porous Surfaces – It is typically against the Federal Regulations to apply many antimicrobials to porous materials. Our technology allows for both porous and nonporous materials.

• Effective Against a Broad Spectrum of Microbes – EPA registered for a broad array of bacteria, algae, fungi and yeasts.

• No Super Bugs – There is no known or anticipated risk for microbes to mutate to a Super Bug. This is due to the bound technology of SmartShield™. Other technologies work by “uploading” into the microorganism resulting sometimes in a mutation of the original microorganism.

• Ease of Use – A covalent bond forms with the applied substrate to ensure durability in multiple environments including water, solvents and chemicals. May be mixed with compatible products.

• Safety – SmartShield ™ is a completely water-based formulation. It is easily used by field personnel using a basic spray bottle, or a high tech spray system.

SmartShield ™ uses ZERO Triclosan, heavy metals, arsenic, titanium, phenols or poisons.

Be aware of copy-cat products and the over use of “buzz words”. SmartShield ™ is a Patented formula with extensive testing and proven efficacy.

Smart Shield formula for purchase coming soon along with the purchase of a doormat. 


You may be one of those who do take off their shoes before entering a home,  but if you’re like most of us, that may seem time consuming and unnecessary. It isn’t realistic, at least for me, to clean all four of my pup’s paws with anti-bacterial soap every time he comes in from outside. Even though these things are good practice, I want to provide a safe alternative. 

It is very important for me to be able to introduce this much-needed product into your home, which is why I am asking you to invest in me and Germ-matted. Your support will help fund the production, manufacturing and marketing to bring Germ-Matted to the world.

story:
About StepCash

Imagine getting rewarded for something that you do essentially everyday - walking. That's what we aim to provide for you. StepCash utilizes the pedometer function of the smartphone to track the number of steps you have taken and convert them to incentives with participating merchants.

In the long term, we hope that StepCash will become your trusted companion to greater fitness and a healthier lifestyle by rewarding those who walk more.

We will also provide additional information such as distance covered and calories burned to our users via the app.

How It Works

    

1. Walk!
2. Our app will track the number of steps you have taken.

3. Convert your steps into cash points by using tokens. One token can convert a maximum of 10,000 steps into cash points. ( E.g. 30,000 steps will require 3 tokens to convert) You can collect tokens by logging into our app daily, and watching ads shown in our app. 
As of now, 10,000 steps can be converted to 10,000 cash points at 1 x conversion rate.
Note: All steps will expire within a week of attaining it, hence we encourage users to convert their steps into cash points daily.

4. Redeem your cash points at our participating merchants.
Our merchants will span 8 categories including Food & Beverage, Home & Furniture, IT gadgets, Entertainment, Sports, Education, Fashion, and Beauty.
Find out more @StepCash Website.

What We Need & What You Get

We need another US$3500 to finish developing the app and to source for partnerships with more merchants. With more merchants onboard with us, you will enjoy a greater variety of stores to redeem your cash points with. 

Currently, the StepCash app is only available for iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, iPhone 6s plus. If we can go beyond our initial goal and achieve a total of US$5500 in funding, we will produce the app for Android platform as well. 

Any additional amount raised will go towards sourcing of partnerships with merchants.

Once we hit the goal of US$3500, we will be implementing the Perks as promised. Early supporters will get to enjoy more benefits than the majority of the public when the app is officially launched.  We will personally contact each and every one of our early supporters to provide them with a perk redemption code and additional details in July 2016, a few days before the app is officially launched. 

Challenges

Currently, we have 5 merchants onboard. In order to get more merchants onboard, we would like to ask for the support of our backers to share the app with their friends and families once it has been launched. With more users, our company will be able to get better and greater merchants. 
Lastly, our company will be launching StepCash in Singapore first. We plan to expand into other markets in the future.

About Us

At KooKoo Studios, we do gamification of fitness apps. We are a passionate company that wants to achieve fitness milestones with our employees, customers, shareholders and greater society.

  • Mission:

    "No. 1 creator of Gamified Health Apps"

  • Vision:

    "Fusing virtual activities with natural interactions in the physical world to achieve better state of health and well-being."

Find out more about us @KooKoo Studios.

About Us



At KooKoo Studios, we do gamification of fitness apps. We are a passionate company that wants to achieve fitness milestones with our employees, customers, shareholders and greater society.


Mission:"No. 1 creator of Gamified Health Apps"

Vision:"Fusing virtual activities with natural interactions in the physical world to achieve better state of health and well-being."


Find out more about us @KooKoo Studios.

story:
Who are we?

 

Some would label us a travel agency. Some would call us a fitness company. What are we though? We are  a start-up within the health and wellness industry that seeks to totally revolutionize how people lose weight. Through travel, fitness, and cuisine change our system is effective, yet also 100% natural and safe. 

You're probably thinking to yourself, "Sure, I've worked out before. Yes, I've changed my diet before. But I'm still heavier than I would like, or I'm still out of shape. Why would it work any differently this time around?"

Why? You will succeed this time because you'll be doing it in South East Asia. In Bangkok. The hottest city in the world, per number of days. You won't be alone. You'll be working with licensed personal trainers and people who have been in your shoes before, AND who lost weight this way. 

 

 

What we do:

 

We help you consume less calories naturally and safely, thru cuisine substitution. We drastically reduce the amount of western food you take in on a daily basis and replace it with asian and Thai cuisine. Put simply, by switching what you predominately eat, your body will naturally suppress your hunger because it's not used to that much of it.

Without even realizing it you’ll start to eat what you NEED and not what you WANT. 

Food is just one part of the equation though. By providing you an outstanding fitness regimen with daily personal trainer sessions we knew our good system would quickly become exceptional. 

 

 

Why we launched this business:

 

We launched this business because we are passionate about travel, losing weight, and helping others. It all started when Nick first moved to Thailand in 2013 and lost 25 pounds within his first month just by changing his diet to really spicy food and walking a lot.

With the obesity epidemic there is no shortage of weight loss solutions. However, these options are unsuccessful for a lot of people because they're unrealistic or too hard to follow. After Nick's brother, Luke, also lost 30 pounds through cuisine substitution during a 9 week trip, we knew we had to figure out a way to bring our idea to the world!

When we researched weight-loss tourism we learned it is a relatively new concept.

We found some boot camps, yoga destinations, and activity tours but we disliked the group workout structure. We believe it is more a ploy to keep overall costs lower, and decided to opt for one-on-one personal trainer sessions daily, despite the cost. During our research we also found some high end resorts and luxury spas with an all-inclusive model. The short-coming is the expense. We knew we could create an affordable option for people from all walks of life. 

 

Our focus is the traveler who wants outstanding results for their physique, but not all the bells and whistles.

 

After even more research we noticed a pattern of an often "too busy" schedule. The specific opportunity to fulfill a niche really appealed to us. We designed the accommodating schedule and amentities to meet the specific needs of the many online professionals, freelancers, digital entrepreneurs, and remote workers throughout the United States and worldwide. However, it's perfect for anyone who wants more privacy and time while still enjoying the benefits of an all-inclusive weight loss vacation.

 

What we provide:

 

 

What we need:

 

We have already invested some of our own funds for research, website development, marketing, and hiring. However, our forecasting suggests we need at least another $50,000 to begin. Our goal in 2019 is to help our guests lose over 2500 pounds total.

If we provide trips for 150 people, that would mean the average person loses 16.66 pounds. Although that does seem to be a lot, our system works and it is definitely achievable for everyone who works hard and follows the program. We foresee most guests will lose 5-10% of their body weight on a 14 day trip, and 5-15% if they go with a 28 day trip.

 

 

Rewards:

 

Our rewards are modeled after our business mantra: 

Fitness. Food. Fun.

 

That's the experience you get with us: fitness, food, fun. With that said, we thought the best possible perks for our crowd-funding backers needed to include some of each area of our appeal.

Fitness! We have included official t-shirts and branded water bottles, because even if you never come with us on a trip to Bangkok, you need gym and workout gear. We designed a cool looking gym shirt and water bottle that will be sure to spark conversations, no matter where you are!

Food! A little spice can make a simple meal an event. Like spice, we believe every little bit of support helps success happen. We are starting our perks with donations as little as $3! As an appetizer to the phenomenal food Thailand has to offer, we have included four of our signature recipes that are absolutely delicious.

Fun! We offer coupon codes. We email you your own unique backer code at the completion of the campaign. You can take advantage of the exclusive indiegogo promotional rate at your convenience, whenever you choose to. The percentage off is valid for any size trip, and never expires.

 

Timeline:

 

 

Our team:

 

Nick: Cofounder - Nick has a B.S. from the Pennsylvania State University and brings to the table over 5 years of experience as an English teacher in Thailand, working with other cultures. He loves to travel. In addition to exploring Bangkok with his wife and friends, he loves to travel other places in South East Asia, whenever he gets the chance. He is fluent in English, Russian, and Thai.

Luke: Cofounder - Luke has a B.S. from the Pennsylvania State University and brings to the table over 5 years of experience in Business, Entrepreneurship, and Management. He plans to really build the brand, handle marketing, and the technical aspects of the business. He will also look for opportunities to expand, going forward.

Jimmy: CFO - Jimmy has a B.S. in Finance from the University of Utah and brings to the table over 5 years of experience in asset management, valuations/mergers, and finance at the Fortune 500 level. He plans to use his unique skill with numbers to guarantee company profitability and assess future investments.

We plan to hire two full time persons, 3 bi-lingual personal trainers, and a bi-lingual chef. We have already communicated with some very strong candidates. We will initiate the hiring process closer to our official backer launch in March of 2019.

 

Risks/Challenges for us:

 

One potential challenge we face is raising the $50K we need to fully launch at the scale we are hoping for. We are extremely hard workers and passionate about this business.

One of our biggest hurdles is securing the luxury apartments, making the down payments, and first month rents. Without the $50K start-up, we will need to launch with a smaller amount of available bookings each month.

 

Why we are different:

 

Our niche is that we specifically cater to those who can work online, from anywhere. Other programs have their schedules too packed to be able to juggle both work obligations and fitness challenges. We will be that unique solution for those who notice that working from home is taking a toll on their midsection, and intend to make a change.

We are also different in terms of value. We aren't extremely cheap, but what we offer is second to none. We know that if you research other weight-loss and fitness vacation options you will find many spas, resorts, and fitness retreats that charge top dollar; without options longer than 7 or 10 days. Longer stays result in locking in the improvements.

We know we will grow extremely fast once the word gets out. Fortunately, we know the city extremely well, have the connections, and resources to handle that increased demand.

 

Who should sign up:

 

There’s a saying that goes, “Losing weight is hard. Being over-weight is hard. Pick your hard.”

We think it’s totally true. It is never easy to lose weight. If you have the drive to better yourself and start changing your lifestyle, for yourself, your family, and others, there is no better time to sign up for a life changing experience than right now.

 

Who should help us:

 

We obviously want people to pick Nomad Fitness Club but also want the entire weight loss tourism industry to grow as well. In our opinion, people want to travel and lose weight on these travels OR at least know they won’t gain weight. If you are moved by what we are doing or passionate about travel, fitness, food, or weight loss we'd really appreciate your help!

You should definitely help us if you plan or are contemplating a trip with Nomad Fitness Club at any point because the savings we are offering now, will not be offered down the road. 

By supporting us through the crowdfunding campaign we are giving you the opportunity to save 10-25% off our normal pricing. Considering that a 25% discount could correlate into savings of $2325 on a 28 day trip, it's a no brainer to grab that perk now, when you still can.

 

Our Values:

 

We believe in transparency and business ethics.

 

This is why our coupon codes will never expire AND can be transferrable. We hope any backer with a code eventually gets to vacation with us but we do understand circumstances happen in life that are sometimes unpredictable. However long down the road it may be, we will still honor the reduced rate for a friend, acquittance, or relative of yours if you choose to pass them your exclusive discount.

 

Other ways you can help:

 

We recognize that not everyone can help us financially. However, we would appreciate any assistance you can provide, such as sharing our campaign to your social media followers, or sending it directly to friends you believe may be interested.

 

Do not forget to check out us at www.nomadfitnessclub.com to keep up to date with the latest news and happenings around our business.

 

Additional Trip Info:

story:
LifePod is the only voice-first caregiving service designed to improve the quality of life for caregivers and their loved ones by monitoring and supporting their daily routines to help them thrive as they age-in-place. Offering a personalized, voice-enabled service built on top of popular smart-speaker technology, LifePod proactively assists family members and caregivers with managing a senior’s day-to-day schedule, medications, appointments, activities, and entertainment – from listening to their favorite music or watching their favorite TV show.

Improving the Quality of Life for Seniors and Caregivers

Check-Ins

Friendly, personalized check-ins to ensure everything is “ok”.

Reminders

Help with remembering important events and activities, medications, appointments, and birthdays.

Voice Services

Easy access to online services via smart speakers: weather, news, music, games, therapy, and more.

 

Companionship

Improves social interaction and combats loneliness by telling jokes or trivia, reading audiobooks, and playing games.

Alerts

Easily configures instant alerts and daily reports summarizing activities for the caregiving team as needed.

...and More

New features will be continuously added, integrating data from IoT and wearable sensors and health-related applications & services.

 

How LifePod Works

LifePod expands the capabilities of popular smart speakers with proactive voice technology, providing an easy-to-use voice service for seniors aging in place. Unlike traditional voice assistants, LifePod can be set up and controlled by a remote family caregiver using LifePod's Caregiver service that supports personalized voice check-ins, reminders, and virtual companionship.

All the senior user needs to do is speak!

Good morning, Rose, this is LifePod. Did you remember to take your pills with breakfast?

Yes, I did

That's good to hear. Don’t forget that "The Price Is Right" starts in 5 minutes!

Ok, Thank you

And if Rose isn't feeling well, it could say something else…

Good morning, Rose, this is LifePod. Did you remember to take your pills with breakfast?

No, I didn't

Ok, please take your pills now, you know it will make Kelly happy!  And don’t forget that "The Price Is Right" starts in 5 minutes.

Ok, I will. Thank you

What Users are Saying

LifePod makes it easy for me to tell my loved ones how I'm doing.

Mary

87 years young, lives with her daughter's family

 

LifePod helps me stay on top of my daily routines.

Barbara

82 years young

 

LifePod helps mom and I have a healthy, well- balanced day. LifePod is Mom's virtual caregiver and supports her in remembering to take meds, getting up & walking around, hydrating, remembering her favorite TV shows, and generally entertaining her throughout the day. With LifePod, supporting Mom is easier than ever, and the tension between us has disappeared -- we can be Mother and Daughter again.

Sharon

Daughter/Caregiver, with Mom living with her

 

LifePod lets my daughter know that I'm OK, so she doesn't have to call me all the time.

Carol

82 years young, lives in an Assisted Living facility

The LifePod team is comprised of cutting-edge voice and caregiving technology veterans who are on a mission to use advanced smart speaker and voice technology to improve the quality of life for seniors, managed care patients and their caregivers.

The LifePod team found that monitoring and supporting their own aging parents from a distance, with limited and outdated technology (e.g., press-the-button pendants), was both frustrating and ineffective. After deeply personal and even tragic experiences, and in-depth research with industry leaders, this group of entrepreneurs decided it was time for a new, innovative approach to connected care for the elderly, offering purpose-built and intuitive technology to the senior population who has never had this type of intuitive access to online services before.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Brooke Brown, and I am a volunteer at Austin Child Guidance Center (ACGC). As a graduate student pursuing professional counseling, I am passionate about mental health and supportive of those in our community who meet the mental health needs of our underserved citizens. This is why I want to build a labyrinth–a research-proven tool with therapeutic value–for ACGC.   

Austin Child Guidance Center is a nonprofit that serves over 3,600 clients every year, with 79% of its children and families living at or below 200% of the federal poverty level. ACGC provides mental health care to every child in need regardless of the family’s ability to pay. Through advocacy, workshops, and therapy, ACGC ensures that Central Texas children are safe, accepted, and unafraid.

 ACGC’s services not only benefit the clients that they serve, but they tremendously benefit the larger community. Investing in children’s mental health is investing in a more productive state, socially, academically and economically. ACGC supports the children in our community so that they can be the future leaders that we need.   

What We Need & What You Get

The money raised from this campaign will go towards the construction of a meditation labyrinth for our children’s healing garden. The image of this campaign displays what we envision the labyrinth to look like. Specifically, proceeds will go towards the labyrinth design template ($797.00), which will allow our volunteers easy and secure placing of each labyrinth stone and will suppress weeds for minimal maintenance. The remaining proceeds will go towards stepping stones for the labyrinth (around $2 each). I have already raised $400- only $1,000 more to go!   

The labyrinth, along with a donors’ plaque, will be permanently installed adjacent to the center. All proceeds go directly to this project. With your contribution, you are providing ACGC a research-proven resource that will last the center forever. With your generosity, not only are you helping this year’s ACGC clients, but clients and families for years to come. 

The Impact

Labyrinths are widely used for therapeutic purposes in schools, mental health facilities and hospitals. Among the many benefits of labyrinths for mental health, ACGC therapist Dr. Louise Tedford named the following reasons it would uniquely benefit ACGC clients:

    • Parent-child bonding, by parent and child working the labyrinth together and parents learning how to provide positive guidance throughout the task
    • Allowing children to be outdoors, since that is a much more rare opportunity in today’s world
    • Engaging in effective problem solving and feeling a sense of mastery at the task.

Labyrinths have also been used to improve concentration (e.g. with children diagnosed with ADHD) and to alleviate anxiety with children and adults.  

Risks & Challenges

We have the manpower, the expertise, and the support of the board for this project. The only challenge we face is obtaining the materials needed to create a sustainable labyrinth.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to financial contributions, in-kind donations of stepping stones for the labyrinth are accepted.

Please share, tweet, and post about this project, about the Austin Child Guidance Center, and about the importance of mental health in general. Change starts with awareness, and with a simple post, you can be a part of a movement to support mental health services for those that need it the most. Thank you.

Please
share, tweet, and post about this project, about the Austin Child Guidance
Center, and about the importance of mental health in general. Change starts with awareness, and with
a simple post, you can be a part of a movement to support mental health
services for those that need it the most. Thank you.

story: I am raising the money for a surgery that will put my shoulder back in its place and keep it there. It is a very expensive surgery for such a simple procedure. But at least then I will be able to do things like I did before, and not worry if my shoulder would give in. Like swimming, diving, rock climbing, bike riding and so on...
